IAST: tvaṁ sūrye na ā bhaja tava kratvā tavotibhiḥ
Griffith: Give us our portion in the Sun through thine own mental power and aids;
Devanāgarī: त्वं सूर्ये न आ भज तव क्रत्वा तवोतिभिः
pada pāṭha: tvam | sūrye | naḥ | ā | bhaja | tava | kratvā | tava | ūti-bhiḥ || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.5||

IAST: athā no vasyasas kṛdhi
Griffith: And make us better than we are.
pada pāṭha: tvam | sūrye | naḥ | ā | bhaja | tava | kratvā | tava | ūti-bhiḥ || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.5||

IAST: tava kratvā tavotibhir jyok paśyema sūryam
Griffith: Through thine own mental power and aid long may we look upon the Sun;
pada pāṭha: tava | kratvā | tava | ūti-bhiḥ | jyok | paśyema | sūryam || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.6||

IAST: athā no vasyasas kṛdhi
Griffith: Make thou us better than we are.
pada pāṭha: tava | kratvā | tava | ūti-bhiḥ | jyok | paśyema | sūryam || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.6||

IAST: abhy arṣa svāyudha soma dvibarhasaṁ rayim
Griffith: Well-weaponed Soma, pour to usa stream of riches doubly great;
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | su-āyudha | soma | dvi-barhasam | rayim || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.7||

IAST: athā no vasyasas kṛdhi
Griffith: And make us better than we are.
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | su-āyudha | soma | dvi-barhasam | rayim || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.7||

IAST: abhy arṣānapacyuto rayiṁ samatsu sāsahiḥ
Griffith: As one victorious unsubdued in battle pour forth wealth to us;
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | anapa-cyutaḥ | rayim | samat-su | sasahiḥ || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.8||

IAST: athā no vasyasas kṛdhi
Griffith: And make us better than we are.
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | anapa-cyutaḥ | rayim | samat-su | sasahiḥ || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.8||

IAST: tvāṁ yajñair avīvṛdhan pavamāna vidharmaṇi
Griffith: By worship, Pavamana! men have strengthened thee to prop the Law:
pada pāṭha: tvām | yajñaiḥ | avīvr̥dhan | pavamāna | vi-dharmaṇi || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.9||

IAST: athā no vasyasas kṛdhi
Griffith: Make thou us better than we are.
pada pāṭha: tvām | yajñaiḥ | avīvr̥dhan | pavamāna | vi-dharmaṇi || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.9||

IAST: rayiṁ naś citram aśvinam indo viśvāyum ā bhara
Griffith: O Indu, bring us wealth in steeds, manifold. quickening all life;
pada pāṭha: rayim | naḥ | citram | aśvinam | indo iti | viśva-āyum | ā | bhara || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.10||

IAST: athā no vasyasas kṛdhi
Griffith: And mate us better than we are.
pada pāṭha: rayim | naḥ | citram | aśvinam | indo iti | viśva-āyum | ā | bhara || atha | naḥ | vasyasaḥ | kr̥dhi ||9.4.10||

IAST: samiddho viśvatas patiḥ pavamāno vi rājati
Griffith: ENKINDLED, Pavamana, Lord, sends forth his light on, every side
pada pāṭha: sam-iddhaḥ | viśvataḥ | patiḥ | pavamānaḥ | vi | rājati || prīṇan | vr̥ṣā | kanikradat ||9.5.1||

IAST: prīṇan vṛṣā kanikradat
Griffith: In friendly show, the bellowing Bull.
pada pāṭha: sam-iddhaḥ | viśvataḥ | patiḥ | pavamānaḥ | vi | rājati || prīṇan | vr̥ṣā | kanikradat ||9.5.1||

IAST: tanūnapāt pavamānaḥ śṛṅge śiśāno arṣati
Griffith: He, Pavamana, Self-produced, speeds onward sharpening his horns:
pada pāṭha: tanū-napāt | pavamānaḥ | śr̥ṅge iti | śiśānaḥ | arṣati || antarikṣeṇa | rārajat ||9.5.2||

IAST: antarikṣeṇa rārajat
Griffith: He glitters through the firmament.
pada pāṭha: tanū-napāt | pavamānaḥ | śr̥ṅge iti | śiśānaḥ | arṣati || antarikṣeṇa | rārajat ||9.5.2||

IAST: īḻenyaḥ pavamāno rayir vi rājati dyumān
Griffith: Brilliant like wealth, adorable, with splendour Pavamana shines,
pada pāṭha: īḷenyaḥ | pavamānaḥ | rayiḥ | vi | rājati | dyu-mān || madhoḥ | dhārābhiḥ | ojasā ||9.5.3||

IAST: madhor dhārābhir ojasā
Griffith: Mightily with the streams of meath.
pada pāṭha: īḷenyaḥ | pavamānaḥ | rayiḥ | vi | rājati | dyu-mān || madhoḥ | dhārābhiḥ | ojasā ||9.5.3||

IAST: barhiḥ prācīnam ojasā pavamānaḥ stṛṇan hariḥ
Griffith: The tawny Pavamana, who strews from of old the grass with might,
pada pāṭha: barhiḥ | prācīnam | ojasā | pavamānaḥ | str̥ṇan | hariḥ || deveṣu | devaḥ | īyate ||9.5.4||

IAST: deveṣu deva īyate
Griffith: Is worshipped, God amid the Gods.
pada pāṭha: barhiḥ | prācīnam | ojasā | pavamānaḥ | str̥ṇan | hariḥ || deveṣu | devaḥ | īyate ||9.5.4||

IAST: ud ātair jihate bṛhad dvāro devīr hiraṇyayīḥ
Griffith: The golden, the Celestial Doors are lifted with their frames on high,
pada pāṭha: ut | ātaiḥ | jihate | br̥hat | dvāraḥ | devīḥ | hiraṇyayīḥ || pavamānena | su-stutāḥ ||9.5.5||

IAST: pavamānena suṣṭutāḥ
Griffith: By Pavamana glorified.
pada pāṭha: ut | ātaiḥ | jihate | br̥hat | dvāraḥ | devīḥ | hiraṇyayīḥ || pavamānena | su-stutāḥ ||9.5.5||

IAST: suśilpe bṛhatī mahī pavamāno vṛṣaṇyati
Griffith: With passion Pavamana longs for the great lofty pair, well-formed
pada pāṭha: suśilpe iti su-śilpe | br̥hatī iti | mahī iti | pavamānaḥ | vr̥ṣaṇyati || naktoṣasā | na | darśate iti ||9.5.6||

IAST: naktoṣāsā na darśate
Griffith: Like beauteous maidens, Night and Dawn
pada pāṭha: suśilpe iti su-śilpe | br̥hatī iti | mahī iti | pavamānaḥ | vr̥ṣaṇyati || naktoṣasā | na | darśate iti ||9.5.6||

IAST: ubhā devā nṛcakṣasā hotārā daivyā huve
Griffith: Both Gods who look on men I call, Celestial Heralds: Indra's Self
Devanāgarī: उभा देवा नृचक्षसा होतारा दैव्या हुवे
pada pāṭha: ubhā | devā | nr̥-cakṣasā | hotārā | daivyā | huve || pavamānaḥ | indraḥ | vr̥ṣā ||9.5.7||

IAST: pavamāna indro vṛṣā
Griffith: Is Pavamana, yea, the Bull.
pada pāṭha: ubhā | devā | nr̥-cakṣasā | hotārā | daivyā | huve || pavamānaḥ | indraḥ | vr̥ṣā ||9.5.7||

IAST: bhāratī pavamānasya sarasvatīḻā mahī
Griffith: This, Pavamana's sacrifice, shall the three beauteous Goddesses,
pada pāṭha: bhāratī | pavamānasya | sarasvatī | iḷā | mahī || imam | naḥ | yajñam | ā | gaman | tisraḥ | devīḥ | su-peśasaḥ ||9.5.8||

IAST: imaṁ no yajñam ā gaman tisro devīḥ supeśasaḥ
Griffith: Sarasvati and Bharati and Ila, Mighty One, attend.
Devanāgarī: इमं नो यज्ञमा गमन्तिस्रो देवीः सुपेशसः
pada pāṭha: bhāratī | pavamānasya | sarasvatī | iḷā | mahī || imam | naḥ | yajñam | ā | gaman | tisraḥ | devīḥ | su-peśasaḥ ||9.5.8||

IAST: tvaṣṭāram agrajāṁ gopām puroyāvānam ā huve
Griffith: summon Tvastar hither, our protector, champion, earliest-born,
pada pāṭha: tvaṣṭāram | agra-jām | gopām | puraḥ-yāvānam | ā | huve || induḥ | indraḥ | vr̥ṣā | hariḥ | pavamānaḥ | prajā-patiḥ ||9.5.9||

IAST: indur indro vṛṣā hariḥ pavamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ
Griffith: Indu is Indra, tawny Steer; Pavamana is Prajapati.
pada pāṭha: tvaṣṭāram | agra-jām | gopām | puraḥ-yāvānam | ā | huve || induḥ | indraḥ | vr̥ṣā | hariḥ | pavamānaḥ | prajā-patiḥ ||9.5.9||

IAST: vanaspatim pavamāna madhvā sam aṅgdhi dhārayā
Griffith: O Pavamana, with the meath in streams anoint Vanaspati,
pada pāṭha: vanaspatim | pavamāna | madhvā | sam | aṅgdhi | dhārayā || sahasra-valśam | haritam | bhrājamānam | hiraṇyayam ||9.5.10||

IAST: sahasravalśaṁ haritam bhrājamānaṁ hiraṇyayam
Griffith: The ever-green. the golden-hued, refulgent, with a thousand boughs.
pada pāṭha: vanaspatim | pavamāna | madhvā | sam | aṅgdhi | dhārayā || sahasra-valśam | haritam | bhrājamānam | hiraṇyayam ||9.5.10||

IAST: viśve devāḥ svāhākṛtim pavamānasyā gata
Griffith: Come to the consecrating rite of Pavamana, all ye Gods,-
pada pāṭha: viśve | devāḥ | svāhā-kr̥tim | pavamānasya | ā | gata || vāyuḥ | br̥haspatiḥ | sūryaḥ | agniḥ | indraḥ | sa-joṣasaḥ ||9.5.11||

IAST: vāyur bṛhaspatiḥ sūryo 'gnir indraḥ sajoṣasaḥ
Griffith: Vayu, Surya, Brhaspati, Indra, and Agni, in accord.
pada pāṭha: viśve | devāḥ | svāhā-kr̥tim | pavamānasya | ā | gata || vāyuḥ | br̥haspatiḥ | sūryaḥ | agniḥ | indraḥ | sa-joṣasaḥ ||9.5.11||

IAST: mandrayā soma dhārayā vṛṣā pavasva devayuḥ
Griffith: SOMA, flow on with pleasant stream, a Bull devoted to the Gods,
Devanāgarī: मन्द्रया सोम धारया वृषा पवस्व देवयुः
pada pāṭha: mandrayā | soma | dhārayā | vr̥ṣā | pavasva | deva-yuḥ || avyaḥ | vāreṣu | asma-yuḥ ||9.6.1||

IAST: avyo vāreṣv asmayuḥ
Griffith: Our Friend, unto the woollen sieve.
pada pāṭha: mandrayā | soma | dhārayā | vr̥ṣā | pavasva | deva-yuḥ || avyaḥ | vāreṣu | asma-yuḥ ||9.6.1||

IAST: abhi tyam madyam madam indav indra iti kṣara
Griffith: Pour hitherward, as Indra's Self, Indu, that gladdening stream of thine,
Devanāgarī: अभि त्यं मद्यं मदमिन्दविन्द्र इति क्षर
pada pāṭha: abhi | tyam | madyam | madam | indo iti | indraḥ | iti | kṣara || abhi | vājinaḥ | arvataḥ ||9.6.2||

IAST: abhi vājino arvataḥ
Griffith: And send us coursers full of strength.
pada pāṭha: abhi | tyam | madyam | madam | indo iti | indraḥ | iti | kṣara || abhi | vājinaḥ | arvataḥ ||9.6.2||

IAST: abhi tyam pūrvyam madaṁ suvāno arṣa pavitra ā
Griffith: Flow to the filter hitherward, pouring that ancient gladdening juice,
Devanāgarī: अभि त्यं पूर्व्यं मदं सुवानो अर्ष पवित्र आ
pada pāṭha: abhi | tyam | pūrvyam | madam | suvānaḥ | arṣa | pavitre | ā || abhi | vājam | uta | śravaḥ ||9.6.3||

IAST: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ
Griffith: Streaming forth power and high renown.
pada pāṭha: abhi | tyam | pūrvyam | madam | suvānaḥ | arṣa | pavitre | ā || abhi | vājam | uta | śravaḥ ||9.6.3||

IAST: anu drapsāsa indava āpo na pravatāsaran
Griffith: Hither the sparkling drops have flowed, like waters down a steep descent
Devanāgarī: अनु द्रप्सास इन्दव आपो न प्रवतासरन्
pada pāṭha: anu | drapsāsaḥ | indavaḥ | āpaḥ | na | pra-vatā | asaran || punānāḥ | indram | āśata ||9.6.4||

IAST: punānā indram āśata
Griffith: They have reached Indra purified.
pada pāṭha: anu | drapsāsaḥ | indavaḥ | āpaḥ | na | pra-vatā | asaran || punānāḥ | indram | āśata ||9.6.4||

IAST: yam atyam iva vājinam mṛjanti yoṣaṇo daśa
Griffith: Whom, having passed the filter, ten dames cleanse, as 'twere a vigorous steed,
pada pāṭha: yam | atyam-iva | vājinam | mr̥janti | yoṣaṇaḥ | daśa || vane | krīḷantam | ati-avim ||9.6.5||

IAST: vane krīḻantam atyavim
Griffith: While he disports him in the wood,-
pada pāṭha: yam | atyam-iva | vājinam | mr̥janti | yoṣaṇaḥ | daśa || vane | krīḷantam | ati-avim ||9.6.5||

IAST: taṁ gobhir vṛṣaṇaṁ rasam madāya devavītaye
Griffith: The steer-strong juice with milk pour forth, for feast and service of the Gods,
pada pāṭha: tam | gobhiḥ | vr̥ṣaṇam | rasam | madāya | deva-vītaye || sutam | bharāya | sam | sr̥ja ||9.6.6||

IAST: sutam bharāya saṁ sṛja
Griffith: To him who bears away the draught.
pada pāṭha: tam | gobhiḥ | vr̥ṣaṇam | rasam | madāya | deva-vītaye || sutam | bharāya | sam | sr̥ja ||9.6.6||

IAST: devo devāya dhārayendrāya pavate sutaḥ
Griffith: Effused, the God flows onward with his stream to Indra, to the God,
pada pāṭha: devaḥ | devāya | dhārayā | indrāya | pavate | sutaḥ || payaḥ | yat | asya | pīpayat ||9.6.7||

IAST: payo yad asya pīpayat
Griffith: So that his milk may strengthen him.
pada pāṭha: devaḥ | devāya | dhārayā | indrāya | pavate | sutaḥ || payaḥ | yat | asya | pīpayat ||9.6.7||

IAST: ātmā yajñasya raṁhyā suṣvāṇaḥ pavate sutaḥ
Griffith: Soul of the sacrifice, the juice effused flows quickly on: he keeps
Devanāgarī: आत्मा यज्ञस्य रंह्या सुष्वाणः पवते सुतः
pada pāṭha: ātmā | yajñasya | raṁhyā | susvāṇaḥ | pavate | sutaḥ || pratnam | ni | pāti | kāvyam ||9.6.8||

IAST: pratnaṁ ni pāti kāvyam
Griffith: His ancient wisdom of a Sage.
pada pāṭha: ātmā | yajñasya | raṁhyā | susvāṇaḥ | pavate | sutaḥ || pratnam | ni | pāti | kāvyam ||9.6.8||

IAST: evā punāna indrayur madam madiṣṭha vītaye
Griffith: So pouring forth, as Indra's Friend, strong drink, best Gladdener! for the feast,
pada pāṭha: eva | punānaḥ | indra-yuḥ | madam | madiṣṭha | vītaye || guhā | cit | dadhiṣe | giraḥ ||9.6.9||

IAST: guhā cid dadhiṣe giraḥ
Griffith: Thou, even in secret, storest hymns.
pada pāṭha: eva | punānaḥ | indra-yuḥ | madam | madiṣṭha | vītaye || guhā | cit | dadhiṣe | giraḥ ||9.6.9||

IAST: asṛgram indavaḥ pathā dharmann ṛtasya suśriyaḥ
Griffith: FORTH on their way the glorious drops have flowed for maintenance of Law,
pada pāṭha: asr̥gram | indavaḥ | pathā | dharman | r̥tasya | su-śriyaḥ || vidānāḥ | asya | yojanam ||9.7.1||

IAST: vidānā asya yojanam
Griffith: Knowing this sacrifice's course.
pada pāṭha: asr̥gram | indavaḥ | pathā | dharman | r̥tasya | su-śriyaḥ || vidānāḥ | asya | yojanam ||9.7.1||

IAST: pra dhārā madhvo agriyo mahīr apo vi gāhate
Griffith: Down in the mighty waters sinks the stream of meath, most excellent,
Devanāgarī: प्र धारा मध्वो अग्रियो महीरपो वि गाहते
pada pāṭha: pra | dhārā | madhvaḥ | agriyaḥ | mahīḥ | apaḥ | vi | gāhate || haviḥ | haviṣṣu | vandyaḥ ||9.7.2||

IAST: havir haviṣṣu vandyaḥ
Griffith: Oblation best of all in worth.
pada pāṭha: pra | dhārā | madhvaḥ | agriyaḥ | mahīḥ | apaḥ | vi | gāhate || haviḥ | haviṣṣu | vandyaḥ ||9.7.2||

IAST: pra yujo vāco agriyo vṛṣāva cakradad vane
Griffith: About the holy place, the Steer true, guileless, noblest, hath sent forth
Devanāgarī: प्र युजो वाचो अग्रियो वृषाव चक्रदद्वने
pada pāṭha: pra | yujaḥ | vācaḥ | agriyaḥ | vr̥ṣā | ava | cakradat | vane || sadma | abhi | satyaḥ | adhvaraḥ ||9.7.3||

IAST: sadmābhi satyo adhvaraḥ
Griffith: Continuous voices in the wood.
pada pāṭha: pra | yujaḥ | vācaḥ | agriyaḥ | vr̥ṣā | ava | cakradat | vane || sadma | abhi | satyaḥ | adhvaraḥ ||9.7.3||

IAST: pari yat kāvyā kavir nṛmṇā vasāno arṣati
Griffith: When, clothed in manly strength, the Sage flows in celestial wisdom round,
pada pāṭha: pari | yat | kāvyā | kaviḥ | nr̥mṇā | vasānaḥ | arṣati || svaḥ | vājī | sisāsati ||9.7.4||

IAST: svar vājī siṣāsati
Griffith: The Strong would win the light of heaven.
pada pāṭha: pari | yat | kāvyā | kaviḥ | nr̥mṇā | vasānaḥ | arṣati || svaḥ | vājī | sisāsati ||9.7.4||

IAST: pavamāno abhi spṛdho viśo rājeva sīdati
Griffith: When purified, he sits as King above the hosts, among his folk,
Devanāgarī: पवमानो अभि स्पृधो विशो राजेव सीदति
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | abhi | spr̥dhaḥ | viśaḥ | rājā-iva | sīdati || yat | īm | r̥ṇvanti | vedhasaḥ ||9.7.5||

IAST: yad īm ṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ
Griffith: What time the sages bring him nigh.
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | abhi | spr̥dhaḥ | viśaḥ | rājā-iva | sīdati || yat | īm | r̥ṇvanti | vedhasaḥ ||9.7.5||

IAST: avyo vāre pari priyo harir vaneṣu sīdati
Griffith: Dear, golden-coloured, in the fleece he sinks and settles in the wood:
Devanāgarī: अव्यो वारे परि प्रियो हरिर्वनेषु सीदति
pada pāṭha: avyaḥ | vāre | pari | priyaḥ | hariḥ | vaneṣu | sīdati || rebhaḥ | vanuṣyate | matī ||9.7.6||

IAST: rebho vanuṣyate matī
Griffith: The Singer shows his zeal in hymns.
pada pāṭha: avyaḥ | vāre | pari | priyaḥ | hariḥ | vaneṣu | sīdati || rebhaḥ | vanuṣyate | matī ||9.7.6||

IAST: sa vāyum indram aśvinā sākam madena gacchati
Griffith: He goes to Indra, Vayu, to the Asvins, as his custom is,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vāyum | indram | aśvinā | sākam | madena | gacchati || raṇa | yaḥ | asya | dharma-bhiḥ ||9.7.7||

IAST: raṇā yo asya dharmabhiḥ
Griffith: With gladdening juice which gives them joy.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vāyum | indram | aśvinā | sākam | madena | gacchati || raṇa | yaḥ | asya | dharma-bhiḥ ||9.7.7||

IAST: ā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam madhvaḥ pavanta ūrmayaḥ
Griffith: Tle streams of pleasant Soma flow to Bhaga, Mitra-Varuna,
Devanāgarī: आ मित्रावरुणा भगं मध्वः पवन्त ऊर्मयः
pada pāṭha: ā | mitrāvaruṇā | bhagam | madhvaḥ | pavante | ūrmayaḥ || vidānāḥ | asya | śakma-bhiḥ ||9.7.8||

IAST: vidānā asya śakmabhiḥ
Griffith: Well-knowing through his mighty powers.
pada pāṭha: ā | mitrāvaruṇā | bhagam | madhvaḥ | pavante | ūrmayaḥ || vidānāḥ | asya | śakma-bhiḥ ||9.7.8||

IAST: asmabhyaṁ rodasī rayim madhvo vājasya sātaye
Griffith: Heaven and Earth, riches of meath to win us wealth: Gain for us treasures and renown.
Devanāgarī: अस्मभ्यं रोदसी रयिं मध्वो वाजस्य सातये
pada pāṭha: asmabhyam | rodasī iti | rayim | madhvaḥ | vājasya | sātaye || śravaḥ | vasūni | sam | jitam ||9.7.9||

IAST: śravo vasūni saṁ jitam
Griffith: Gain for us treasures and renown.
pada pāṭha: asmabhyam | rodasī iti | rayim | madhvaḥ | vājasya | sātaye || śravaḥ | vasūni | sam | jitam ||9.7.9||

IAST: ete somā abhi priyam indrasya kāmam akṣaran
Griffith: OBEYING Indra's dear desire these Soma juices have flowed forth,
pada pāṭha: ete | somāḥ | abhi | priyam | indrasya | kāmam | akṣaran || vardhantaḥ | asya | vīryam ||9.8.1||

IAST: vardhanto asya vīryam
Griffith: Increasing his heroic might.
pada pāṭha: ete | somāḥ | abhi | priyam | indrasya | kāmam | akṣaran || vardhantaḥ | asya | vīryam ||9.8.1||

IAST: punānāsaś camūṣado gacchanto vāyum aśvinā
Griffith: Laid in the bowl, pure-flowing on to Vayu and the Asvins, may
pada pāṭha: punānāsaḥ | camū-sadaḥ | gacchantaḥ | vāyum | aśvinā || te | naḥ | dhāntu | su-vīryam ||9.8.2||

IAST: te no dhāntu suvīryam
Griffith: These give us great heroic strength.
pada pāṭha: punānāsaḥ | camū-sadaḥ | gacchantaḥ | vāyum | aśvinā || te | naḥ | dhāntu | su-vīryam ||9.8.2||

IAST: indrasya soma rādhase punāno hārdi codaya
Griffith: Soma, as thou art purified, incite to bounty Indra's heart,
Devanāgarī: इन्द्रस्य सोम राधसे पुनानो हार्दि चोदय
pada pāṭha: indrasya | soma | rādhase | punānaḥ | hārdi | codaya || r̥tasya | yonim | ā-sadam ||9.8.3||

IAST: ṛtasya yonim āsadam
Griffith: To sit in place of sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: indrasya | soma | rādhase | punānaḥ | hārdi | codaya || r̥tasya | yonim | ā-sadam ||9.8.3||

IAST: mṛjanti tvā daśa kṣipo hinvanti sapta dhītayaḥ
Griffith: The ten swift fingers deck thee forth, seven ministers impel thee on:
Devanāgarī: मृजन्ति त्वा दश क्षिपो हिन्वन्ति सप्त धीतयः
pada pāṭha: mr̥janti | tvā | daśa | kṣipaḥ | hinvanti | sapta | dhītayaḥ || anu | viprāḥ | amādiṣuḥ ||9.8.4||

IAST: anu viprā amādiṣuḥ
Griffith: The sages have rejoiced in thee.
pada pāṭha: mr̥janti | tvā | daśa | kṣipaḥ | hinvanti | sapta | dhītayaḥ || anu | viprāḥ | amādiṣuḥ ||9.8.4||

IAST: devebhyas tvā madāya kaṁ sṛjānam ati meṣyaḥ
Griffith: When through the filter thou art poured, we clothe thee with a robe of milk
pada pāṭha: devebhyaḥ | tvā | madāya | kam | sr̥jānam | ati | meṣyaḥ || sam | gobhiḥ | vāsayāmasi ||9.8.5||

IAST: saṁ gobhir vāsayāmasi
Griffith: To be a gladdening draught for Gods.
pada pāṭha: devebhyaḥ | tvā | madāya | kam | sr̥jānam | ati | meṣyaḥ || sam | gobhiḥ | vāsayāmasi ||9.8.5||

IAST: punānaḥ kalaśeṣv ā vastrāṇy aruṣo hariḥ
Griffith: When purified within the jars, Soma, brightred and golden-hued,
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | kalaśeṣu | ā | vastrāṇi | aruṣaḥ | hariḥ || pari | gavyāni | avyata ||9.8.6||

IAST: pari gavyāny avyata
Griffith: Hath clothed him with a robe of milk.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | kalaśeṣu | ā | vastrāṇi | aruṣaḥ | hariḥ || pari | gavyāni | avyata ||9.8.6||

IAST: maghona ā pavasva no jahi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ
Griffith: Flow on to us and make us rich. Drive all our enemies away. O Indu, flow into thy Friend.
Devanāgarī: मघोन आ पवस्व नो जहि विश्वा अप द्विषः
pada pāṭha: maghonaḥ | ā | pavasva | naḥ | jahi | viśvāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ || indo iti | sakhāyam | ā | viśa ||9.8.7||

IAST: indo sakhāyam ā viśa
Griffith: O Indu, flow into thy Friend.
pada pāṭha: maghonaḥ | ā | pavasva | naḥ | jahi | viśvāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ || indo iti | sakhāyam | ā | viśa ||9.8.7||

IAST: vṛṣṭiṁ divaḥ pari srava dyumnam pṛthivyā adhi
Griffith: Send down the rain from heaven, a stream of opulence from earth.
Devanāgarī: वृष्टिं दिवः परि स्रव द्युम्नं पृथिव्या अधि
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣṭim | divaḥ | pari | srava | dyumnam | pr̥thivyāḥ | adhi || sahaḥ | naḥ | soma | pr̥t-su | dhāḥ ||9.8.8||

IAST: saho naḥ soma pṛtsu dhāḥ
Griffith: Give us, O Soma, victory in war.
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣṭim | divaḥ | pari | srava | dyumnam | pr̥thivyāḥ | adhi || sahaḥ | naḥ | soma | pr̥t-su | dhāḥ ||9.8.8||

IAST: nṛcakṣasaṁ tvā vayam indrapītaṁ svarvidam
Griffith: May we obtain thee, Indra's drink, who viewest men and findest light,
pada pāṭha: nr̥-cakṣasam | tvā | vayam | indra-pītam | svaḥ-vidam || bhakṣīmahi | pra-jām | iṣam ||9.8.9||

IAST: bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam
Griffith: Gain thee, and progeny and food.
pada pāṭha: nr̥-cakṣasam | tvā | vayam | indra-pītam | svaḥ-vidam || bhakṣīmahi | pra-jām | iṣam ||9.8.9||

IAST: pari priyā divaḥ kavir vayāṁsi naptyor hitaḥ
Griffith: I. THE Sage of Heaven whose heart is wise, when laid between both hands and pressed,
pada pāṭha: pari | priyā | divaḥ | kaviḥ | vayāṁsi | naptyoḥ | hitaḥ || suvānaḥ | yāti | kavi-kratuḥ ||9.9.1||

IAST: suvāno yāti kavikratuḥ
Griffith: Sends us delightful powers of life.
pada pāṭha: pari | priyā | divaḥ | kaviḥ | vayāṁsi | naptyoḥ | hitaḥ || suvānaḥ | yāti | kavi-kratuḥ ||9.9.1||

IAST: pra-pra kṣayāya panyase janāya juṣṭo adruhe
Griffith: On, onward to a glorious home; dear to the people void of guile,
Devanāgarī: प्रप्र क्षयाय पन्यसे जनाय जुष्टो अद्रुहे
pada pāṭha: pra-pra | kṣayāya | panyase | janāya | juṣṭaḥ | adruhe || vītī | arṣa | caniṣṭhayā ||9.9.2||

IAST: vīty arṣa caniṣṭhayā
Griffith: With excellent enjoyment, flow.
pada pāṭha: pra-pra | kṣayāya | panyase | janāya | juṣṭaḥ | adruhe || vītī | arṣa | caniṣṭhayā ||9.9.2||

IAST: sa sūnur mātarā śucir jāto jāte arocayat
Griffith: He, the bright Son, when born illumed his Parents who had sprung to life,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | sūnuḥ | mātarā | śuciḥ | jātaḥ | jāte iti | arocayat || mahān | mahī iti | r̥ta-vr̥dhā ||9.9.3||

IAST: mahān mahī ṛtāvṛdhā
Griffith: Great Son great Strengtheners of Law.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | sūnuḥ | mātarā | śuciḥ | jātaḥ | jāte iti | arocayat || mahān | mahī iti | r̥ta-vr̥dhā ||9.9.3||

IAST: sa sapta dhītibhir hito nadyo ajinvad adruhaḥ
Griffith: Urged by the seven devotions he hath stirred the guileless rivers which
pada pāṭha: saḥ | sapta | dhīti-bhiḥ | hitaḥ | nadyaḥ | ajinvat | adruhaḥ || yāḥ | ekam | akṣi | vavr̥dhuḥ ||9.9.4||

IAST: yā ekam akṣi vāvṛdhuḥ
Griffith: Have magnified the Single Eye.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | sapta | dhīti-bhiḥ | hitaḥ | nadyaḥ | ajinvat | adruhaḥ || yāḥ | ekam | akṣi | vavr̥dhuḥ ||9.9.4||

IAST: tā abhi santam astṛtam mahe yuvānam ā dadhuḥ
Griffith: These helped to might theYouthful One, high over all, invincible,
Devanāgarī: ता अभि सन्तमस्तृतं महे युवानमा दधुः
pada pāṭha: tāḥ | abhi | santam | astr̥tam | mahe | yuvānam | ā | dadhuḥ || indum | indra | tava | vrate ||9.9.5||

IAST: indum indra tava vrate
Griffith: Even Indu, Indra! in thy law.
pada pāṭha: tāḥ | abhi | santam | astr̥tam | mahe | yuvānam | ā | dadhuḥ || indum | indra | tava | vrate ||9.9.5||

IAST: abhi vahnir amartyaḥ sapta paśyati vāvahiḥ
Griffith: The immortal Courser, good to draw, looks down upon the Seven: the fount
pada pāṭha: abhi | vahniḥ | amartyaḥ | sapta | paśyati | vāvahiḥ || kriviḥ | devīḥ | atarpayat ||9.9.6||

IAST: krivir devīr atarpayat
Griffith: Hath satisfied the Goddesses
pada pāṭha: abhi | vahniḥ | amartyaḥ | sapta | paśyati | vāvahiḥ || kriviḥ | devīḥ | atarpayat ||9.9.6||

IAST: avā kalpeṣu naḥ pumas tamāṁsi soma yodhyā
Griffith: Aid us in holy rites, O Man: O Pavamana, drive away
Devanāgarī: अवा कल्पेषु नः पुमस्तमांसि सोम योध्या
pada pāṭha: ava | kalpeṣu | naḥ | pumaḥ | tamāṁsi | soma | yodhyā || tāni | punāna | jaṅghanaḥ ||9.9.7||

IAST: tāni punāna jaṅghanaḥ
Griffith: Dark shades that must be met in fight.
pada pāṭha: ava | kalpeṣu | naḥ | pumaḥ | tamāṁsi | soma | yodhyā || tāni | punāna | jaṅghanaḥ ||9.9.7||

IAST: nū navyase navīyase sūktāya sādhayā pathaḥ
Griffith: Make the paths ready for a hymn newer and newer evermore:
Devanāgarī: नू नव्यसे नवीयसे सूक्ताय साधया पथः
pada pāṭha: nu | navyase | navīyase | su-uktāya | sādhaya | pathaḥ || pratna-vat | rocaya | rucaḥ ||9.9.8||

IAST: pratnavad rocayā rucaḥ
Griffith: Make the lights shine as erst they shone.
pada pāṭha: nu | navyase | navīyase | su-uktāya | sādhaya | pathaḥ || pratna-vat | rocaya | rucaḥ ||9.9.8||

IAST: pavamāna mahi śravo gām aśvaṁ rāsi vīravat
Griffith: Give, Pavamana, high renown, give kine and steeds and hero sons:
Devanāgarī: पवमान महि श्रवो गामश्वं रासि वीरवत्
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | mahi | śravaḥ | gām | aśvam | rāsi | vīra-vat || sana | medhām | sanā | svariti svaḥ ||9.9.9||

IAST: sanā medhāṁ sanā svaḥ
Griffith: Win for us wisdom, win the light.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | mahi | śravaḥ | gām | aśvam | rāsi | vīra-vat || sana | medhām | sanā | svariti svaḥ ||9.9.9||

IAST: pra svānāso rathā ivārvanto na śravasyavaḥ
Griffith: LIKE cars that thunder on their way, like coursers eager for renown,
Devanāgarī: प्र स्वानासो रथा इवार्वन्तो न श्रवस्यवः
pada pāṭha: pra | svānāsaḥ | rathāḥ-iva | arvantaḥ | na | śravasyavaḥ || somāsaḥ | rāye | akramuḥ ||9.10.1||

IAST: somāso rāye akramuḥ
Griffith: Have Soma-drops flowed forth for wealth.
pada pāṭha: pra | svānāsaḥ | rathāḥ-iva | arvantaḥ | na | śravasyavaḥ || somāsaḥ | rāye | akramuḥ ||9.10.1||

IAST: hinvānāso rathā iva dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ
Griffith: Forth have they rushed from holding hands, like chariots that are urged to speed,
pada pāṭha: hinvānāsaḥ | rathāḥ-iva | dadhanvire | gabhastyoḥ || bharāsaḥ | kāriṇām-iva ||9.10.2||

IAST: bharāsaḥ kāriṇām iva
Griffith: Like joyful songs of singing-men.
pada pāṭha: hinvānāsaḥ | rathāḥ-iva | dadhanvire | gabhastyoḥ || bharāsaḥ | kāriṇām-iva ||9.10.2||

IAST: rājāno na praśastibhiḥ somāso gobhir añjate
Griffith: The Somas deck themselves with milk, as Kings are graced with eulogies,
pada pāṭha: rājānaḥ | na | praśasti-bhiḥ | somāsaḥ | gobhiḥ | añjate || yajñaḥ | na | sapta | dhātr̥-bhiḥ ||9.10.3||

IAST: yajño na sapta dhātṛbhiḥ
Griffith: And, with seven priests, the sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: rājānaḥ | na | praśasti-bhiḥ | somāsaḥ | gobhiḥ | añjate || yajñaḥ | na | sapta | dhātr̥-bhiḥ ||9.10.3||

IAST: pari suvānāsa indavo madāya barhaṇā girā
Griffith: Pressed for the gladdening draught, the drops flow forth abundantly with song,
Devanāgarī: परि सुवानास इन्दवो मदाय बर्हणा गिरा
pada pāṭha: pari | suvānāsaḥ | indavaḥ | madāya | barhaṇā | girā || sutāḥ | arṣanti | dhārayā ||9.10.4||

IAST: sutā arṣanti dhārayā
Griffith: The Soma juices in a stream.
pada pāṭha: pari | suvānāsaḥ | indavaḥ | madāya | barhaṇā | girā || sutāḥ | arṣanti | dhārayā ||9.10.4||

IAST: āpānāso vivasvato jananta uṣaso bhagam
Griffith: Winning Vivasvan's glory and producing Morning's light, the Suns
pada pāṭha: āpānāsaḥ | vivasvataḥ | janantaḥ | uṣasaḥ | bhagam || sūrāḥ | aṇvam | vi | tanvate ||9.10.5||

IAST: sūrā aṇvaṁ vi tanvate
Griffith: Pass through the openings of the cloth.
pada pāṭha: āpānāsaḥ | vivasvataḥ | janantaḥ | uṣasaḥ | bhagam || sūrāḥ | aṇvam | vi | tanvate ||9.10.5||

IAST: apa dvārā matīnām pratnā ṛṇvanti kāravaḥ
Griffith: The singing-men of ancient time open the doors of sacred songs,-
Devanāgarī: अप द्वारा मतीनां प्रत्ना ऋण्वन्ति कारवः
pada pāṭha: apa | dvārā | matīnām | pratnāḥ | r̥ṇvanti | kāravaḥ || vr̥ṣṇaḥ | harase | āyavaḥ ||9.10.6||

IAST: vṛṣṇo harasa āyavaḥ
Griffith: Men, for the mighty to accept.
pada pāṭha: apa | dvārā | matīnām | pratnāḥ | r̥ṇvanti | kāravaḥ || vr̥ṣṇaḥ | harase | āyavaḥ ||9.10.6||

IAST: samīcīnāsa āsate hotāraḥ saptajāmayaḥ
Griffith: Combined in close society sit the seven priests, the brother-hood,
pada pāṭha: sam-īcīnāsaḥ | āsate | hotāraḥ | sapta-jāmayaḥ || padam | ekasya | piprataḥ ||9.10.7||

IAST: padam ekasya piprataḥ
Griffith: Filling the station of the One.
pada pāṭha: sam-īcīnāsaḥ | āsate | hotāraḥ | sapta-jāmayaḥ || padam | ekasya | piprataḥ ||9.10.7||

IAST: nābhā nābhiṁ na ā dade cakṣuś cit sūrye sacā
Griffith: He gives us kinship with the Gods, and with the Sun unites our eye:
Devanāgarī: नाभा नाभिं न आ ददे चक्षुश्चित्सूर्ये सचा
pada pāṭha: nābhā | nābhim | naḥ | ā | dade | cakṣuḥ | cit | sūrye | sacā || kaveḥ | apatyam | ā | duhe ||9.10.8||

IAST: kaver apatyam ā duhe
Griffith: The Sage's ofrspring hath appeared.
pada pāṭha: nābhā | nābhim | naḥ | ā | dade | cakṣuḥ | cit | sūrye | sacā || kaveḥ | apatyam | ā | duhe ||9.10.8||

IAST: abhi priyā divas padam adhvaryubhir guhā hitam
Griffith: The Sun with his dear eye beholds that quarter of the heavens which priests
pada pāṭha: abhi | priyā | divaḥ | padam | adhvaryu-bhiḥ | guhā | hitam || sūraḥ | paśyati | cakṣasā ||9.10.9||

IAST: sūraḥ paśyati cakṣasā
Griffith: Have placed within the sacred cell.
pada pāṭha: abhi | priyā | divaḥ | padam | adhvaryu-bhiḥ | guhā | hitam || sūraḥ | paśyati | cakṣasā ||9.10.9||

IAST: upāsmai gāyatā naraḥ pavamānāyendave
Griffith: SING forth to Indu, O ye men, to him who is purified,
pada pāṭha: upa | asmai | gāyata | naraḥ | pavamānāya | indave || abhi | devān | iyakṣate ||9.11.1||

IAST: abhi devām̐ iyakṣate
Griffith: Fain to pay worship to the Gods.
pada pāṭha: upa | asmai | gāyata | naraḥ | pavamānāya | indave || abhi | devān | iyakṣate ||9.11.1||

IAST: abhi te madhunā payo 'tharvāṇo aśiśrayuḥ
Griffith: Together with thy pleasant juice the Atharvans have commingled milk,
pada pāṭha: abhi | te | madhunā | payaḥ | atharvāṇaḥ | aśiśrayuḥ || devam | devāya | deva-yu ||9.11.2||

IAST: devaṁ devāya devayu
Griffith: Divine, devoted to the God.
pada pāṭha: abhi | te | madhunā | payaḥ | atharvāṇaḥ | aśiśrayuḥ || devam | devāya | deva-yu ||9.11.2||

IAST: sa naḥ pavasva śaṁ gave śaṁ janāya śam arvate
Griffith: Bring, by thy flowing, weal to kine, weal to the people, weal to steeds.
Devanāgarī: स नः पवस्व शं गवे शं जनाय शमर्वते
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | pavasva | śam | gave | śam | janāya | śam | arvate || śam | rājan | oṣadhībhyaḥ ||9.11.3||

IAST: śaṁ rājann oṣadhībhyaḥ
Griffith: Weal, O thou King, to growing plants
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | pavasva | śam | gave | śam | janāya | śam | arvate || śam | rājan | oṣadhībhyaḥ ||9.11.3||

IAST: babhrave nu svatavase 'ruṇāya divispṛśe
Griffith: Sing a praise-song to Soma brown of hue, of independent might.
pada pāṭha: babhrave | nu | sva-tavase | aruṇāya | divi-spr̥śe || somāya | gātham | arcata ||9.11.4||

IAST: somāya gātham arcata
Griffith: The Red, who reaches up to heaven.
pada pāṭha: babhrave | nu | sva-tavase | aruṇāya | divi-spr̥śe || somāya | gātham | arcata ||9.11.4||

IAST: hastacyutebhir adribhiḥ sutaṁ somam punītana
Griffith: Purify Soma when effused with stones which bands move rapidly,
pada pāṭha: hasta-cyutebhiḥ | adri-bhiḥ | sutam | somam | punītana || madhau | ā | dhāvata | madhu ||9.11.5||

IAST: madhāv ā dhāvatā madhu
Griffith: And pour the sweet milk in the meath.
pada pāṭha: hasta-cyutebhiḥ | adri-bhiḥ | sutam | somam | punītana || madhau | ā | dhāvata | madhu ||9.11.5||

IAST: namased upa sīdata dadhned abhi śrīṇītana
Griffith: With humble homage draw ye nigh; blend the libation with the curds:
pada pāṭha: namasā | it | upa | sīdata | dadhnā | it | abhi | śrīṇītana || indum | indre | dadhātana ||9.11.6||

IAST: indum indre dadhātana
Griffith: To Indra offer Indu up.
pada pāṭha: namasā | it | upa | sīdata | dadhnā | it | abhi | śrīṇītana || indum | indre | dadhātana ||9.11.6||

IAST: amitrahā vicarṣaṇiḥ pavasva soma śaṁ gave
Griffith: Soma, foe-que chief o'er men, doing the will of pour forth
Devanāgarī: अमित्रहा विचर्षणिः पवस्व सोम शं गवे
pada pāṭha: amitra-hā | vi-carṣaṇiḥ | pavasva | soma | śam | gave || devebhyaḥ | anukāma-kr̥t ||9.11.7||

IAST: devebhyo anukāmakṛt
Griffith: Prosperity upon our kine.
pada pāṭha: amitra-hā | vi-carṣaṇiḥ | pavasva | soma | śam | gave || devebhyaḥ | anukāma-kr̥t ||9.11.7||

IAST: indrāya soma pātave madāya pari ṣicyase
Griffith: Heart-knower, Sovran of the heart, thou art effused,
Devanāgarī: इन्द्राय सोम पातवे मदाय परि षिच्यसे
pada pāṭha: indrāya | soma | pātave | madāya | pari | sicyase || manaḥ-cit | manasaḥ | patiḥ ||9.11.8||

IAST: manaścin manasas patiḥ
Griffith: O Soma, that Indra may drink thee and rejoice.
pada pāṭha: indrāya | soma | pātave | madāya | pari | sicyase || manaḥ-cit | manasaḥ | patiḥ ||9.11.8||

IAST: pavamāna suvīryaṁ rayiṁ soma rirīhi naḥ
Griffith: O Soma Pavamana, give us riches and heroic strength,-
Devanāgarī: पवमान सुवीर्यं रयिं सोम रिरीहि नः
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | su-vīryam | rayim | soma | rirīhi | naḥ || indo iti | indreṇa | naḥ | yujā ||9.11.9||

IAST: indav indreṇa no yujā
Griffith: Indu! with. Indra for ally.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | su-vīryam | rayim | soma | rirīhi | naḥ || indo iti | indreṇa | naḥ | yujā ||9.11.9||

IAST: somā asṛgram indavaḥ sutā ṛtasya sādane
Griffith: To Indra have the Soma drops, exceeding rich in sweets, been poured,
pada pāṭha: somāḥ | asr̥gram | indavaḥ | sutāḥ | r̥tasya | sadane || indrāya | madhumat-tamāḥ ||9.12.1||

IAST: indrāya madhumattamāḥ
Griffith: Shed in the seat of sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: somāḥ | asr̥gram | indavaḥ | sutāḥ | r̥tasya | sadane || indrāya | madhumat-tamāḥ ||9.12.1||

IAST: abhi viprā anūṣata gāvo vatsaṁ na mātaraḥ
Griffith: As mother kine low to their calves, to Indra have the sages called,
Devanāgarī: अभि विप्रा अनूषत गावो वत्सं न मातरः
pada pāṭha: abhi | viprāḥ | anūṣata | gāvaḥ | vatsam | na | mātaraḥ || indram | somasya | pītaye ||9.12.2||

IAST: indraṁ somasya pītaye
Griffith: Called him to drink the Soma juice.
pada pāṭha: abhi | viprāḥ | anūṣata | gāvaḥ | vatsam | na | mātaraḥ || indram | somasya | pītaye ||9.12.2||

IAST: madacyut kṣeti sādane sindhor ūrmā vipaścit
Griffith: In the stream's wave wise Soma dwells, distilling rapture, in his seat,
pada pāṭha: mada-cyut | kṣeti | sadane | sindhoḥ | ūrmā | vipaḥ-cit || somaḥ | gaurī iti | adhi | śritaḥ ||9.12.3||

IAST: somo gaurī adhi śritaḥ
Griffith: Resting upon a wiId-cow's hide.
pada pāṭha: mada-cyut | kṣeti | sadane | sindhoḥ | ūrmā | vipaḥ-cit || somaḥ | gaurī iti | adhi | śritaḥ ||9.12.3||

IAST: divo nābhā vicakṣaṇo 'vyo vāre mahīyate
Griffith: Far-sighted Soma, Sage and Seer, is worshipped in the central point
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | nābhā | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | avyaḥ | vāre | mahīyate || somaḥ | yaḥ | su-kratuḥ | kaviḥ ||9.12.4||

IAST: somo yaḥ sukratuḥ kaviḥ
Griffith: Of heaven, the straining-cloth of wool.
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | nābhā | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | avyaḥ | vāre | mahīyate || somaḥ | yaḥ | su-kratuḥ | kaviḥ ||9.12.4||

IAST: yaḥ somaḥ kalaśeṣv ām̐ antaḥ pavitra āhitaḥ
Griffith: In close embraces Indu holds Soma when poured within the jars.
Devanāgarī: यः सोमः कलशेष्वाँ अन्तः पवित्र आहितः
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | somaḥ | kalaśeṣu | ā | antariti | pavitre | ā-hitaḥ || tam | induḥ | pari | sasvaje ||9.12.5||

IAST: tam induḥ pari ṣasvaje
Griffith: And on the. purifying sieve.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | somaḥ | kalaśeṣu | ā | antariti | pavitre | ā-hitaḥ || tam | induḥ | pari | sasvaje ||9.12.5||

IAST: pra vācam indur iṣyati samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi
Griffith: Indu sends forth a voice on high to regions of the sea of air,
pada pāṭha: pra | vācam | induḥ | iṣyati | samudrasya | adhi | viṣṭapi || jinvan | kośam | madhu-ścutam ||9.12.6||

IAST: jinvan kośam madhuścutam
Griffith: Shaking the vase that drops with meath.
pada pāṭha: pra | vācam | induḥ | iṣyati | samudrasya | adhi | viṣṭapi || jinvan | kośam | madhu-ścutam ||9.12.6||

IAST: nityastotro vanaspatir dhīnām antaḥ sabardughaḥ
Griffith: The Tree whose praises never fail yields heavenly milk among our hymns,
pada pāṭha: nitya-stotraḥ | vanaspatiḥ | dhīnām | antariti | sabaḥ-dughaḥ || hinvānaḥ | mānuṣā | yugā ||9.12.7||

IAST: hinvāno mānuṣā yugā
Griffith: Urging men's generations on.
pada pāṭha: nitya-stotraḥ | vanaspatiḥ | dhīnām | antariti | sabaḥ-dughaḥ || hinvānaḥ | mānuṣā | yugā ||9.12.7||

IAST: abhi priyā divas padā somo hinvāno arṣati
Griffith: The Wise One, with the Sage's stream, the Soma urged to speed, flows on
Devanāgarī: अभि प्रिया दिवस्पदा सोमो हिन्वानो अर्षति
pada pāṭha: abhi | priyā | divaḥ | padā | somaḥ | hinvānaḥ | arṣati || viprasya | dhārayā | kaviḥ ||9.12.8||

IAST: viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ
Griffith: To the dear places of the sky.
pada pāṭha: abhi | priyā | divaḥ | padā | somaḥ | hinvānaḥ | arṣati || viprasya | dhārayā | kaviḥ ||9.12.8||

IAST: ā pavamāna dhāraya rayiṁ sahasravarcasam
Griffith: O Pavamana, bring us wealth bright with a thousand splendours. Yea.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavamāna | dhāraya | rayim | sahasra-varcasam || asme iti | indo iti | su-ābhuvam ||9.12.9||

IAST: asme indo svābhuvam
Griffith: O Indu, give us ready help.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavamāna | dhāraya | rayim | sahasra-varcasam || asme iti | indo iti | su-ābhuvam ||9.12.9||

IAST: somaḥ punāno arṣati sahasradhāro atyaviḥ
Griffith: PASSED through, the fleece in thousand streams the Soma, purified, flows on
pada pāṭha: somaḥ | punānaḥ | arṣati | sahasra-dhāraḥ | ati-aviḥ || vāyoḥ | indrasya | niḥ-kr̥tam ||9.13.1||

IAST: vāyor indrasya niṣkṛtam
Griffith: To Indra's, Viyu's special place.
pada pāṭha: somaḥ | punānaḥ | arṣati | sahasra-dhāraḥ | ati-aviḥ || vāyoḥ | indrasya | niḥ-kr̥tam ||9.13.1||

IAST: pavamānam avasyavo vipram abhi pra gāyata
Griffith: Sing forth, ye men who long for help, to Pavamana, to the Sage,
pada pāṭha: pavamānam | avasyavaḥ | vipram | abhi | pra | gāyata || susvāṇam | deva-vītaye ||9.13.2||

IAST: suṣvāṇaṁ devavītaye
Griffith: Effused to entertain the Gods.
pada pāṭha: pavamānam | avasyavaḥ | vipram | abhi | pra | gāyata || susvāṇam | deva-vītaye ||9.13.2||

IAST: pavante vājasātaye somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ
Griffith: The Soma-drops with thousand powers are purified for victory,
pada pāṭha: pavante | vāja-sātaye | somāḥ | sahasra-pājasaḥ || gr̥ṇānāḥ | deva-vītaye ||9.13.3||

IAST: gṛṇānā devavītaye
Griffith: Hymned to become the feast of Gods.
pada pāṭha: pavante | vāja-sātaye | somāḥ | sahasra-pājasaḥ || gr̥ṇānāḥ | deva-vītaye ||9.13.3||

IAST: uta no vājasātaye pavasva bṛhatīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: Yea, as thou flowest bring great store of food that we may win the spoil
pada pāṭha: uta | naḥ | vāja-sātaye | pavasva | br̥hatīḥ | iṣaḥ || dyu-mat | indo iti | su-vīryam ||9.13.4||

IAST: dyumad indo suvīryam
Griffith: Indu, bring splendid manly might.
pada pāṭha: uta | naḥ | vāja-sātaye | pavasva | br̥hatīḥ | iṣaḥ || dyu-mat | indo iti | su-vīryam ||9.13.4||

IAST: te naḥ sahasriṇaṁ rayim pavantām ā suvīryam
Griffith: May they in flowing give us wealth in thousands, and heroic power,-
Devanāgarī: ते नः सहस्रिणं रयिं पवन्तामा सुवीर्यम्
pada pāṭha: te | naḥ | sahasriṇam | rayim | pavantām | ā | su-vīryam || suvānāḥ | devāsaḥ | indavaḥ ||9.13.5||

IAST: suvānā devāsa indavaḥ
Griffith: These Godlike Soma-drops effused.
pada pāṭha: te | naḥ | sahasriṇam | rayim | pavantām | ā | su-vīryam || suvānāḥ | devāsaḥ | indavaḥ ||9.13.5||

IAST: atyā hiyānā na hetṛbhir asṛgraṁ vājasātaye
Griffith: Like coursers by their drivers urged, they were poured forth, for victory,
pada pāṭha: atyāḥ | hiyānāḥ | na | hetr̥-bhiḥ | asr̥gram | vāja-sātaye || vi | vāram | avyam | āśavaḥ ||9.13.6||

IAST: vi vāram avyam āśavaḥ
Griffith: Swift through the woollen straining-cloth.
pada pāṭha: atyāḥ | hiyānāḥ | na | hetr̥-bhiḥ | asr̥gram | vāja-sātaye || vi | vāram | avyam | āśavaḥ ||9.13.6||

IAST: vāśrā arṣantīndavo 'bhi vatsaṁ na dhenavaḥ
Griffith: Noisily flow the Soma-drops, like milch-kine lowing to their calves:
pada pāṭha: vāśrāḥ | arṣanti | indavaḥ | abhi | vatsam | na | dhenavaḥ || dadhanvire | gabhastyoḥ ||9.13.7||

IAST: dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ
Griffith: They have run forth from both the hands.
pada pāṭha: vāśrāḥ | arṣanti | indavaḥ | abhi | vatsam | na | dhenavaḥ || dadhanvire | gabhastyoḥ ||9.13.7||

IAST: juṣṭa indrāya matsaraḥ pavamāna kanikradat
Griffith: As Gladdener whom Indra loves, O Pavamana, with a roar
pada pāṭha: juṣṭaḥ | indrāya | matsaraḥ | pavamāna | kanikradat || viśvāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ | jahi ||9.13.8||

IAST: viśvā apa dviṣo jahi
Griffith: Drive all our enemies away.
pada pāṭha: juṣṭaḥ | indrāya | matsaraḥ | pavamāna | kanikradat || viśvāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ | jahi ||9.13.8||

IAST: apaghnanto arāvṇaḥ pavamānāḥ svardṛśaḥ
Griffith: O Pavamamas, driving off the godless, looking on the light,
pada pāṭha: apa-ghnantaḥ | arāvṇaḥ | pavamānāḥ | svaḥ-dr̥śaḥ || yonau | r̥tasya | sīdata ||9.13.9||

IAST: yonāv ṛtasya sīdata
Griffith: Sit in the place of sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: apa-ghnantaḥ | arāvṇaḥ | pavamānāḥ | svaḥ-dr̥śaḥ || yonau | r̥tasya | sīdata ||9.13.9||

IAST: pari prāsiṣyadat kaviḥ sindhor ūrmāv adhi śritaḥ
Griffith: REPOSING on the river's wave the Sage hath widely flowed around,
pada pāṭha: pari | pra | asisyadat | kaviḥ | sindhoḥ | ūrmau | adhi | śritaḥ || kāram | bibhrat | puru-spr̥ham ||9.14.1||

IAST: kāram bibhrat puruspṛham
Griffith: Bearing the hymn which many love.
pada pāṭha: pari | pra | asisyadat | kaviḥ | sindhoḥ | ūrmau | adhi | śritaḥ || kāram | bibhrat | puru-spr̥ham ||9.14.1||

IAST: girā yadī sabandhavaḥ pañca vrātā apasyavaḥ
Griffith: When the Five kindred Companies, active in duty, with the song
Devanāgarī: गिरा यदी सबन्धवः पञ्च व्राता अपस्यवः
pada pāṭha: girā | yadi | sa-bandhavaḥ | pañca | vrātāḥ | apasyavaḥ || pari-kr̥ṇvanti | dharṇasim ||9.14.2||

IAST: pariṣkṛṇvanti dharṇasim
Griffith: Establish him, the Powerful,
pada pāṭha: girā | yadi | sa-bandhavaḥ | pañca | vrātāḥ | apasyavaḥ || pari-kr̥ṇvanti | dharṇasim ||9.14.2||

IAST: ād asya śuṣmiṇo rase viśve devā amatsata
Griffith: Then in his juice whose strength is great, have all the Gods rejoiced themselves,
Devanāgarī: आदस्य शुष्मिणो रसे विश्वे देवा अमत्सत
pada pāṭha: āt | asya | śuṣmiṇaḥ | rase | viśve | devāḥ | amatsata || yadi | gobhiḥ | vasāyate ||9.14.3||

IAST: yadī gobhir vasāyate
Griffith: When he hath clothed him in the milk.
pada pāṭha: āt | asya | śuṣmiṇaḥ | rase | viśve | devāḥ | amatsata || yadi | gobhiḥ | vasāyate ||9.14.3||

IAST: niriṇāno vi dhāvati jahac charyāṇi tānvā
Griffith: Freeing himself he flows away, leaving his body's severed limbs,
pada pāṭha: ni-riṇānaḥ | vi | dhāvati | jahat | śaryāṇi | tānvā || atra | sam | jighnate | yujā ||9.14.4||

IAST: atrā saṁ jighnate yujā
Griffith: And meets his own Companion here.
pada pāṭha: ni-riṇānaḥ | vi | dhāvati | jahat | śaryāṇi | tānvā || atra | sam | jighnate | yujā ||9.14.4||

IAST: naptībhir yo vivasvataḥ śubhro na māmṛje yuvā
Griffith: He by the daughters of the priest, like a fair youth, hath been adorned,
Devanāgarī: नप्तीभिर्यो विवस्वतः शुभ्रो न मामृजे युवा
pada pāṭha: naptībhiḥ | yaḥ | vivasvataḥ | śubhraḥ | na | mamr̥je | yuvā || gāḥ | kr̥ṇvānaḥ | na | niḥ-nijam ||9.14.5||

IAST: gāḥ kṛṇvāno na nirṇijam
Griffith: Making the milk, as 'twere, his robe.
pada pāṭha: naptībhiḥ | yaḥ | vivasvataḥ | śubhraḥ | na | mamr̥je | yuvā || gāḥ | kr̥ṇvānaḥ | na | niḥ-nijam ||9.14.5||

IAST: ati śritī tiraścatā gavyā jigāty aṇvyā
Griffith: O'er the fine fingers, through desire of milk, in winding course he goes,
pada pāṭha: ati | śritī | tiraścatā | gavyā | jigāti | aṇvyā || vagnum | iyarti | yam | vide ||9.14.6||

IAST: vagnum iyarti yaṁ vide
Griffith: And utters voice which he hath found.
pada pāṭha: ati | śritī | tiraścatā | gavyā | jigāti | aṇvyā || vagnum | iyarti | yam | vide ||9.14.6||

IAST: abhi kṣipaḥ sam agmata marjayantīr iṣas patim
Griffith: The nimble fingers have approached, adorning him the Lord of Strength:
pada pāṭha: abhi | kṣipaḥ | sam | agmata | marjayantīḥ | iṣaḥ | patim || pr̥ṣṭhā | gr̥bhṇata | vājinaḥ ||9.14.7||

IAST: pṛṣṭhā gṛbhṇata vājinaḥ
Griffith: They grasp the vigorous Courser's back.
pada pāṭha: abhi | kṣipaḥ | sam | agmata | marjayantīḥ | iṣaḥ | patim || pr̥ṣṭhā | gr̥bhṇata | vājinaḥ ||9.14.7||

IAST: pari divyāni marmṛśad viśvāni soma pārthivā
Griffith: Comprising all the treasures that are in the heavens and on the earth,
pada pāṭha: pari | divyāni | marmr̥śat | viśvāni | soma | pārthivā || vasūni | yāhi | asma-yuḥ ||9.14.8||

IAST: vasūni yāhy asmayuḥ
Griffith: Come, Soma, as our faithful Friend.
pada pāṭha: pari | divyāni | marmr̥śat | viśvāni | soma | pārthivā || vasūni | yāhi | asma-yuḥ ||9.14.8||

IAST: eṣa dhiyā yāty aṇvyā śūro rathebhir āśubhiḥ
Griffith: THROUGH the fine fingers, with the song, this Hero comes with rapid ears,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | dhiyā | yāti | aṇvyā | śūraḥ | rathebhiḥ | āśu-bhiḥ || gacchan | indrasya | niḥ-kr̥tam ||9.15.1||

IAST: gacchann indrasya niṣkṛtam
Griffith: Going to Indra's special place.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | dhiyā | yāti | aṇvyā | śūraḥ | rathebhiḥ | āśu-bhiḥ || gacchan | indrasya | niḥ-kr̥tam ||9.15.1||

IAST: eṣa purū dhiyāyate bṛhate devatātaye
Griffith: In holy thought he ponders much for the great worship of the Gods.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | puru | dhiyā-yate | br̥hate | deva-tātaye || yatra | amr̥tāsaḥ | āsate ||9.15.2||

IAST: yatrāmṛtāsa āsate
Griffith: Where the Immortals have their seat.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | puru | dhiyā-yate | br̥hate | deva-tātaye || yatra | amr̥tāsaḥ | āsate ||9.15.2||

IAST: eṣa hito vi nīyate 'ntaḥ śubhrāvatā pathā
Griffith: Like a good horse is he led out, when on the path that shines with light
Devanāgarī: एष हितो वि नीयतेऽन्तः शुभ्रावता पथा
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | hitaḥ | vi | nīyate | antariti | śubhra-vatā | pathā || yadi | tuñjanti | bhūrṇayaḥ ||9.15.3||

IAST: yadī tuñjanti bhūrṇayaḥ
Griffith: The mettled steeds exert their strength.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | hitaḥ | vi | nīyate | antariti | śubhra-vatā | pathā || yadi | tuñjanti | bhūrṇayaḥ ||9.15.3||

IAST: eṣa śṛṅgāṇi dodhuvac chiśīte yūthyo vṛṣā
Griffith: He brandishes his horns on high, and whets them Bull who leads the herd,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | śr̥ṅgāṇi | dodhuvat | śiśīte | yūthyaḥ | vr̥ṣā || nr̥mṇā | dadhānaḥ | ojasā ||9.15.4||

IAST: nṛmṇā dadhāna ojasā
Griffith: Doing with might heroic deeds.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | śr̥ṅgāṇi | dodhuvat | śiśīte | yūthyaḥ | vr̥ṣā || nr̥mṇā | dadhānaḥ | ojasā ||9.15.4||

IAST: eṣa rukmibhir īyate vājī śubhrebhir aṁśubhiḥ
Griffith: He moves, a vigorous Steed, adorned with beauteous rays of shining gold,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | rukmi-bhiḥ | īyate | vājī | śubhrebhiḥ | aṁśu-bhiḥ || patiḥ | sindhūnām | bhavan ||9.15.5||

IAST: patiḥ sindhūnām bhavan
Griffith: Becoming Sovran of the streams.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | rukmi-bhiḥ | īyate | vājī | śubhrebhiḥ | aṁśu-bhiḥ || patiḥ | sindhūnām | bhavan ||9.15.5||

IAST: eṣa vasūni pibdanā paruṣā yayivām̐ ati
Griffith: He, over places rough to pass, bringing rich treasures closely packed.
Devanāgarī: एष वसूनि पिब्दना परुषा ययिवाँ अति
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | vasūni | pibdanā | paruṣā | yayi-vān | ati || ava | śādeṣu | gacchati ||9.15.6||

IAST: ava śādeṣu gacchati
Griffith: Descends into the reservoirs.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | vasūni | pibdanā | paruṣā | yayi-vān | ati || ava | śādeṣu | gacchati ||9.15.6||

IAST: etam mṛjanti marjyam upa droṇeṣv āyavaḥ
Griffith: Men beautify him in the vats, him worthy to be beautified,
pada pāṭha: etam | mr̥janti | marjyam | upa | droṇeṣu | āyavaḥ || pra-cakrāṇam | mahīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.15.7||

IAST: pracakrāṇam mahīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: Him who brings forth abundant food.
pada pāṭha: etam | mr̥janti | marjyam | upa | droṇeṣu | āyavaḥ || pra-cakrāṇam | mahīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.15.7||

IAST: etam u tyaṁ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sapta dhītayaḥ
Griffith: Him, even him, the fingers ten and the seven songs make beautiful,
Devanāgarī: एतमु त्यं दश क्षिपो मृजन्ति सप्त धीतयः
pada pāṭha: etam | ūm̐ iti | tyam | daśa | kṣipaḥ | mr̥janti | sapta | dhītayaḥ || su-āyudham | madin-tamam ||9.15.8||

IAST: svāyudham madintamam
Griffith: Well-weaponed, best of gladdeners.
pada pāṭha: etam | ūm̐ iti | tyam | daśa | kṣipaḥ | mr̥janti | sapta | dhītayaḥ || su-āyudham | madin-tamam ||9.15.8||

IAST: pra te sotāra oṇyo rasam madāya ghṛṣvaye
Griffith: THE pressers from the Soma-press send forth thy juice for rapturous joy
Devanāgarī: प्र ते सोतार ओण्यो रसं मदाय घृष्वये
pada pāṭha: pra | te | sotāraḥ | oṇyoḥ | rasam | madāya | ghr̥ṣvaye || sargaḥ | na | takti | etaśaḥ ||9.16.1||

IAST: sargo na takty etaśaḥ
Griffith: The speckled sap runs like a flood.
pada pāṭha: pra | te | sotāraḥ | oṇyoḥ | rasam | madāya | ghr̥ṣvaye || sargaḥ | na | takti | etaśaḥ ||9.16.1||

IAST: kratvā dakṣasya rathyam apo vasānam andhasā
Griffith: With strength we follow through the sieve him who brings might and wins the kine,
pada pāṭha: kratvā | dakṣasya | rathyam | apaḥ | vasānam | andhasā || go-sām | aṇveṣu | saścima ||9.16.2||

IAST: goṣām aṇveṣu saścima
Griffith: Enrobed in water with his juice.
pada pāṭha: kratvā | dakṣasya | rathyam | apaḥ | vasānam | andhasā || go-sām | aṇveṣu | saścima ||9.16.2||

IAST: anaptam apsu duṣṭaraṁ somam pavitra ā sṛja
Griffith: Pour on the sieve the Soma, ne'er subdued in waters, waterless,
Devanāgarī: अनप्तमप्सु दुष्टरं सोमं पवित्र आ सृज
pada pāṭha: anaptam | ap-su | dustaram | somam | pavitre | ā | sr̥ja || punīhi | indrāya | pātave ||9.16.3||

IAST: punīhīndrāya pātave
Griffith: And make it pure for Indra's drink.
pada pāṭha: anaptam | ap-su | dustaram | somam | pavitre | ā | sr̥ja || punīhi | indrāya | pātave ||9.16.3||

IAST: pra punānasya cetasā somaḥ pavitre arṣati
Griffith: Moved by the purifier's thought, the Soma flows into the sieve:
Devanāgarī: प्र पुनानस्य चेतसा सोमः पवित्रे अर्षति
pada pāṭha: pra | punānasya | cetasā | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati || kratvā | sadha-stham | ā | asadat ||9.16.4||

IAST: kratvā sadhastham āsadat
Griffith: By wisdom it hath gained its home.
pada pāṭha: pra | punānasya | cetasā | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati || kratvā | sadha-stham | ā | asadat ||9.16.4||

IAST: pra tvā namobhir indava indra somā asṛkṣata
Griffith: With humble homage, Indra, have the Soma-drops flowed forth to thee,
Devanāgarī: प्र त्वा नमोभिरिन्दव इन्द्र सोमा असृक्षत
pada pāṭha: pra | tvā | namaḥ-bhiḥ | indavaḥ | indra | somāḥ | asr̥kṣata || mahe | bharāya | kāriṇaḥ ||9.16.5||

IAST: mahe bharāya kāriṇaḥ
Griffith: Contending for the glorious prize.
pada pāṭha: pra | tvā | namaḥ-bhiḥ | indavaḥ | indra | somāḥ | asr̥kṣata || mahe | bharāya | kāriṇaḥ ||9.16.5||

IAST: punāno rūpe avyaye viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ
Griffith: Purified in his fleecy garb, attaining every beauty, he
Devanāgarī: पुनानो रूपे अव्यये विश्वा अर्षन्नभि श्रियः
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | rūpe | avyavye | viśvāḥ | arṣan | abhi | śriyaḥ || śūraḥ | na | goṣu | tiṣṭhati ||9.16.6||

IAST: śūro na goṣu tiṣṭhati
Griffith: Stands, hero-like, amid the kine.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | rūpe | avyavye | viśvāḥ | arṣan | abhi | śriyaḥ || śūraḥ | na | goṣu | tiṣṭhati ||9.16.6||

IAST: divo na sānu pipyuṣī dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ
Griffith: Swelling, as 'twere, to heights of heaven, the stream of the creative juice
Devanāgarī: दिवो न सानु पिप्युषी धारा सुतस्य वेधसः
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | na | sānu | pipyuṣī | dhārā | sutasya | vedhasaḥ || vr̥thā | pavitre | arṣati ||9.16.7||

IAST: vṛthā pavitre arṣati
Griffith: Falls lightly on the cleansing sieve.
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | na | sānu | pipyuṣī | dhārā | sutasya | vedhasaḥ || vr̥thā | pavitre | arṣati ||9.16.7||

IAST: tvaṁ soma vipaścitaṁ tanā punāna āyuṣu
Griffith: Thus, Soma, purifying himwho knoweth song mid living men,
Devanāgarī: त्वं सोम विपश्चितं तना पुनान आयुषु
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | vipaḥ-citam | tanā | punānaḥ | āyuṣu || avyaḥ | vāram | vi | dhāvasi ||9.16.8||

IAST: avyo vāraṁ vi dhāvasi
Griffith: Thou wanderest through the cloth of wool.
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | vipaḥ-citam | tanā | punānaḥ | āyuṣu || avyaḥ | vāram | vi | dhāvasi ||9.16.8||

IAST: pra nimneneva sindhavo ghnanto vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ
Griffith: LIKE rivers down a steep descent, slaying the Vrtras, full of zeal,
Devanāgarī: प्र निम्नेनेव सिन्धवो घ्नन्तो वृत्राणि भूर्णयः
pada pāṭha: pra | nimena-iva | sindhavaḥ | ghnantaḥ | vr̥trāṇi | bhūrṇayaḥ || somāḥ | asr̥gram | āśavaḥ ||9.17.1||

IAST: somā asṛgram āśavaḥ
Griffith: The rapid Soma-streams have flowed.
pada pāṭha: pra | nimena-iva | sindhavaḥ | ghnantaḥ | vr̥trāṇi | bhūrṇayaḥ || somāḥ | asr̥gram | āśavaḥ ||9.17.1||

IAST: abhi suvānāsa indavo vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīm iva
Griffith: The drops of Soma juice effused fall like the rain upon the earth:
pada pāṭha: abhi | suvānāsaḥ | indavaḥ | vr̥ṣṭayaḥ | pr̥thivīm-iva || indram | somāsaḥ | akṣaran ||9.17.2||

IAST: indraṁ somāso akṣaran
Griffith: To Indra flow the Soma-streams.
pada pāṭha: abhi | suvānāsaḥ | indavaḥ | vr̥ṣṭayaḥ | pr̥thivīm-iva || indram | somāsaḥ | akṣaran ||9.17.2||

IAST: atyūrmir matsaro madaḥ somaḥ pavitre arṣati
Griffith: With swelling wave the gladdening drink, the Soma, flows into.the sieve,
pada pāṭha: ati-ūrmiḥ | matsaraḥ | madaḥ | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati || vi-ghnan | rakṣāṁsi | deva-yuḥ ||9.17.3||

IAST: vighnan rakṣāṁsi devayuḥ
Griffith: Loving the Gods and slaying fiends.
pada pāṭha: ati-ūrmiḥ | matsaraḥ | madaḥ | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati || vi-ghnan | rakṣāṁsi | deva-yuḥ ||9.17.3||

IAST: ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pari ṣicyate
Griffith: It hastens to the pitchers, poured upon the sieve it waxes strong
Devanāgarī: आ कलशेषु धावति पवित्रे परि षिच्यते
pada pāṭha: ā | kalaśeṣu | dhāvati | pavitre | pari | sicyate || ukthaiḥ | yajñeṣu | vardhate ||9.17.4||

IAST: ukthair yajñeṣu vardhate
Griffith: At sacrifices through the lauds.
pada pāṭha: ā | kalaśeṣu | dhāvati | pavitre | pari | sicyate || ukthaiḥ | yajñeṣu | vardhate ||9.17.4||

IAST: ati trī soma rocanā rohan na bhrājase divam
Griffith: Soma, thou shinest mounting heaven as 'twere above light's triple realm,
Devanāgarī: अति त्री सोम रोचना रोहन्न भ्राजसे दिवम्
pada pāṭha: ati | trī | soma | rocanā | rohan | na | bhrājase | divam || iṣṇan | sūryam | na | codayaḥ ||9.17.5||

IAST: iṣṇan sūryaṁ na codayaḥ
Griffith: And moving secm'st to speed the Sun.
pada pāṭha: ati | trī | soma | rocanā | rohan | na | bhrājase | divam || iṣṇan | sūryam | na | codayaḥ ||9.17.5||

IAST: abhi viprā anūṣata mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ
Griffith: To him, the head of sacnfice, singers and bards have sung their songs,
pada pāṭha: abhi | viprāḥ | anūṣata | mūrdhan | yajñasya | kāravaḥ || dadhānāḥ | cakṣasi | priyam ||9.17.6||

IAST: dadhānāś cakṣasi priyam
Griffith: Offering what he loves to see.
pada pāṭha: abhi | viprāḥ | anūṣata | mūrdhan | yajñasya | kāravaḥ || dadhānāḥ | cakṣasi | priyam ||9.17.6||

IAST: tam u tvā vājinaṁ naro dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ
Griffith: The men, the sages with their hymns, eager for help, deck thee strong &teed,
Devanāgarī: तमु त्वा वाजिनं नरो धीभिर्विप्रा अवस्यवः
pada pāṭha: tam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | vājinam | naraḥ | dhībhiḥ | viprāḥ | avasyavaḥ || mr̥janti | deva-tātaye ||9.17.7||

IAST: mṛjanti devatātaye
Griffith: Deck thee for service of the Gods.
pada pāṭha: tam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | vājinam | naraḥ | dhībhiḥ | viprāḥ | avasyavaḥ || mr̥janti | deva-tātaye ||9.17.7||

IAST: madhor dhārām anu kṣara tīvraḥ sadhastham āsadaḥ
Griffith: Flow onward to the stream of meath rest efficacious in thy home,
pada pāṭha: madhoḥ | dhārām | anu | kṣara | tīvraḥ | sadha-stham | ā | asadaḥ || cāruḥ | r̥tāya | pītaye ||9.17.8||

IAST: cārur ṛtāya pītaye
Griffith: Fair, to be drunk at sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: madhoḥ | dhārām | anu | kṣara | tīvraḥ | sadha-stham | ā | asadaḥ || cāruḥ | r̥tāya | pītaye ||9.17.8||

IAST: pari suvāno giriṣṭhāḥ pavitre somo akṣāḥ
Griffith: THOU, Soma, dweller on the hills, effused, hast flowed into the sieve,:
Devanāgarī: परि सुवानो गिरिष्ठाः पवित्रे सोमो अक्षाः
pada pāṭha: pari | suvānaḥ | giri-sthāḥ | pavitre | somaḥ | akṣāriti || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.1||

IAST: madeṣu sarvadhā asi
Griffith: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.
pada pāṭha: pari | suvānaḥ | giri-sthāḥ | pavitre | somaḥ | akṣāriti || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.1||

IAST: tvaṁ vipras tvaṁ kavir madhu pra jātam andhasaḥ
Griffith: Thou art a sacred Bard, a Sage; the meath is offipring of thy sap:
pada pāṭha: tvam | vipraḥ | tvam | kaviḥ | madhu | pra | jātam | andhasaḥ || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.2||

IAST: madeṣu sarvadhā asi
Griffith: All-bountcous art thou in carouse.
pada pāṭha: tvam | vipraḥ | tvam | kaviḥ | madhu | pra | jātam | andhasaḥ || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.2||

IAST: tava viśve sajoṣaso devāsaḥ pītim āśata
Griffith: All Deities of one accord have come that they may drink of thee:
pada pāṭha: tava | viśve | sa-joṣasaḥ | devāsaḥ | pītim | āśata || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.3||

IAST: madeṣu sarvadhā asi
Griffith: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.
pada pāṭha: tava | viśve | sa-joṣasaḥ | devāsaḥ | pītim | āśata || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.3||

IAST: ā yo viśvāni vāryā vasūni hastayor dadhe
Griffith: He who containeth in his hands all treasures much to be desired:
Devanāgarī: आ यो विश्वानि वार्या वसूनि हस्तयोर्दधे
pada pāṭha: ā | yaḥ | viśvāni | vāryā | vasūni | hastayoḥ | dadhe || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.4||

IAST: madeṣu sarvadhā asi
Griffith: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.
pada pāṭha: ā | yaḥ | viśvāni | vāryā | vasūni | hastayoḥ | dadhe || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.4||

IAST: ya ime rodasī mahī sam mātareva dohate
Griffith: Who milketh out this mighty Pair, the Earth and Heaven, like mother kine
Devanāgarī: य इमे रोदसी मही सं मातरेव दोहते
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | ime iti | rodasī iti | mahī iti | sam | mātarā-iva | dohate || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.5||

IAST: madeṣu sarvadhā asi
Griffith: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | ime iti | rodasī iti | mahī iti | sam | mātarā-iva | dohate || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.5||

IAST: pari yo rodasī ubhe sadyo vājebhir arṣati
Griffith: Who in a moment mightily floweth around these two world-halvcs:
Devanāgarī: परि यो रोदसी उभे सद्यो वाजेभिरर्षति
pada pāṭha: pari | yaḥ | rodasī iti | ubhe iti | sadyaḥ | vājebhiḥ | arṣati || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.6||

IAST: madeṣu sarvadhā asi
Griffith: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.
pada pāṭha: pari | yaḥ | rodasī iti | ubhe iti | sadyaḥ | vājebhiḥ | arṣati || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.6||

IAST: sa śuṣmī kalaśeṣv ā punāno acikradat
Griffith: The Strong One, being purified, hath in the pitchers cried aloud:
pada pāṭha: saḥ | śuṣmī | kalaśeṣu | ā | punānaḥ | acikradat || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.7||

IAST: madeṣu sarvadhā asi
Griffith: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | śuṣmī | kalaśeṣu | ā | punānaḥ | acikradat || madeṣu | sarva-dhāḥ | asi ||9.18.7||

IAST: yat soma citram ukthyaṁ divyam pārthivaṁ vasu
Griffith: O SOMA, being purified bring us the wondrous treasure, meet
pada pāṭha: yat | soma | citram | ukthyam | divyam | pārthivam | vasu || tat | naḥ | punānaḥ | ā | bhara ||9.19.1||

IAST: tan naḥ punāna ā bhara
Griffith: For lauds, that is in earth and heaven.
pada pāṭha: yat | soma | citram | ukthyam | divyam | pārthivam | vasu || tat | naḥ | punānaḥ | ā | bhara ||9.19.1||

IAST: yuvaṁ hi sthaḥ svarpatī indraś ca soma gopatī
Griffith: For ye Twain, Indra, Soma, are Lords of the light, Lords of the kine:
Devanāgarī: युवं हि स्थः स्वर्पती इन्द्रश्च सोम गोपती
pada pāṭha: yuvam | hi | sthaḥ | svarpatī iti svaḥ-patī | indraḥ | ca | soma | gopatī iti go-patī || īśānā | pipyatam | dhiyaḥ ||9.19.2||

IAST: īśānā pipyataṁ dhiyaḥ
Griffith: Great Rulers, prosper ye our songs.
pada pāṭha: yuvam | hi | sthaḥ | svarpatī iti svaḥ-patī | indraḥ | ca | soma | gopatī iti go-patī || īśānā | pipyatam | dhiyaḥ ||9.19.2||

IAST: vṛṣā punāna āyuṣu stanayann adhi barhiṣi
Griffith: The tawny Steer, while cleansed among the living, bellowing on the grass,
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣā | punānaḥ | āyuṣu | stanayan | adhi | barhiṣi || hariḥ | san | yonim | ā | asadat ||9.19.3||

IAST: hariḥ san yonim āsadat
Griffith: Hath sunk and settled in his home.
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣā | punānaḥ | āyuṣu | stanayan | adhi | barhiṣi || hariḥ | san | yonim | ā | asadat ||9.19.3||

IAST: avāvaśanta dhītayo vṛṣabhasyādhi retasi
Griffith: Over the Steer's productive flow the sacred songs were resonant,
pada pāṭha: avāvaśanta | dhītayaḥ | vr̥ṣabhasya | adhi | retasi || sūnoḥ | vatsasya | mātaraḥ ||9.19.4||

IAST: sūnor vatsasya mātaraḥ
Griffith: The mothers of the darling Son.
pada pāṭha: avāvaśanta | dhītayaḥ | vr̥ṣabhasya | adhi | retasi || sūnoḥ | vatsasya | mātaraḥ ||9.19.4||

IAST: kuvid vṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ punāno garbham ādadhat
Griffith: Hath he not, purified, impregned the kine whb long to meet their Lord,
pada pāṭha: kuvit | vr̥ṣaṇyantībhyaḥ | punānaḥ | garbham | ā-dadhat || yāḥ | śukram | duhate | payaḥ ||9.19.5||

IAST: yāḥ śukraṁ duhate payaḥ
Griffith: The kine who yield the shining milk?
pada pāṭha: kuvit | vr̥ṣaṇyantībhyaḥ | punānaḥ | garbham | ā-dadhat || yāḥ | śukram | duhate | payaḥ ||9.19.5||

IAST: upa śikṣāpatasthuṣo bhiyasam ā dhehi śatruṣu
Griffith: Bring near us those who stand aloof strike fear into our enemies:
pada pāṭha: upa | śikṣa | apa-tasthuṣaḥ | bhiyasam | ā | dhehi | śatruṣu || pavamāna | vidāḥ | rayim ||9.19.6||

IAST: pavamāna vidā rayim
Griffith: O Pavamana, find us wealth.
pada pāṭha: upa | śikṣa | apa-tasthuṣaḥ | bhiyasam | ā | dhehi | śatruṣu || pavamāna | vidāḥ | rayim ||9.19.6||

IAST: ni śatroḥ soma vṛṣṇyaṁ ni śuṣmaṁ ni vayas tira
Griffith: Soma, bring down the foeman's might, his vigorous strength and vital powe'r,
Devanāgarī: नि शत्रोः सोम वृष्ण्यं नि शुष्मं नि वयस्तिर
pada pāṭha: ni | śatroḥ | soma | vr̥ṣṇyam | ni | śuṣmam | ni | vayaḥ | tira || dūre | vā | sataḥ | anti | vā ||9.19.7||

IAST: dūre vā sato anti vā
Griffith: Whether he be afar or near.
pada pāṭha: ni | śatroḥ | soma | vr̥ṣṇyam | ni | śuṣmam | ni | vayaḥ | tira || dūre | vā | sataḥ | anti | vā ||9.19.7||

IAST: pra kavir devavītaye 'vyo vārebhir arṣati
Griffith: FORTH through the straining-cloth the Sage flows to the banquet of the Gods,
pada pāṭha: pra | kaviḥ | deva-vītaye | avyaḥ | vārebhiḥ | arṣati || sahvān | viśvāḥ | abhi | spr̥dhaḥ ||9.20.1||

IAST: sāhvān viśvā abhi spṛdhaḥ
Griffith: Subduing all our enemies.

Griffith: For he, as Pavamana, sends thousandfold treasure in the shape

pada pāṭha: saḥ | hi | sma | jaritr̥-bhyaḥ | ā | vājam | go-mantam | invati || pavamānaḥ | sahasriṇam ||9.20.2||

IAST: pavamānaḥ sahasriṇam
Griffith: Of cattle to the singing-men.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | hi | sma | jaritr̥-bhyaḥ | ā | vājam | go-mantam | invati || pavamānaḥ | sahasriṇam ||9.20.2||

IAST: pari viśvāni cetasā mṛśase pavase matī
Griffith: Thou graspest all things with thy mind, and purifiest thee with thoughts

pada pāṭha: pari | viśvāni | cetasā | mr̥śase | pavase | matī || saḥ | naḥ | soma | śravaḥ | vidaḥ ||9.20.3||

IAST: sa naḥ soma śravo vidaḥ
Griffith: As such, O Soma, find us fame.
pada pāṭha: pari | viśvāni | cetasā | mr̥śase | pavase | matī || saḥ | naḥ | soma | śravaḥ | vidaḥ ||9.20.3||

Griffith: Pour lofty glory on us, send sure riches to our liberal lords,
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | br̥hat | yaśaḥ | maghavat-bhyaḥ | dhruvam | rayim || iṣam | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | ā | bhara ||9.20.4||

IAST: iṣaṁ stotṛbhya ā bhara
Griffith: Bring food to those who sing thy praise.
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | br̥hat | yaśaḥ | maghavat-bhyaḥ | dhruvam | rayim || iṣam | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | ā | bhara ||9.20.4||

IAST: tvaṁ rājeva suvrato giraḥ somā viveśitha
Griffith: As thou art cleansed, O Wondrous Steed, O Soma, thou hast entered, like

pada pāṭha: tvam | rājā-iva | su-vrataḥ | giraḥ | soma | ā | viveśitha || punānaḥ | vahne | adbhuta ||9.20.5||

IAST: punāno vahne adbhuta
Griffith: A pious King, into the songs.
pada pāṭha: tvam | rājā-iva | su-vrataḥ | giraḥ | soma | ā | viveśitha || punānaḥ | vahne | adbhuta ||9.20.5||

IAST: sa vahnir apsu duṣṭaro mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ
Griffith: He, Soma, like a courser in the floods invincible, made clean

IAST: somaś camūṣu sīdati
Griffith: With hands, is resting in the jars.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vahniḥ | ap-su | dustaraḥ | mr̥jyamānaḥ | gabhastyoḥ || somaḥ | camūṣu | sīdati ||9.20.6||

IAST: krīḻur makho na maṁhayuḥ pavitraṁ soma gacchasi
Griffith: Disporting, like a liberal chief, thou goest, Soma, to the sieve,
Devanāgarī: क्रीळुर्मखो न मंहयुः पवित्रं सोम गच्छसि
pada pāṭha: krīḷuḥ | makhaḥ | na | maṁhayuḥ | pavitram | soma | gacchasi || dadhat | stotre | su-vīryam ||9.20.7||

IAST: dadhat stotre suvīryam
Griffith: Lending the laud a Hero's strength.
pada pāṭha: krīḷuḥ | makhaḥ | na | maṁhayuḥ | pavitram | soma | gacchasi || dadhat | stotre | su-vīryam ||9.20.7||

Griffith: To Indra flow these running drops, these Somas frolicsome in mood.
pada pāṭha: ete | dhāvanti | indavaḥ | somāḥ | indrāya | ghr̥ṣvayaḥ || matsarāsaḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ ||9.21.1||

IAST: matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ
Griffith: Exhilarating, finding light;
pada pāṭha: ete | dhāvanti | indavaḥ | somāḥ | indrāya | ghr̥ṣvayaḥ || matsarāsaḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ ||9.21.1||

IAST: pravṛṇvanto abhiyujaḥ suṣvaye varivovidaḥ
Griffith: Driving off foes, bestowing room upon the presser, willingly
pada pāṭha: pra-vr̥ṇvantaḥ | abhi-yujaḥ | susvaye | varivaḥ-vidaḥ || svayam | stotre | vayaḥ-kr̥taḥ ||9.21.2||

IAST: svayaṁ stotre vayaskṛtaḥ
Griffith: Bringing their praiser vitalforce.
pada pāṭha: pra-vr̥ṇvantaḥ | abhi-yujaḥ | susvaye | varivaḥ-vidaḥ || svayam | stotre | vayaḥ-kr̥taḥ ||9.21.2||

IAST: vṛthā krīḻanta indavaḥ sadhastham abhy ekam it
Griffith: Lightly disporting them, the drops flow to one common reservoir,

IAST: sindhor ūrmā vy akṣaran
Griffith: And fall into the river's wave.
pada pāṭha: vr̥thā | krīḷantaḥ | indavaḥ | sadha-stham | abhi | ekam | it || sindhoḥ | ūrmā | vi | akṣaran ||9.21.3||

IAST: ete viśvāni vāryā pavamānāsa āśata
Griffith: These Pavamanas have obtained all blessings much to be desired,
pada pāṭha: ete | viśvāni | vāryā | pavamānāsaḥ | āśata || hitāḥ | na | saptayaḥ | rathe ||9.21.4||

IAST: hitā na saptayo rathe
Griffith: Like coursers harnessed to a car.
pada pāṭha: ete | viśvāni | vāryā | pavamānāsaḥ | āśata || hitāḥ | na | saptayaḥ | rathe ||9.21.4||

IAST: āsmin piśaṅgam indavo dadhātā venam ādiśe
Griffith: With view to us, O Soma-drops, bestow his manifold desire
pada pāṭha: ā | asmin | piśaṅgam | indavaḥ | dadhāta | venam | ā-diśe || yaḥ | asmabhyam | arāvā ||9.21.5||

IAST: yo asmabhyam arāvā
Griffith: On him who yet hath given us naught.
pada pāṭha: ā | asmin | piśaṅgam | indavaḥ | dadhāta | venam | ā-diśe || yaḥ | asmabhyam | arāvā ||9.21.5||

IAST: ṛbhur na rathyaṁ navaṁ dadhātā ketam ādiśe
Griffith: Bring us our wish with this design, as a wright brings his new-wrought wheel:
pada pāṭha: r̥bhuḥ | na | rathyam | navam | dadhāta | ketam | ā-diśe || śukrāḥ | pavadhvam | arṇasā ||9.21.6||

IAST: śukrāḥ pavadhvam arṇasā
Griffith: Flow pure and shining with the stream.
pada pāṭha: r̥bhuḥ | na | rathyam | navam | dadhāta | ketam | ā-diśe || śukrāḥ | pavadhvam | arṇasā ||9.21.6||

Griffith: These drops have cried with resonant voice: like swift steeds they have run the course,

pada pāṭha: ete | ūm̐ iti | tye | avīvaśan | kāṣṭhām | vājinaḥ | akrata || sataḥ | pra | asāviṣuḥ | matim ||9.21.7||

IAST: sataḥ prāsāviṣur matim
Griffith: And roused the good man's hymn to life.
pada pāṭha: ete | ūm̐ iti | tye | avīvaśan | kāṣṭhām | vājinaḥ | akrata || sataḥ | pra | asāviṣuḥ | matim ||9.21.7||

Griffith: THESE rapid Soma-streams have stirred themselves to motion like strong steeds,

pada pāṭha: ete | somāsaḥ | āśavaḥ | rathāḥ-iva | pra | vājinaḥ || sargāḥ | sr̥ṣṭāḥ | aheṣata ||9.22.1||

IAST: sargāḥ sṛṣṭā aheṣata
Griffith: Like cars, like armies hurried forth.
pada pāṭha: ete | somāsaḥ | āśavaḥ | rathāḥ-iva | pra | vājinaḥ || sargāḥ | sr̥ṣṭāḥ | aheṣata ||9.22.1||

IAST: ete vātā ivoravaḥ parjanyasyeva vṛṣṭayaḥ
Griffith: Swift as wide winds they lightly move, like rain-storms of Parjanya, like
pada pāṭha: ete | vātāḥ-iva | uravaḥ | parjanyasya-iva | vr̥ṣṭayaḥ || agneḥ-iva | bhramāḥ | vr̥thā ||9.22.2||

IAST: agner iva bhramā vṛthā
Griffith: The flickering flames of burning fire.
pada pāṭha: ete | vātāḥ-iva | uravaḥ | parjanyasya-iva | vr̥ṣṭayaḥ || agneḥ-iva | bhramāḥ | vr̥thā ||9.22.2||

IAST: ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ
Griffith: These Soma juices, blent with curds, purified, skilled in sacred hymns,
pada pāṭha: ete | pūtāḥ | vipaḥ-citaḥ | somāsaḥ | dadhi-āśiraḥ || vipā | vi | ānaśuḥ | dhiyaḥ ||9.22.3||

IAST: vipā vy ānaśur dhiyaḥ
Griffith: Have gained by song their hearts'desire.
pada pāṭha: ete | pūtāḥ | vipaḥ-citaḥ | somāsaḥ | dadhi-āśiraḥ || vipā | vi | ānaśuḥ | dhiyaḥ ||9.22.3||

IAST: ete mṛṣṭā amartyāḥ sasṛvāṁso na śaśramuḥ

pada pāṭha: ete | mr̥ṣṭāḥ | amartyāḥ | sasr̥-vāṁsaḥ | na | śaśramuḥ || iyakṣantaḥ | pathaḥ | rajaḥ ||9.22.4||

IAST: iyakṣantaḥ patho rajaḥ
Griffith: To reach the regions and their paths.
pada pāṭha: ete | mr̥ṣṭāḥ | amartyāḥ | sasr̥-vāṁsaḥ | na | śaśramuḥ || iyakṣantaḥ | pathaḥ | rajaḥ ||9.22.4||

Griffith: Advancing they have travelled o'er the ridges of the earth and heaven,

IAST: utedam uttamaṁ rajaḥ
Griffith: And this the highest realm of all.
pada pāṭha: ete | pr̥ṣṭhāni | rodasoḥ | vi-prayantaḥ | vi | ānaśuḥ || uta | idam | ut-tamam | rajaḥ ||9.22.5||

Griffith: Over the heights have they attained the highest thread that is spun out,
pada pāṭha: tantum | tanvānam | ut-tamam | anu | pra-vataḥ | āśata || uta | idam | uttamāyyam ||9.22.6||

IAST: utedam uttamāyyam
Griffith: And this which must be deemed most high.
pada pāṭha: tantum | tanvānam | ut-tamam | anu | pra-vataḥ | āśata || uta | idam | uttamāyyam ||9.22.6||

IAST: tvaṁ soma paṇibhya ā vasu gavyāni dhārayaḥ
Griffith: Thou, Soma, boldest wealth in kine which thou hast seized from niggard churls:

pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | paṇi-bhyaḥ | ā | vasu | gavyāni | dhārayaḥ || tatam | tantum | acikradaḥ ||9.22.7||

IAST: tataṁ tantum acikradaḥ
Griffith: Thou calledst forth the outspun thread.
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | paṇi-bhyaḥ | ā | vasu | gavyāni | dhārayaḥ || tatam | tantum | acikradaḥ ||9.22.7||

Griffith: SWIFT Soma drops have been effused in streams of meath, the gladdening drink,

IAST: abhi viśvāni kāvyā
Griffith: For sacred lore of every kind.
pada pāṭha: somāḥ | asr̥gram | āśavaḥ | madhoḥ | madasya | dhārayā || abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā ||9.23.1||

IAST: ruce jananta sūryam
Griffith: They made the Sun that he might shine.
pada pāṭha: anu | pratnāsaḥ | āyavaḥ | padam | navīyaḥ | akramuḥ || ruce | jananta | sūryam ||9.23.2||

IAST: ā pavamāna no bharāryo adāśuṣo gayam
Griffith: O Pavamana, bring to us the unsacrificing foeman's wealth,

pada pāṭha: ā | pavamāna | naḥ | bhara | aryaḥ | adāśuṣaḥ | gayam || kr̥dhi | prajā-vatīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.23.3||

IAST: kṛdhi prajāvatīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: And give us food with progeny.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavamāna | naḥ | bhara | aryaḥ | adāśuṣaḥ | gayam || kr̥dhi | prajā-vatīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.23.3||

IAST: abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam
Griffith: The living Somas being cleansed diffuse exhilarating drink,
Devanāgarī: अभि सोमास आयवः पवन्ते मद्यं मदम्
pada pāṭha: abhi | somāsaḥ | āyavaḥ | pavante | madyam | madam || abhi | kośam | madhu-ścutam ||9.23.4||

IAST: abhi kośam madhuścutam
Griffith: Turned to the vat which drips with meath.
pada pāṭha: abhi | somāsaḥ | āyavaḥ | pavante | madyam | madam || abhi | kośam | madhu-ścutam ||9.23.4||

IAST: somo arṣati dharṇasir dadhāna indriyaṁ rasam
Griffith: Soma gows on intelligent, possessing sap and mighty strength,
pada pāṭha: somaḥ | arṣati | dharṇasiḥ | dadhānaḥ | indriyam | rasam || su-vīraḥ | abhiśasti-pāḥ ||9.23.5||

IAST: suvīro abhiśastipāḥ
Griffith: Brave Hero who repels the curse.
pada pāṭha: somaḥ | arṣati | dharṇasiḥ | dadhānaḥ | indriyam | rasam || su-vīraḥ | abhiśasti-pāḥ ||9.23.5||

IAST: indrāya soma pavase devebhyaḥ sadhamādyaḥ
Griffith: For Indra, Soma! thou art cleansed, a feast-companion for the Gods:
pada pāṭha: indrāya | soma | pavase | devebhyaḥ | sadha-mādyaḥ || indo iti | vājam | sisāsasi ||9.23.6||

IAST: indo vājaṁ siṣāsasi
Griffith: Indu, thou fain wilt win us strength
pada pāṭha: indrāya | soma | pavase | devebhyaḥ | sadha-mādyaḥ || indo iti | vājam | sisāsasi ||9.23.6||

IAST: asya pītvā madānām indro vṛtrāṇy aprati
Griffith: When he had drunken draughts of this, Indra smote down resistless foes:
pada pāṭha: asya | pītvā | madānām | indraḥ | vr̥trāṇi | aprati || jaghāna | jaghanat | ca | nu ||9.23.7||

IAST: jaghāna jaghanac ca nu
Griffith: Yea, smote them, and shall smite them still.
pada pāṭha: asya | pītvā | madānām | indraḥ | vr̥trāṇi | aprati || jaghāna | jaghanat | ca | nu ||9.23.7||

IAST: pra somāso adhanviṣuḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ
Griffith: HITHERWARD have the Soma streamed, the drops while they are purified:
pada pāṭha: pra | somāsaḥ | adhanviṣuḥ | pavamānāsaḥ | indavaḥ || śrīṇānāḥ | ap-su | mr̥ñjata ||9.24.1||

IAST: śrīṇānā apsu mṛñjata
Griffith: When bIent, in waters they are rinsed.
pada pāṭha: pra | somāsaḥ | adhanviṣuḥ | pavamānāsaḥ | indavaḥ || śrīṇānāḥ | ap-su | mr̥ñjata ||9.24.1||

IAST: abhi gāvo adhanviṣur āpo na pravatā yatīḥ
Griffith: The milk hath run to meet them like floods rushing down a precipice:
Devanāgarī: अभि गावो अधन्विषुरापो न प्रवता यतीः
pada pāṭha: abhi | gāvaḥ | adhanviṣuḥ | āpaḥ | na | pra-vatā | yatīḥ || punānāḥ | indram | āśata ||9.24.2||

IAST: punānā indram āśata
Griffith: They come to Indra, being cleansed.
pada pāṭha: abhi | gāvaḥ | adhanviṣuḥ | āpaḥ | na | pra-vatā | yatīḥ || punānāḥ | indram | āśata ||9.24.2||

IAST: pra pavamāna dhanvasi somendrāya pātave
Griffith: O Soma Pavamana, thou art flowing to be Indra's drink:
pada pāṭha: pra | pavamāna | dhanvasi | soma | indrāya | pātave || nr̥-bhiḥ | yataḥ | vi | nīyase ||9.24.3||

IAST: nṛbhir yato vi nīyase
Griffith: The men have seized and lead thee forth.
pada pāṭha: pra | pavamāna | dhanvasi | soma | indrāya | pātave || nr̥-bhiḥ | yataḥ | vi | nīyase ||9.24.3||

IAST: tvaṁ soma nṛmādanaḥ pavasva carṣaṇīsahe
Griffith: Victorious, to be hailed with joy, O Soma, flow, delighting men,
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | nr̥-mādanaḥ | pavasva | carṣaṇi-sahe || sasniḥ | yaḥ | anu-mādyaḥ ||9.24.4||

IAST: sasnir yo anumādyaḥ
Griffith: To him who ruleth o'er mankind.
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | nr̥-mādanaḥ | pavasva | carṣaṇi-sahe || sasniḥ | yaḥ | anu-mādyaḥ ||9.24.4||

IAST: indo yad adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavitram paridhāvasi
Griffith: Thou, Indu, when, effused by stones, thou runnest to the filter, art,
pada pāṭha: indo iti | yat | adri-bhiḥ | sutaḥ | pavitram | pari-dhāvasi || aram | indrasya | dhāmne ||9.24.5||

IAST: aram indrasya dhāmne
Griffith: Ready for Indra's high decree.
pada pāṭha: indo iti | yat | adri-bhiḥ | sutaḥ | pavitram | pari-dhāvasi || aram | indrasya | dhāmne ||9.24.5||

IAST: pavasva vṛtrahantamokthebhir anumādyaḥ
Griffith: Flow on, best Vrtra-slayer; flow meet to be hailed with joyful lauds.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | vr̥trahan-tama | ukthebhiḥ | anu-mādyaḥ || śuciḥ | pāvakaḥ | adbhutaḥ ||9.24.6||

IAST: śuciḥ pāvako adbhutaḥ
Griffith: Pure, purifying, wonderful.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | vr̥trahan-tama | ukthebhiḥ | anu-mādyaḥ || śuciḥ | pāvakaḥ | adbhutaḥ ||9.24.6||

Griffith: Pure, purifying is he called the Soma of the meath eflused,
