pada pāṭha: śuciḥ | pāvakaḥ | ucyate | somaḥ | sutasya | madhvaḥ || deva-avīḥ | aghaśaṁsa-hā ||9.24.7||

IAST: devāvīr aghaśaṁsahā
Griffith: Slayer of sinners, dear to Gods.
pada pāṭha: śuciḥ | pāvakaḥ | ucyate | somaḥ | sutasya | madhvaḥ || deva-avīḥ | aghaśaṁsa-hā ||9.24.7||

IAST: pavasva dakṣasādhano devebhyaḥ pītaye hare
Griffith: GREEN-HUED! as one who giveth strength flow on for Gods to drink, a draught
pada pāṭha: pavasva | dakṣa-sādhanaḥ | devebhyaḥ | pītaye | hare || marut-bhyaḥ | vāyave | madaḥ ||9.25.1||

IAST: marudbhyo vāyave madaḥ
Griffith: For Vayu and the Marut host.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | dakṣa-sādhanaḥ | devebhyaḥ | pītaye | hare || marut-bhyaḥ | vāyave | madaḥ ||9.25.1||

IAST: pavamāna dhiyā hito 'bhi yoniṁ kanikradat
Griffith: O Pavamana, sent by song, roaring about thy dwelling-place,
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | dhiyā | hitaḥ | abhi | yonim | kanikradat || dharmaṇā | vāyum | ā | viśa ||9.25.2||

IAST: dharmaṇā vāyum ā viśa
Griffith: Pass into Vayu as Law bids.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | dhiyā | hitaḥ | abhi | yonim | kanikradat || dharmaṇā | vāyum | ā | viśa ||9.25.2||

IAST: saṁ devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā kavir yonāv adhi priyaḥ
Griffith: The Steer shines with the Deities, dear Sage in his appointed home,
Devanāgarī: सं देवैः शोभते वृषा कविर्योनावधि प्रियः
pada pāṭha: sam | devaiḥ | śobhate | vr̥ṣā | kaviḥ | yonau | adhi | priyaḥ || vr̥tra-hā | deva-vītamaḥ ||9.25.3||

IAST: vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ
Griffith: Foe-Slayer, most beloved by Gods.
pada pāṭha: sam | devaiḥ | śobhate | vr̥ṣā | kaviḥ | yonau | adhi | priyaḥ || vr̥tra-hā | deva-vītamaḥ ||9.25.3||

IAST: viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan punāno yāti haryataḥ
Griffith: Taking each beauteous form, he goes, desirable, while purified,
pada pāṭha: viśvā | rūpāṇi | ā-viśan | punānaḥ | yāti | haryataḥ || yatra | amr̥tāsaḥ | āsate ||9.25.4||

IAST: yatrāmṛtāsa āsate
Griffith: Thither where- the Immortals sit.
pada pāṭha: viśvā | rūpāṇi | ā-viśan | punānaḥ | yāti | haryataḥ || yatra | amr̥tāsaḥ | āsate ||9.25.4||

IAST: aruṣo janayan giraḥ somaḥ pavata āyuṣak
Griffith: To Indra Soma flows, the Red, engendering song, exceeding wise,
pada pāṭha: aruṣaḥ | janayan | giraḥ | somaḥ | pavate | āyuṣak || indram | gacchan | kavi-kratuḥ ||9.25.5||

IAST: indraṁ gacchan kavikratuḥ
Griffith: The visitor of living men.
pada pāṭha: aruṣaḥ | janayan | giraḥ | somaḥ | pavate | āyuṣak || indram | gacchan | kavi-kratuḥ ||9.25.5||

IAST: ā pavasva madintama pavitraṁ dhārayā kave
Griffith: Flow, best exhilarator, Sage, flow to the filter in a stream
Devanāgarī: आ पवस्व मदिन्तम पवित्रं धारया कवे
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | madin-tama | pavitram | dhārayā | kave || arkasya | yonim | ā-sadam ||9.25.6||

IAST: arkasya yonim āsadam
Griffith: To seat thee in the place of song.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | madin-tama | pavitram | dhārayā | kave || arkasya | yonim | ā-sadam ||9.25.6||

IAST: tam amṛkṣanta vājinam upasthe aditer adhi
Griffith: THE sages with the fingers' art have dressed and decked that vigorous Steed
pada pāṭha: tam | amr̥kṣanta | vājinam | upa-sthe | aditeḥ | adhi || viprāsaḥ | aṇvyā | dhiyā ||9.26.1||

IAST: viprāso aṇvyā dhiyā
Griffith: Upon the lap of Aditi,
pada pāṭha: tam | amr̥kṣanta | vājinam | upa-sthe | aditeḥ | adhi || viprāsaḥ | aṇvyā | dhiyā ||9.26.1||

IAST: taṁ gāvo abhy anūṣata sahasradhāram akṣitam
Griffith: The kine have called aloud to him exhaustless with a thousand streams,
pada pāṭha: tam | gāvaḥ | abhi | anūṣata | sahasra-dhāram | akṣitam || indum | dhartāram | ā | divaḥ ||9.26.2||

IAST: induṁ dhartāram ā divaḥ
Griffith: To Indu who supporteth heaven.
pada pāṭha: tam | gāvaḥ | abhi | anūṣata | sahasra-dhāram | akṣitam || indum | dhartāram | ā | divaḥ ||9.26.2||

IAST: taṁ vedhām medhayāhyan pavamānam adhi dyavi
Griffith: Him, nourisher of many, Sage, creative Pavamana, they
pada pāṭha: tam | vedhām | medhayā | ahyan | pavamānam | adhi | dyavi || dharṇasim | bhūri-dhāyasam ||9.26.3||

IAST: dharṇasim bhūridhāyasam
Griffith: Have sent, by wisdom, to the sky.
pada pāṭha: tam | vedhām | medhayā | ahyan | pavamānam | adhi | dyavi || dharṇasim | bhūri-dhāyasam ||9.26.3||

IAST: tam ahyan bhurijor dhiyā saṁvasānaṁ vivasvataḥ
Griffith: Him, dweller with Vivasvan, they with use of both arms have sent forth,
pada pāṭha: tam | ahyan | bhurijoḥ | dhiyā | sam-vasānam | vivasvataḥ || patim | vācaḥ | adābhyam ||9.26.4||

IAST: patiṁ vāco adābhyam
Griffith: The Lord of Speech infallible.
pada pāṭha: tam | ahyan | bhurijoḥ | dhiyā | sam-vasānam | vivasvataḥ || patim | vācaḥ | adābhyam ||9.26.4||

IAST: taṁ sānāv adhi jāmayo hariṁ hinvanty adribhiḥ
Griffith: Him, green, beloved, many eyed, the Sisters with prosing stones
pada pāṭha: tam | sānau | adhi | jāmayaḥ | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || haryatam | bhūri-cakṣasam ||9.26.5||

IAST: haryatam bhūricakṣasam
Griffith: Send down to ridges of the sieve.
pada pāṭha: tam | sānau | adhi | jāmayaḥ | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || haryatam | bhūri-cakṣasam ||9.26.5||

IAST: taṁ tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ pavamāna girāvṛdham
Griffith: O Pavamana, Indu, priests hurry thee on to Indra, thee
Devanāgarī: तं त्वा हिन्वन्ति वेधसः पवमान गिरावृधम्
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | hinvanti | vedhasaḥ | pavamāna | girā-vr̥dham || indo iti | indrāya | matsaram ||9.26.6||

IAST: indav indrāya matsaram
Griffith: Who aidest song and cheerest him.
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | hinvanti | vedhasaḥ | pavamāna | girā-vr̥dham || indo iti | indrāya | matsaram ||9.26.6||

IAST: eṣa kavir abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitre adhi tośate
Griffith: THIS Sage, exalted by our lauds, flows to the purifying cloth,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | kaviḥ | abhi-stutaḥ | pavitre | adhi | tośate || punānaḥ | ghnan | apa | sridhaḥ ||9.27.1||

IAST: punāno ghnann apa sridhaḥ
Griffith: Scattering foes as he is cleansed.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | kaviḥ | abhi-stutaḥ | pavitre | adhi | tośate || punānaḥ | ghnan | apa | sridhaḥ ||9.27.1||

IAST: eṣa indrāya vāyave svarjit pari ṣicyate
Griffith: As giving power and winning light, for Indra and for Vayu he
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | indrāya | vāyave | svaḥ-jit | pari | sicyate || pavitre | dakṣa-sādhanaḥ ||9.27.2||

IAST: pavitre dakṣasādhanaḥ
Griffith: Is poured upon the filtering-cloth.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | indrāya | vāyave | svaḥ-jit | pari | sicyate || pavitre | dakṣa-sādhanaḥ ||9.27.2||

IAST: eṣa nṛbhir vi nīyate divo mūrdhā vṛṣā sutaḥ
Griffith: The men conduct him, Soma, Steer, Omniscient, and the Head of Heaven,
Devanāgarī: एष नृभिर्वि नीयते दिवो मूर्धा वृषा सुतः
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | vi | nīyate | divaḥ | mūrdhā | vr̥ṣā | sutaḥ || somaḥ | vaneṣu | viśva-vit ||9.27.3||

IAST: somo vaneṣu viśvavit
Griffith: Effused into the vats of wood.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | vi | nīyate | divaḥ | mūrdhā | vr̥ṣā | sutaḥ || somaḥ | vaneṣu | viśva-vit ||9.27.3||

IAST: eṣa gavyur acikradat pavamāno hiraṇyayuḥ
Griffith: Longing for kine, longing for gold hath Indu Pavamana lowed,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | gavyuḥ | acikradat | pavamānaḥ | hiraṇya-yuḥ || induḥ | satrā-jit | astr̥taḥ ||9.27.4||

IAST: induḥ satrājid astṛtaḥ
Griffith: Still Conqueror, never overcome.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | gavyuḥ | acikradat | pavamānaḥ | hiraṇya-yuḥ || induḥ | satrā-jit | astr̥taḥ ||9.27.4||

IAST: eṣa sūryeṇa hāsate pavamāno adhi dyavi
Griffith: This Pavamana, gladdening draught, drops on the filtering cloth, and then
Devanāgarī: एष सूर्येण हासते पवमानो अधि द्यवि
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | sūryeṇa | hāsate | pavamānaḥ | adhi | dyavi || pavitre | matsaraḥ | madaḥ ||9.27.5||

IAST: pavitre matsaro madaḥ
Griffith: Mounts up with Surya to the sky.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | sūryeṇa | hāsate | pavamānaḥ | adhi | dyavi || pavitre | matsaraḥ | madaḥ ||9.27.5||

IAST: eṣa śuṣmy asiṣyadad antarikṣe vṛṣā hariḥ
Griffith: To Indra in the firmament this mighty tawny Steer hath flowed,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | śuṣmī | asisyadat | antarikṣe | vr̥ṣā | hariḥ || punānaḥ | induḥ | indram | ā ||9.27.6||

IAST: punāna indur indram ā
Griffith: This Indu, being purified.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | śuṣmī | asisyadat | antarikṣe | vr̥ṣā | hariḥ || punānaḥ | induḥ | indram | ā ||9.27.6||

IAST: eṣa vājī hito nṛbhir viśvavin manasas patiḥ
Griffith: URGED by the men, this vigorous Steed, Lord of the mind, Omniscient,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | vājī | hitaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | viśva-vit | manasaḥ | patiḥ || avyaḥ | vāram | vi | dhāvati ||9.28.1||

IAST: avyo vāraṁ vi dhāvati
Griffith: Runs to the woollen straining-cloth.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | vājī | hitaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | viśva-vit | manasaḥ | patiḥ || avyaḥ | vāram | vi | dhāvati ||9.28.1||

IAST: eṣa pavitre akṣarat somo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ
Griffith: Within the filter hath he flowed, this Soma for the Gods effused,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | pavitre | akṣarat | somaḥ | devebhyaḥ | sutaḥ || viśvā | dhāmāni | ā-viśan ||9.28.2||

IAST: viśvā dhāmāny āviśan
Griffith: Entering all their essences.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | pavitre | akṣarat | somaḥ | devebhyaḥ | sutaḥ || viśvā | dhāmāni | ā-viśan ||9.28.2||

IAST: eṣa devaḥ śubhāyate 'dhi yonāv amartyaḥ
Griffith: He shines in beauty there, this God Immortal in his dwelling-place,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | devaḥ | śubhāyate | adhi | yonau | amartyaḥ || vr̥tra-hā | deva-vītamaḥ ||9.28.3||

IAST: vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ
Griffith: Foe-slayer, dearest to the Gods.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | devaḥ | śubhāyate | adhi | yonau | amartyaḥ || vr̥tra-hā | deva-vītamaḥ ||9.28.3||

IAST: eṣa vṛṣā kanikradad daśabhir jāmibhir yataḥ
Griffith: Directed by the Sisters ten, bellowing on his way this Steer
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | vr̥ṣā | kanikradat | daśa-bhiḥ | jāmi-bhiḥ | yataḥ || abhi | droṇāni | dhāvati ||9.28.4||

IAST: abhi droṇāni dhāvati
Griffith: Runs onward to the wooden vats.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | vr̥ṣā | kanikradat | daśa-bhiḥ | jāmi-bhiḥ | yataḥ || abhi | droṇāni | dhāvati ||9.28.4||

IAST: eṣa sūryam arocayat pavamāno vicarṣaṇiḥ
Griffith: This Pavamana, swiftand strong, Omniscient, gave spleudour to
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | sūryam | arocayat | pavamānaḥ | vi-carṣaṇiḥ || viśvā | dhāmāni | viśva-vit ||9.28.5||

IAST: viśvā dhāmāni viśvavit
Griffith: The Sun and all his forms of light.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | sūryam | arocayat | pavamānaḥ | vi-carṣaṇiḥ || viśvā | dhāmāni | viśva-vit ||9.28.5||

IAST: eṣa śuṣmy adābhyaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati
Griffith: This Soma being purified, flows mighty and infallible,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | śuṣmī | adābhyaḥ | somaḥ | punānaḥ | arṣati || deva-avīḥ | aghaśaṁsa-hā ||9.28.6||

IAST: devāvīr aghaśaṁsahā
Griffith: Slayer of sinners, dear toGods.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | śuṣmī | adābhyaḥ | somaḥ | punānaḥ | arṣati || deva-avīḥ | aghaśaṁsa-hā ||9.28.6||

IAST: prāsya dhārā akṣaran vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasā
Griffith: FORWARD with mighty force have flowed the currents of this Steer effused,
pada pāṭha: pra | asya | dhārāḥ | akṣaran | vr̥ṣṇaḥ | sutasya | ojasā || devān | anu | pra-bhūṣataḥ ||9.29.1||

IAST: devām̐ anu prabhūṣataḥ
Griffith: Of him who sets him by the Gods.
pada pāṭha: pra | asya | dhārāḥ | akṣaran | vr̥ṣṇaḥ | sutasya | ojasā || devān | anu | pra-bhūṣataḥ ||9.29.1||

IAST: saptim mṛjanti vedhaso gṛṇantaḥ kāravo girā
Griffith: The singers praise him with their song, and learned priests adorn the Steed,
Devanāgarī: सप्तिं मृजन्ति वेधसो गृणन्तः कारवो गिरा
pada pāṭha: saptim | mr̥janti | vedhasaḥ | gr̥ṇantaḥ | kāravaḥ | girā || jyotiḥ | jajñānam | ukthyam ||9.29.2||

IAST: jyotir jajñānam ukthyam
Griffith: Brought forth as light that merits laud.
pada pāṭha: saptim | mr̥janti | vedhasaḥ | gr̥ṇantaḥ | kāravaḥ | girā || jyotiḥ | jajñānam | ukthyam ||9.29.2||

IAST: suṣahā soma tāni te punānāya prabhūvaso
Griffith: These things thou winnest lightly while purified, Soma, Lord of wealth:
Devanāgarī: सुषहा सोम तानि ते पुनानाय प्रभूवसो
pada pāṭha: su-sahā | soma | tāni | te | punānāya | prabhuvaso iti prabhu-vaso || vardha | samudram | ukthyam ||9.29.3||

IAST: vardhā samudram ukthyam
Griffith: Fill full the sea that claims our praise.
pada pāṭha: su-sahā | soma | tāni | te | punānāya | prabhuvaso iti prabhu-vaso || vardha | samudram | ukthyam ||9.29.3||

IAST: viśvā vasūni saṁjayan pavasva soma dhārayā
Griffith: Winning all precious things at once, flow on, O Soma, with thy stream
pada pāṭha: viśvā | vasūni | sam-jayan | pavasva | soma | dhārayā || inu | dveṣāṁsi | sadhryak ||9.29.4||

IAST: inu dveṣāṁsi sadhryak
Griffith: Drive to one place our enemies.
pada pāṭha: viśvā | vasūni | sam-jayan | pavasva | soma | dhārayā || inu | dveṣāṁsi | sadhryak ||9.29.4||

IAST: rakṣā su no araruṣaḥ svanāt samasya kasya cit
Griffith: Preserve us from the godless, from ill-omened voice of one and all,
Devanāgarī: रक्षा सु नो अररुषः स्वनात्समस्य कस्य चित्
pada pāṭha: rakṣa | su | naḥ | araruṣaḥ | svanāt | samasya | kasya | cit || nidaḥ | yatra | mumucmahe ||9.29.5||

IAST: nido yatra mumucmahe
Griffith: That so we may be freed from blame.
pada pāṭha: rakṣa | su | naḥ | araruṣaḥ | svanāt | samasya | kasya | cit || nidaḥ | yatra | mumucmahe ||9.29.5||

IAST: endo pārthivaṁ rayiṁ divyam pavasva dhārayā
Griffith: O Indu, as thou flowest on bring us the wealth of earth and heaven,
Devanāgarī: एन्दो पार्थिवं रयिं दिव्यं पवस्व धारया
pada pāṭha: ā | indo iti | pārthivam | rayim | divyam | pavasva | dhārayā || dyu-mantam | śuṣmam | ā | bhara ||9.29.6||

IAST: dyumantaṁ śuṣmam ā bhara
Griffith: And splendid vigour, in thy stream.
pada pāṭha: ā | indo iti | pārthivam | rayim | divyam | pavasva | dhārayā || dyu-mantam | śuṣmam | ā | bhara ||9.29.6||

IAST: pra dhārā asya śuṣmiṇo vṛthā pavitre akṣaran
Griffith: STREAMS of this Potent One have flowed easily to the straining-cloth:
Devanāgarī: प्र धारा अस्य शुष्मिणो वृथा पवित्रे अक्षरन्
pada pāṭha: pra | dhārāḥ | asya | śuṣmiṇaḥ | vr̥thā | pavitre | akṣaran || punānaḥ | vācam | iṣyati ||9.30.1||

IAST: punāno vācam iṣyati
Griffith: While he is cleansed he lifts his voice.
pada pāṭha: pra | dhārāḥ | asya | śuṣmiṇaḥ | vr̥thā | pavitre | akṣaran || punānaḥ | vācam | iṣyati ||9.30.1||

IAST: indur hiyānaḥ sotṛbhir mṛjyamānaḥ kanikradat
Griffith: Indu, by pressers urged to speed, bellowing out while beautified.
pada pāṭha: induḥ | hiyānaḥ | sotr̥-bhiḥ | mr̥jyamānaḥ | kanikradat || iyarti | vagnum | indriyam ||9.30.2||

IAST: iyarti vagnum indriyam
Griffith: Sends forth a very mighty sound.
pada pāṭha: induḥ | hiyānaḥ | sotr̥-bhiḥ | mr̥jyamānaḥ | kanikradat || iyarti | vagnum | indriyam ||9.30.2||

IAST: ā naḥ śuṣmaṁ nṛṣāhyaṁ vīravantam puruspṛham
Griffith: Pour on us, Soma, with thy stream manconquering might which many crave,
Devanāgarī: आ नः शुष्मं नृषाह्यं वीरवन्तं पुरुस्पृहम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | śuṣmam | nr̥-sahyam | vīra-vantam | puru-spr̥ham || pavasva | soma | dhārayā ||9.30.3||

IAST: pavasva soma dhārayā
Griffith: Accompanied with hero sons.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | śuṣmam | nr̥-sahyam | vīra-vantam | puru-spr̥ham || pavasva | soma | dhārayā ||9.30.3||

IAST: pra somo ati dhārayā pavamāno asiṣyadat
Griffith: Hither hath Pavamana flowed, Soma flowed hither in a stream,
Devanāgarī: प्र सोमो अति धारया पवमानो असिष्यदत्
pada pāṭha: pra | somaḥ | ati | dhārayā | pavamānaḥ | asisyadat || abhi | droṇāni | ā-sadam ||9.30.4||

IAST: abhi droṇāny āsadam
Griffith: To settle in the vats of wood.
pada pāṭha: pra | somaḥ | ati | dhārayā | pavamānaḥ | asisyadat || abhi | droṇāni | ā-sadam ||9.30.4||

IAST: apsu tvā madhumattamaṁ hariṁ hinvanty adribhiḥ
Griffith: To waters with the stones they drive thee tawny-hued, most rich in sweets,
pada pāṭha: ap-su | tvā | madhumat-tamam | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || indo iti | indrāya | pītaye ||9.30.5||

IAST: indav indrāya pītaye
Griffith: O Indu, to be Indra's drink.
pada pāṭha: ap-su | tvā | madhumat-tamam | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || indo iti | indrāya | pītaye ||9.30.5||

IAST: śumbhamāna ṛtāyubhir mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ
Griffith: He, beautified by pious men, and coming from their hands adorned,
pada pāṭha: śumbhamānaḥ | r̥tayu-bhiḥ | mr̥jyamānaḥ | gabhastyoḥ || pavate | vāre | avyaye ||9.36.4||

IAST: pavate vāre avyaye
Griffith: Flows through the fleecy straining-cloth.
pada pāṭha: śumbhamānaḥ | r̥tayu-bhiḥ | mr̥jyamānaḥ | gabhastyoḥ || pavate | vāre | avyaye ||9.36.4||

IAST: sa viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somo divyāni pārthivā
Griffith: May Soma pour all treasures of the heavens, the earth, the firmament
Devanāgarī: स विश्वा दाशुषे वसु सोमो दिव्यानि पार्थिवा
pada pāṭha: saḥ | viśvā | dāśuṣe | vasu | somaḥ | divyāni | pārthivā || pavatām | ā | antarikṣyā ||9.36.5||

IAST: pavatām āntarikṣyā
Griffith: Upon the liberal worshipper.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | viśvā | dāśuṣe | vasu | somaḥ | divyāni | pārthivā || pavatām | ā | antarikṣyā ||9.36.5||

IAST: ā divas pṛṣṭham aśvayur gavyayuḥ soma rohasi
Griffith: Thou mountest to the height of heaven, O Soma, seeking steeds and kine,
pada pāṭha: ā | divaḥ | pr̥ṣṭham | aśva-yuḥ | gavya-yuḥ | soma | rohasi || vīra-yuḥ | śavasaḥ | pate ||9.36.6||

IAST: vīrayuḥ śavasas pate
Griffith: And seeking heroes, Lord of Strength!
pada pāṭha: ā | divaḥ | pr̥ṣṭham | aśva-yuḥ | gavya-yuḥ | soma | rohasi || vīra-yuḥ | śavasaḥ | pate ||9.36.6||

IAST: sa sutaḥ pītaye vṛṣā somaḥ pavitre arṣati
Griffith: SOMA, the Steer, effused for draught, flows to the purifying sieve,
Devanāgarī: स सुतः पीतये वृषा सोमः पवित्रे अर्षति
pada pāṭha: saḥ | sutaḥ | pītaye | vr̥ṣā | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati || vi-ghnan | rakṣāṁsi | deva-yuḥ ||9.37.1||

IAST: vighnan rakṣāṁsi devayuḥ
Griffith: Slaying the fiends, loving the Gods.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | sutaḥ | pītaye | vr̥ṣā | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati || vi-ghnan | rakṣāṁsi | deva-yuḥ ||9.37.1||

IAST: sa pavitre vicakṣaṇo harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ
Griffith: Far-sighted, tawny-coloured, he flows to the sieve, intelligent,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavitre | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | hariḥ | arṣati | dharṇasiḥ || abhi | yonim | kanikradat ||9.37.2||

IAST: abhi yoniṁ kanikradat
Griffith: Bellowing, to his place of rest.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavitre | vi-cakṣaṇaḥ | hariḥ | arṣati | dharṇasiḥ || abhi | yonim | kanikradat ||9.37.2||

IAST: sa vājī rocanā divaḥ pavamāno vi dhāvati
Griffith: This vigorous Pavamana runs forth to the luminous realm of heaven,
Devanāgarī: स वाजी रोचना दिवः पवमानो वि धावति
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vājī | rocanā | divaḥ | pavamānaḥ | vi | dhāvati || rakṣaḥ-hā | vāram | avyayam ||9.37.3||

IAST: rakṣohā vāram avyayam
Griffith: Fiend-slayer, through the fleecy sieve.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vājī | rocanā | divaḥ | pavamānaḥ | vi | dhāvati || rakṣaḥ-hā | vāram | avyayam ||9.37.3||

IAST: sa tritasyādhi sānavi pavamāno arocayat
Griffith: This Payamana up above Trita's high ridge hath made the Sun,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | tritasya | adhi | sānavi | pavamānaḥ | arocayat || jāmi-bhiḥ | sūryam | saha ||9.37.4||

IAST: jāmibhiḥ sūryaṁ saha
Griffith: Together with the Sisters, shine.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | tritasya | adhi | sānavi | pavamānaḥ | arocayat || jāmi-bhiḥ | sūryam | saha ||9.37.4||

IAST: sa vṛtrahā vṛṣā suto varivovid adābhyaḥ
Griffith: This Vrtra-slaying Steer, effused, Soma room-giver, ne'er deceived,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vr̥tra-hā | vr̥ṣā | sutaḥ | varivaḥ-vit | adābhyaḥ || somaḥ | vājam-iva | asarat ||9.37.5||

IAST: somo vājam ivāsarat
Griffith: Hath gone, as 'twere, to win the spoil.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vr̥tra-hā | vr̥ṣā | sutaḥ | varivaḥ-vit | adābhyaḥ || somaḥ | vājam-iva | asarat ||9.37.5||

IAST: sa devaḥ kavineṣito 'bhi droṇāni dhāvati
Griffith: Urged onward by the sage, the God speeds forward to the casks of wood,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | devaḥ | kavinā | iṣitaḥ | abhi | droṇāni | dhāvati || induḥ | indrāya | maṁhanā ||9.37.6||

IAST: indur indrāya maṁhanā
Griffith: Indu to Indra willingly.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | devaḥ | kavinā | iṣitaḥ | abhi | droṇāni | dhāvati || induḥ | indrāya | maṁhanā ||9.37.6||

IAST: eṣa u sya vṛṣā ratho 'vyo vārebhir arṣati
Griffith: THIS Steer, this Chariot, rushes through the woollen filter, as he goes
Devanāgarī: एष उ स्य वृषा रथोऽव्यो वारेभिरर्षति
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | ūm̐ iti | syaḥ | vr̥ṣā | rathaḥ | avyaḥ | vārebhiḥ | arṣati || gacchan | vājam | sahasriṇam ||9.38.1||

IAST: gacchan vājaṁ sahasriṇam
Griffith: To war that wins a thousand spoils.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | ūm̐ iti | syaḥ | vr̥ṣā | rathaḥ | avyaḥ | vārebhiḥ | arṣati || gacchan | vājam | sahasriṇam ||9.38.1||

IAST: etaṁ tritasya yoṣaṇo hariṁ hinvanty adribhiḥ
Griffith: The Dames of Trita with the stones onward impel this Tawny One
pada pāṭha: etam | tritasya | yoṣaṇaḥ | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || indum | indrāya | pītaye ||9.38.2||

IAST: indum indrāya pītaye
Griffith: Indu to Indra for his drink.
pada pāṭha: etam | tritasya | yoṣaṇaḥ | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || indum | indrāya | pītaye ||9.38.2||

IAST: etaṁ tyaṁ harito daśa marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ
Griffith: Ten active fingers carefully adorn him here; they make him bright
Devanāgarī: एतं त्यं हरितो दश मर्मृज्यन्ते अपस्युवः
pada pāṭha: etam | tyam | haritaḥ | daśa | marmr̥jyante | apasyuvaḥ || yābhiḥ | madāya | śumbhate ||9.38.3||

IAST: yābhir madāya śumbhate
Griffith: And beauteous for the gladdening draught.
pada pāṭha: etam | tyam | haritaḥ | daśa | marmr̥jyante | apasyuvaḥ || yābhiḥ | madāya | śumbhate ||9.38.3||

IAST: eṣa sya mānuṣīṣv ā śyeno na vikṣu sīdati
Griffith: He like a falcon settles down amid the families of men.
Devanāgarī: एष स्य मानुषीष्वा श्येनो न विक्षु सीदति
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | syaḥ | mānuṣīṣu | ā | śyenaḥ | na | vikṣu | sīdati || gacchan | jāraḥ | na | yoṣitam ||9.38.4||

IAST: gacchañ jāro na yoṣitam
Griffith: Speeding like lover to his love.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | syaḥ | mānuṣīṣu | ā | śyenaḥ | na | vikṣu | sīdati || gacchan | jāraḥ | na | yoṣitam ||9.38.4||

IAST: eṣa sya madyo raso 'va caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ
Griffith: This young exhilarating juice looks downward from its place in heaven,
Devanāgarī: एष स्य मद्यो रसोऽव चष्टे दिवः शिशुः
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | syaḥ | madyaḥ | rasaḥ | ava | caṣṭe | divaḥ | śiśuḥ || yaḥ | induḥ | vāram | ā | aviśat ||9.38.5||

IAST: ya indur vāram āviśat
Griffith: This Soma-drop that pierced the sieve.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | syaḥ | madyaḥ | rasaḥ | ava | caṣṭe | divaḥ | śiśuḥ || yaḥ | induḥ | vāram | ā | aviśat ||9.38.5||

IAST: eṣa sya pītaye suto harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ
Griffith: Poured for the draught, this tawny juice flows forth, intelligent, crying out,
Devanāgarī: एष स्य पीतये सुतो हरिरर्षति धर्णसिः
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | syaḥ | pītaye | sutaḥ | hariḥ | arṣati | dharṇasiḥ || krandan | yonim | abhi | priyam ||9.38.6||

IAST: krandan yonim abhi priyam
Griffith: Unto the well-beloved place.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | syaḥ | pītaye | sutaḥ | hariḥ | arṣati | dharṇasiḥ || krandan | yonim | abhi | priyam ||9.38.6||

IAST: āśur arṣa bṛhanmate pari priyeṇa dhāmnā
Griffith: FLOW On, O thou of lofty thought, flow swift in thy beloved form,
pada pāṭha: āśuḥ | arṣa | br̥hat-mate | pari | priyeṇa | dhāmnā || yatra | devāḥ | iti | bravan ||9.39.1||

IAST: yatra devā iti bravan
Griffith: Saying, I go where dwell the Gods.
pada pāṭha: āśuḥ | arṣa | br̥hat-mate | pari | priyeṇa | dhāmnā || yatra | devāḥ | iti | bravan ||9.39.1||

IAST: pariṣkṛṇvann aniṣkṛtaṁ janāya yātayann iṣaḥ
Griffith: Preparing what is unprepared, and bringing store of food to man,
pada pāṭha: pari-kr̥ṇvan | aniḥ-kr̥tam | janāya | yātayan | iṣaḥ || vr̥ṣṭim | divaḥ | pari | srava ||9.39.2||

IAST: vṛṣṭiṁ divaḥ pari srava
Griffith: Make thou the rain descend from heaven.
pada pāṭha: pari-kr̥ṇvan | aniḥ-kr̥tam | janāya | yātayan | iṣaḥ || vr̥ṣṭim | divaḥ | pari | srava ||9.39.2||

IAST: suta eti pavitra ā tviṣiṁ dadhāna ojasā
Griffith: With might, bestowing power, thejuice enters the purifying sieve,
Devanāgarī: सुत एति पवित्र आ त्विषिं दधान ओजसा
pada pāṭha: sutaḥ | eti | pavitre | ā | tviṣim | dadhānaḥ | ojasā || vi-cakṣāṇaḥ | vi-rocayan ||9.39.3||

IAST: vicakṣāṇo virocayan
Griffith: Far-seeing, sending forth its light.
pada pāṭha: sutaḥ | eti | pavitre | ā | tviṣim | dadhānaḥ | ojasā || vi-cakṣāṇaḥ | vi-rocayan ||9.39.3||

IAST: ayaṁ sa yo divas pari raghuyāmā pavitra ā
Griffith: This is it which in rapid course hath with the river's wave flowed down
Devanāgarī: अयं स यो दिवस्परि रघुयामा पवित्र आ
pada pāṭha: ayam | saḥ | yaḥ | divaḥ | pari | raghu-yāmā | pavitre | ā || sindhoḥ | ūrmā | vi | akṣarat ||9.39.4||

IAST: sindhor ūrmā vy akṣarat
Griffith: From heaven upon the straining cloth.
pada pāṭha: ayam | saḥ | yaḥ | divaḥ | pari | raghu-yāmā | pavitre | ā || sindhoḥ | ūrmā | vi | akṣarat ||9.39.4||

IAST: āvivāsan parāvato atho arvāvataḥ sutaḥ
Griffith: Inviting him frorh far away, and even from near at hand, the juice
pada pāṭha: ā-vivāsan | parā-vataḥ | atho iti | arvā-vataḥ | sutaḥ || indrāya | sicyate | madhu ||9.39.5||

IAST: indrāya sicyate madhu
Griffith: For Indra is poured forth as meath.
pada pāṭha: ā-vivāsan | parā-vataḥ | atho iti | arvā-vataḥ | sutaḥ || indrāya | sicyate | madhu ||9.39.5||

IAST: samīcīnā anūṣata hariṁ hinvanty adribhiḥ
Griffith: In union they have sung the hymn: with stones they urge the Tawny One.
pada pāṭha: sam-īcīnāḥ | anūṣata | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || yonau | r̥tasya | sīdata ||9.39.6||

IAST: yonāv ṛtasya sīdata
Griffith: Sit in the place of sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: sam-īcīnāḥ | anūṣata | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || yonau | r̥tasya | sīdata ||9.39.6||

IAST: punāno akramīd abhi viśvā mṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ
Griffith: THE Very Active hath assailed, while purified, all enemies:
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | akramīt | abhi | viśvāḥ | mr̥dhaḥ | vi-carṣaṇiḥ || śumbhanti | vipram | dhīti-bhiḥ ||9.40.1||

IAST: śumbhanti vipraṁ dhītibhiḥ
Griffith: They deck the Sage with holy songs.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | akramīt | abhi | viśvāḥ | mr̥dhaḥ | vi-carṣaṇiḥ || śumbhanti | vipram | dhīti-bhiḥ ||9.40.1||

IAST: ā yonim aruṇo ruhad gamad indraṁ vṛṣā sutaḥ
Griffith: The Red hath mounted to his place; to India, goes the mighty juice:
pada pāṭha: ā | yonim | aruṇaḥ | ruhat | gamat | indram | vr̥ṣā | sutaḥ || dhruve | sadasi | sīdati ||9.40.2||

IAST: dhruve sadasi sīdati
Griffith: He settles in his firm abode.
pada pāṭha: ā | yonim | aruṇaḥ | ruhat | gamat | indram | vr̥ṣā | sutaḥ || dhruve | sadasi | sīdati ||9.40.2||

IAST: nū no rayim mahām indo 'smabhyaṁ soma viśvataḥ
Griffith: O Indu, Soma, send us now great opulence from every side, Pour on us treasures thousandfold.
Devanāgarī: नू नो रयिं महामिन्दोऽस्मभ्यं सोम विश्वतः
pada pāṭha: nu | naḥ | rayim | mahām | indo iti | asmabhyam | soma | viśvataḥ || ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam ||9.40.3||

IAST: ā pavasva sahasriṇam
Griffith: Pour on us treasures thousandfold.
pada pāṭha: nu | naḥ | rayim | mahām | indo iti | asmabhyam | soma | viśvataḥ || ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam ||9.40.3||

IAST: viśvā soma pavamāna dyumnānīndav ā bhara
Griffith: O Soma Pavamana, bring, Indu, all splendours hitherward:
pada pāṭha: viśvā | soma | pavamāna | dyumnāni | indo iti | ā | bhara || vidāḥ | sahasriṇīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.40.4||

IAST: vidāḥ sahasriṇīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: Find for us food in boundless store.
pada pāṭha: viśvā | soma | pavamāna | dyumnāni | indo iti | ā | bhara || vidāḥ | sahasriṇīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.40.4||

IAST: sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṁ stotre suvīryam
Griffith: As thou art cleansed, bring hero strength and riches to thy worshipper,
Devanāgarī: स नः पुनान आ भर रयिं स्तोत्रे सुवीर्यम्
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | punānaḥ | ā | bhara | rayim | stotre | su-vīryam || jarituḥ | vardhaya | giraḥ ||9.40.5||

IAST: jaritur vardhayā giraḥ
Griffith: And prosper thou the singer's hymns.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | punānaḥ | ā | bhara | rayim | stotre | su-vīryam || jarituḥ | vardhaya | giraḥ ||9.40.5||

IAST: punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṁ rayim
Griffith: O Indu, Soma, being cleansed, bring hither riches doublypiled,
Devanāgarī: पुनान इन्दवा भर सोम द्विबर्हसं रयिम्
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | indo iti | ā | bhara | soma | dvi-barhasam | rayim || vr̥ṣan | indo iti | naḥ | ukthyam ||9.40.6||

IAST: vṛṣann indo na ukthyam
Griffith: Wealth, mighty Indu, meet for lauds.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | indo iti | ā | bhara | soma | dvi-barhasam | rayim || vr̥ṣan | indo iti | naḥ | ukthyam ||9.40.6||

IAST: pra ye gāvo na bhūrṇayas tveṣā ayāso akramuḥ
Griffith: ACTIVE and bright have they come forth, impetuous in speed like bulls,
Devanāgarī: प्र ये गावो न भूर्णयस्त्वेषा अयासो अक्रमुः
pada pāṭha: pra | ye | gāvaḥ | na | bhūrṇayaḥ | tveṣāḥ | ayāsaḥ | akramuḥ || ghnantaḥ | kr̥ṣṇām | apa | tvacam ||9.41.1||

IAST: ghnantaḥ kṛṣṇām apa tvacam
Griffith: Driving the black skin far away.
pada pāṭha: pra | ye | gāvaḥ | na | bhūrṇayaḥ | tveṣāḥ | ayāsaḥ | akramuḥ || ghnantaḥ | kr̥ṣṇām | apa | tvacam ||9.41.1||

IAST: suvitasya manāmahe 'ti setuṁ durāvyam
Griffith: Quelling the riteless Dasyu, may we think upon the bridge of bliss,
pada pāṭha: suvitasya | manāmahe | ati | setum | duḥ-āvyam || sahvāṁsaḥ | dasyum | avratam ||9.41.2||

IAST: sāhvāṁso dasyum avratam
Griffith: Leaving the bridge of woe behind.
pada pāṭha: suvitasya | manāmahe | ati | setum | duḥ-āvyam || sahvāṁsaḥ | dasyum | avratam ||9.41.2||

IAST: śṛṇve vṛṣṭer iva svanaḥ pavamānasya śuṣmiṇaḥ
Griffith: The mighty Pavamana's roar is heard as 'twere the rush of rain
pada pāṭha: śr̥ṇve | vr̥ṣṭeḥ-iva | svanaḥ | pavamānasya | śuṣmiṇaḥ || caranti | vi-dyutaḥ | divi ||9.41.3||

IAST: caranti vidyuto divi
Griffith: Lightnings are flashing to the sky.
pada pāṭha: śr̥ṇve | vr̥ṣṭeḥ-iva | svanaḥ | pavamānasya | śuṣmiṇaḥ || caranti | vi-dyutaḥ | divi ||9.41.3||

IAST: ā pavasva mahīm iṣaṁ gomad indo hiraṇyavat
Griffith: Pour out on us abundant food, when thou art pressed, O Indu wealth
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | mahīm | iṣam | go-mat | indo iti | hiraṇya-vat || aśva-vat | vāja-vat | sutaḥ ||9.41.4||

IAST: aśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ
Griffith: In kine and gold and steeds and spoil.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | mahīm | iṣam | go-mat | indo iti | hiraṇya-vat || aśva-vat | vāja-vat | sutaḥ ||9.41.4||

IAST: sa pavasva vicarṣaṇa ā mahī rodasī pṛṇa
Griffith: Flow on thy way, Most Active, thou. fill full the mighty heavens and earth,
Devanāgarī: स पवस्व विचर्षण आ मही रोदसी पृण
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | vi-carṣaṇe | ā | māhī iti | rodasī iti | pr̥ṇa || uṣāḥ | sūryaḥ | na | raśmi-bhiḥ ||9.41.5||

IAST: uṣāḥ sūryo na raśmibhiḥ
Griffith: As Dawn, as Surya with his beams.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | vi-carṣaṇe | ā | māhī iti | rodasī iti | pr̥ṇa || uṣāḥ | sūryaḥ | na | raśmi-bhiḥ ||9.41.5||

IAST: pari ṇaḥ śarmayantyā dhārayā soma viśvataḥ
Griffith: On every side, O Soma, flow round us with thy protecting stream,
Devanāgarī: परि णः शर्मयन्त्या धारया सोम विश्वतः
pada pāṭha: pari | naḥ | śarma-yantyā | dhārayā | soma | viśvataḥ || sara | rasā-iva | viṣṭapam ||9.41.6||

IAST: sarā raseva viṣṭapam
Griffith: As Rasa flows around the world.
pada pāṭha: pari | naḥ | śarma-yantyā | dhārayā | soma | viśvataḥ || sara | rasā-iva | viṣṭapam ||9.41.6||

IAST: janayan rocanā divo janayann apsu sūryam
Griffith: ENGENDERING the Sun in floods, engendering heaven's lights, green-hued,
pada pāṭha: janayan | rocanā | divaḥ | janayan | ap-su | sūryam || vasānaḥ | gāḥ | apaḥ | hariḥ ||9.42.1||

IAST: vasāno gā apo hariḥ
Griffith: Robed in the waters and the milk,
pada pāṭha: janayan | rocanā | divaḥ | janayan | ap-su | sūryam || vasānaḥ | gāḥ | apaḥ | hariḥ ||9.42.1||

IAST: eṣa pratnena manmanā devo devebhyas pari
Griffith: According to primeval plan this Soma, with his stream, effused
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | pratnena | manmanā | devaḥ | devebhyaḥ | pari || dhārayā | pavate | sutaḥ ||9.42.2||

IAST: dhārayā pavate sutaḥ
Griffith: Flows purely on, a God for Gods.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | pratnena | manmanā | devaḥ | devebhyaḥ | pari || dhārayā | pavate | sutaḥ ||9.42.2||

IAST: vāvṛdhānāya tūrvaye pavante vājasātaye
Griffith: For him victorious, waxen great, the juices with a thousand powers
pada pāṭha: vavr̥dhānāya | tūrvaye | pavante | vāja-sātaye || somāḥ | sahasra-pājasaḥ ||9.42.3||

IAST: somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ
Griffith: Are purified for winning spoil.
pada pāṭha: vavr̥dhānāya | tūrvaye | pavante | vāja-sātaye || somāḥ | sahasra-pājasaḥ ||9.42.3||

IAST: duhānaḥ pratnam it payaḥ pavitre pari ṣicyate
Griffith: Shedding the ancient fluid he is poured into the cleansing sieve:
pada pāṭha: duhānaḥ | pratnam | it | payaḥ | pavitre | pari | sicyate || krandan | devān | ajījanat ||9.42.4||

IAST: krandan devām̐ ajījanat
Griffith: He, thundering, hath produced the Gods.
pada pāṭha: duhānaḥ | pratnam | it | payaḥ | pavitre | pari | sicyate || krandan | devān | ajījanat ||9.42.4||

IAST: abhi viśvāni vāryābhi devām̐ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
Griffith: Soma, while purifying, sends hither all things to be desired,
pada pāṭha: abhi | viśvāni | vāryā | abhi | devān | r̥ta-vr̥dhaḥ || somaḥ | punānaḥ | arṣati ||9.42.5||

IAST: somaḥ punāno arṣati
Griffith: He sends the Gods who strengthen Law.
pada pāṭha: abhi | viśvāni | vāryā | abhi | devān | r̥ta-vr̥dhaḥ || somaḥ | punānaḥ | arṣati ||9.42.5||

IAST: goman naḥ soma vīravad aśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ
Griffith: Soma, effused, pour on us wealth in kine, in heroes, steeds, and spoil,
pada pāṭha: go-mat | naḥ | soma | vīra-vat | aśva-vat | vāja-vat | sutaḥ || pavasva | br̥hatīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.42.6||

IAST: pavasva bṛhatīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: Send us abundant store of food.
pada pāṭha: go-mat | naḥ | soma | vīra-vat | aśva-vat | vāja-vat | sutaḥ || pavasva | br̥hatīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.42.6||

IAST: yo atya iva mṛjyate gobhir madāya haryataḥ
Griffith: WE will enrobe with sacred song the Lovely One who, as a Steed,
Devanāgarī: यो अत्य इव मृज्यते गोभिर्मदाय हर्यतः
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | atyaḥ-iva | mr̥jyate | gobhiḥ | madāya | haryataḥ || tam | gīḥ-bhiḥ | vāsayāmasi ||9.43.1||

IAST: taṁ gīrbhir vāsayāmasi
Griffith: Is decked with milk for rapturous joy.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | atyaḥ-iva | mr̥jyate | gobhiḥ | madāya | haryataḥ || tam | gīḥ-bhiḥ | vāsayāmasi ||9.43.1||

IAST: taṁ no viśvā avasyuvo giraḥ śumbhanti pūrvathā
Griffith: All songs of ours desiring grace adorn him in the ancient way,
Devanāgarī: तं नो विश्वा अवस्युवो गिरः शुम्भन्ति पूर्वथा
pada pāṭha: tam | naḥ | viśvāḥ | avasyuvaḥ | giraḥ | śumbhanti | pūrva-thā || indum | indrāya | pītaye ||9.43.2||

IAST: indum indrāya pītaye
Griffith: Indu for Indra, for his drink.
pada pāṭha: tam | naḥ | viśvāḥ | avasyuvaḥ | giraḥ | śumbhanti | pūrva-thā || indum | indrāya | pītaye ||9.43.2||

IAST: punāno yāti haryataḥ somo gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ
Griffith: Soma flows on when purified, beloved and adorned with songs,
Devanāgarī: पुनानो याति हर्यतः सोमो गीर्भिः परिष्कृतः
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | yāti | haryataḥ | somaḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | pari-kr̥taḥ || viprasya | medhya-atitheḥ ||9.43.3||

IAST: viprasya medhyātitheḥ
Griffith: Songs of the sage Medhyatithi.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | yāti | haryataḥ | somaḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | pari-kr̥taḥ || viprasya | medhya-atitheḥ ||9.43.3||

IAST: pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṁ soma suśriyam
Griffith: O Soma Pavamana, find exceeding glorious wealth for us,
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | vidāḥ | rayim | asmabhyam | soma | su-śriyam || indo iti | sahasra-varcasam ||9.43.4||

IAST: indo sahasravarcasam
Griffith: Wealth, Indu, fraught with boundless might.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | vidāḥ | rayim | asmabhyam | soma | su-śriyam || indo iti | sahasra-varcasam ||9.43.4||

IAST: indur atyo na vājasṛt kanikranti pavitra ā
Griffith: Like courser racing to the prize Indu, the lover of the Gods,
pada pāṭha: induḥ | atyaḥ | na | vāja-sr̥t | kanikranti | pavitre | ā || yat | akṣāḥ | ati | deva-yuḥ ||9.43.5||

IAST: yad akṣār ati devayuḥ
Griffith: Roars, as he passes, in the sieve.
pada pāṭha: induḥ | atyaḥ | na | vāja-sr̥t | kanikranti | pavitre | ā || yat | akṣāḥ | ati | deva-yuḥ ||9.43.5||

IAST: pavasva vājasātaye viprasya gṛṇato vṛdhe
Griffith: Flow on thy way to win us strength, to speed the sage who praises thee:
pada pāṭha: pavasva | vāja-sātaye | viprasya | gr̥ṇataḥ | vr̥dhe || soma | rāsva | su-vīryam ||9.43.6||

IAST: soma rāsva suvīryam
Griffith: Soma, bestow heroic power.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | vāja-sātaye | viprasya | gr̥ṇataḥ | vr̥dhe || soma | rāsva | su-vīryam ||9.43.6||

IAST: pra ṇa indo mahe tana ūrmiṁ na bibhrad arṣasi
Griffith: INDU, to us for this great rite, bearing as 'twere thy wave to Gods,
Devanāgarī: प्र ण इन्दो महे तन ऊर्मिं न बिभ्रदर्षसि
pada pāṭha: pra | naḥ | indo iti | mahe | tane | ūrmim | na | bibhrat | arṣasi || abhi | devān | ayāsyaḥ ||9.44.1||

IAST: abhi devām̐ ayāsyaḥ
Griffith: Unwearied, thou art flowing forQh.
pada pāṭha: pra | naḥ | indo iti | mahe | tane | ūrmim | na | bibhrat | arṣasi || abhi | devān | ayāsyaḥ ||9.44.1||

IAST: matī juṣṭo dhiyā hitaḥ somo hinve parāvati
Griffith: Pleased with the hymn, impelled by prayer, Soma is hurried far away,
Devanāgarī: मती जुष्टो धिया हितः सोमो हिन्वे परावति
pada pāṭha: matī | juṣṭaḥ | dhiyā | hitaḥ | somaḥ | hinve | parā-vati || viprasya | dhārayā | kaviḥ ||9.44.2||

IAST: viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ
Griffith: The Wise One in the Singer's stream.,
pada pāṭha: matī | juṣṭaḥ | dhiyā | hitaḥ | somaḥ | hinve | parā-vati || viprasya | dhārayā | kaviḥ ||9.44.2||

IAST: ayaṁ deveṣu jāgṛviḥ suta eti pavitra ā
Griffith: Watchful among the. gods, this juice advances to the cleansing sieve
Devanāgarī: अयं देवेषु जागृविः सुत एति पवित्र आ
pada pāṭha: ayam | deveṣu | jāgr̥viḥ | sutaḥ | eti | pavitre | ā || somaḥ | yāti | vi-carṣaṇiḥ ||9.44.3||

IAST: somo yāti vicarṣaṇiḥ
Griffith: Soma, most active, travels on.
pada pāṭha: ayam | deveṣu | jāgr̥viḥ | sutaḥ | eti | pavitre | ā || somaḥ | yāti | vi-carṣaṇiḥ ||9.44.3||

IAST: sa naḥ pavasva vājayuś cakrāṇaś cārum adhvaram
Griffith: Flow onward, seeking strength for us, embellishing the sacrifice:
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | pavasva | vāja-yuḥ | cakrāṇaḥ | cārum | adhvaram || barhiṣmān | ā | vivāsati ||9.44.4||

IAST: barhiṣmām̐ ā vivāsati
Griffith: The priest with trimmed grass calleth thee.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | pavasva | vāja-yuḥ | cakrāṇaḥ | cārum | adhvaram || barhiṣmān | ā | vivāsati ||9.44.4||

IAST: sa no bhagāya vāyave vipravīraḥ sadāvṛdhaḥ
Griffith: May Soma, ever bringing power to Bhaga and to Vayu, Sage
Devanāgarī: स नो भगाय वायवे विप्रवीरः सदावृधः
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | bhagāya | vāyave | vipra-vīraḥ | sadā-vr̥dhaḥ || somaḥ | deveṣu | ā | yamat ||9.44.5||

IAST: somo deveṣv ā yamat
Griffith: And Hero, lead us to the Gods.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | bhagāya | vāyave | vipra-vīraḥ | sadā-vr̥dhaḥ || somaḥ | deveṣu | ā | yamat ||9.44.5||

IAST: sa no adya vasuttaye kratuvid gātuvittamaḥ
Griffith: So, to increase our wealth to-day, Inspirer, best of Furtherers,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | adya | vasuttaye | kratu-vit | gātuvit-tamaḥ || vājam | jeṣi | śravaḥ | br̥hat ||9.44.6||

IAST: vājaṁ jeṣi śravo bṛhat
Griffith: Win for us strength and high renown.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | adya | vasuttaye | kratu-vit | gātuvit-tamaḥ || vājam | jeṣi | śravaḥ | br̥hat ||9.44.6||

IAST: sa pavasva madāya kaṁ nṛcakṣā devavītaye
Griffith: FLOW, thou who viewest men, to give delight, to entertain the Gods,
Devanāgarī: स पवस्व मदाय कं नृचक्षा देववीतये
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | madāya | kam | nr̥-cakṣāḥ | deva-vītaye || indo iti | indrāya | pītaye ||9.45.1||

IAST: indav indrāya pītaye
Griffith: Indu, to Indra for his drink.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | madāya | kam | nr̥-cakṣāḥ | deva-vītaye || indo iti | indrāya | pītaye ||9.45.1||

IAST: sa no arṣābhi dūtyaṁ tvam indrāya tośase
Griffith: Stream to thine embassy for us: thou hastenest, for Indra, to
Devanāgarī: स नो अर्षाभि दूत्यं त्वमिन्द्राय तोशसे
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | arṣa | abhi | dūtyam | tvam | indrāya | tośase || devān | sakhi-bhyaḥ | ā | varam ||9.45.2||

IAST: devān sakhibhya ā varam
Griffith: The Gods, O better than our friends.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | arṣa | abhi | dūtyam | tvam | indrāya | tośase || devān | sakhi-bhyaḥ | ā | varam ||9.45.2||

IAST: uta tvām aruṇaṁ vayaṁ gobhir añjmo madāya kam
Griffith: We balm thee, red of hue, with milk to fit thee for the rapturous joy:
Devanāgarī: उत त्वामरुणं वयं गोभिरञ्ज्मो मदाय कम्
pada pāṭha: uta | tvām | aruṇam | vayam | gobhiḥ | añjmaḥ | madāya | kam || vi | naḥ | rāye | duraḥ | vr̥dhi ||9.45.3||

IAST: vi no rāye duro vṛdhi
Griffith: Unbar for us the doors of wealth.
pada pāṭha: uta | tvām | aruṇam | vayam | gobhiḥ | añjmaḥ | madāya | kam || vi | naḥ | rāye | duraḥ | vr̥dhi ||9.45.3||

IAST: aty ū pavitram akramīd vājī dhuraṁ na yāmani
Griffith: He through the sieve hath passed, as comes a courser to the pole, to run
pada pāṭha: ati | ūm̐ iti | pavitram | akramīt | vājī | dhuram | na | yāmani || induḥ | deveṣu | patyate ||9.45.4||

IAST: indur deveṣu patyate
Griffith: Indu belongs unto the Gods.
pada pāṭha: ati | ūm̐ iti | pavitram | akramīt | vājī | dhuram | na | yāmani || induḥ | deveṣu | patyate ||9.45.4||

IAST: sam ī sakhāyo asvaran vane krīḻantam atyavim
Griffith: All friends have lauded him as he sports in the wood, beyond the fleece:
pada pāṭha: sam | īmiti | sakhāyaḥ | asvaran | vane | krīḷantam | ati-avim || indum | nāvāḥ | anūṣata ||9.45.5||

IAST: induṁ nāvā anūṣata
Griffith: Singers have chanted Indu's praise.
pada pāṭha: sam | īmiti | sakhāyaḥ | asvaran | vane | krīḷantam | ati-avim || indum | nāvāḥ | anūṣata ||9.45.5||

IAST: tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā pīto vicakṣase
Griffith: Flow, Indu, with that stream wherein steeped thou announcest to the man
Devanāgarī: तया पवस्व धारया यया पीतो विचक्षसे
pada pāṭha: tayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | pītaḥ | vi-cakṣase || indo iti | stotre | su-vīryam ||9.45.6||

IAST: indo stotre suvīryam
Griffith: Who worships thee heroic strength.
pada pāṭha: tayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | pītaḥ | vi-cakṣase || indo iti | stotre | su-vīryam ||9.45.6||

IAST: asṛgran devavītaye 'tyāsaḥ kṛtvyā iva
Griffith: LIKE able coursers they have been sent forth to be the feast of Gods,
pada pāṭha: asr̥gran | deva-vītaye | atyāsaḥ | kr̥tvyāḥ-iva || kṣarantaḥ | parvata-vr̥dhaḥ ||9.46.1||

IAST: kṣarantaḥ parvatāvṛdhaḥ
Griffith: joying in mountains, flowing on.
pada pāṭha: asr̥gran | deva-vītaye | atyāsaḥ | kr̥tvyāḥ-iva || kṣarantaḥ | parvata-vr̥dhaḥ ||9.46.1||

IAST: pariṣkṛtāsa indavo yoṣeva pitryāvatī
Griffith: To Vayu flow the Soma-streams, the drops of juice made beautiful
pada pāṭha: pari-kr̥tāsaḥ | indavaḥ | yoṣā-iva | pitrya-vatī || vāyum | somāḥ | asr̥kṣata ||9.46.2||

IAST: vāyuṁ somā asṛkṣata
Griffith: Like a bride dowered by her sire.
pada pāṭha: pari-kr̥tāsaḥ | indavaḥ | yoṣā-iva | pitrya-vatī || vāyum | somāḥ | asr̥kṣata ||9.46.2||

IAST: ete somāsa indavaḥ prayasvantaś camū sutāḥ
Griffith: Pressed in the mortar, these, the drops of juice, the Somas rich in food,
pada pāṭha: ete | somāsaḥ | indavaḥ | prayasvantaḥ | camū iti | sutāḥ || indram | vardhanti | karma-bhiḥ ||9.46.3||

IAST: indraṁ vardhanti karmabhiḥ
Griffith: Give strength to Indra with their work.
pada pāṭha: ete | somāsaḥ | indavaḥ | prayasvantaḥ | camū iti | sutāḥ || indram | vardhanti | karma-bhiḥ ||9.46.3||

IAST: ā dhāvatā suhastyaḥ śukrā gṛbhṇīta manthinā
Griffith: Deft-handed men, run hither, seize the brilliant juices blent with meal,
Devanāgarī: आ धावता सुहस्त्यः शुक्रा गृभ्णीत मन्थिना
pada pāṭha: ā | dhāvata | su-hastyaḥ | śukrā | gr̥bhṇīta | manthinā || gobhiḥ | śrīṇīta | matsaram ||9.46.4||

IAST: gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram
Griffith: And cook with milk the gladdening draught.
pada pāṭha: ā | dhāvata | su-hastyaḥ | śukrā | gr̥bhṇīta | manthinā || gobhiḥ | śrīṇīta | matsaram ||9.46.4||

IAST: sa pavasva dhanaṁjaya prayantā rādhaso mahaḥ
Griffith: Thus, Soma, Conqueror of wealth! flow, finding furtherance for us,
Devanāgarī: स पवस्व धनंजय प्रयन्ता राधसो महः
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | dhanam-jaya | pra-yantā | rādhasaḥ | mahaḥ || asmabhyam | soma | gātu-vit ||9.46.5||

IAST: asmabhyaṁ soma gātuvit
Griffith: Giver oF ample opulence.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | dhanam-jaya | pra-yantā | rādhasaḥ | mahaḥ || asmabhyam | soma | gātu-vit ||9.46.5||

IAST: etam mṛjanti marjyam pavamānaṁ daśa kṣipaḥ
Griffith: This Pavamana, meet to be adorned, the fingers ten adorn,
Devanāgarī: एतं मृजन्ति मर्ज्यं पवमानं दश क्षिपः
pada pāṭha: etam | mr̥janti | marjyam | pavamānam | daśa | kṣipaḥ || indrāya | matsaram | madam ||9.46.6||

IAST: indrāya matsaram madam
Griffith: The draught that shall make Indra glad.
pada pāṭha: etam | mr̥janti | marjyam | pavamānam | daśa | kṣipaḥ || indrāya | matsaram | madam ||9.46.6||

IAST: ayā somaḥ sukṛtyayā mahaś cid abhy avardhata
Griffith: GREAT as he was, Soma hath gained strength by this high solemnity:
pada pāṭha: ayā | somaḥ | su-kr̥tyayā | mahaḥ | cit | abhi | avardhata || mandānaḥ | ut | vr̥ṣa-yate ||9.47.1||

IAST: mandāna ud vṛṣāyate
Griffith: joyous he riseth like a bull.
pada pāṭha: ayā | somaḥ | su-kr̥tyayā | mahaḥ | cit | abhi | avardhata || mandānaḥ | ut | vr̥ṣa-yate ||9.47.1||

IAST: kṛtānīd asya kartvā cetante dasyutarhaṇā
Griffith: His task is done: his crushings of the Dasyus are made manifest:
pada pāṭha: kr̥tāni | it | asya | kartvā | cetante | dasyu-tarhaṇā || r̥ṇā | ca | dhr̥ṣṇuḥ | cayate ||9.47.2||

IAST: ṛṇā ca dhṛṣṇuś cayate
Griffith: He sternly reckoneth their debts.
pada pāṭha: kr̥tāni | it | asya | kartvā | cetante | dasyu-tarhaṇā || r̥ṇā | ca | dhr̥ṣṇuḥ | cayate ||9.47.2||

IAST: āt soma indriyo raso vajraḥ sahasrasā bhuvat
Griffith: Soon as his song of praise is born, the Soma, Indra's juice, becomes
Devanāgarī: आत्सोम इन्द्रियो रसो वज्रः सहस्रसा भुवत्
pada pāṭha: āt | somaḥ | indriyaḥ | rasaḥ | vajraḥ | sahasra-sāḥ | bhuvat || uktham | yat | asya | jāyate ||9.47.3||

IAST: ukthaṁ yad asya jāyate
Griffith: A thousand-winning thunderbolt.
pada pāṭha: āt | somaḥ | indriyaḥ | rasaḥ | vajraḥ | sahasra-sāḥ | bhuvat || uktham | yat | asya | jāyate ||9.47.3||

IAST: svayaṁ kavir vidhartari viprāya ratnam icchati
Griffith: Seer and Sustainer, he himself desireth riches for the sage
pada pāṭha: svayam | kaviḥ | vi-dhartari | viprāya | ratnam | icchati || yadi | marmr̥jyate | dhiyaḥ ||9.47.4||

IAST: yadī marmṛjyate dhiyaḥ
Griffith: When he embellisheth his songs.
pada pāṭha: svayam | kaviḥ | vi-dhartari | viprāya | ratnam | icchati || yadi | marmr̥jyate | dhiyaḥ ||9.47.4||

IAST: siṣāsatū rayīṇāṁ vājeṣv arvatām iva
Griffith: Fain would they both win riches as in races of the steeds. In war
pada pāṭha: sisāsatuḥ | rayīṇām | vājeṣu | arvatām-iva || bhareṣu | jigyuṣām | asi ||9.47.5||

IAST: bhareṣu jigyuṣām asi
Griffith: Thou art upon the conquerors' side.
pada pāṭha: sisāsatuḥ | rayīṇām | vājeṣu | arvatām-iva || bhareṣu | jigyuṣām | asi ||9.47.5||

IAST: taṁ tvā nṛmṇāni bibhrataṁ sadhastheṣu maho divaḥ
Griffith: WITH sacrifice we seek to thee kind Cherisher of manly might
Devanāgarī: तं त्वा नृम्णानि बिभ्रतं सधस्थेषु महो दिवः
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | nr̥mṇāni | vibhratam | sadha-stheṣu | mahaḥ | divaḥ || cārum | su-kr̥tyayā | īmahe ||9.48.1||

IAST: cāruṁ sukṛtyayemahe
Griffith: In mansions of the lofty heavens;
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | nr̥mṇāni | vibhratam | sadha-stheṣu | mahaḥ | divaḥ || cārum | su-kr̥tyayā | īmahe ||9.48.1||

IAST: saṁvṛktadhṛṣṇum ukthyam mahāmahivratam madam
Griffith: Gladdening crusher of the bold, ruling with very mighty sway,
pada pāṭha: saṁvr̥kta-dhr̥ṣṇum | ukthyam | mahā-mahivratam | madam || śatam | puraḥ | rurukṣaṇim ||9.48.2||

IAST: śatam puro rurukṣaṇim
Griffith: Destroyer of a hundred forts.
pada pāṭha: saṁvr̥kta-dhr̥ṣṇum | ukthyam | mahā-mahivratam | madam || śatam | puraḥ | rurukṣaṇim ||9.48.2||

IAST: atas tvā rayim abhi rājānaṁ sukrato divaḥ
Griffith: Hence, Sapient One! the Falcon, strong of wing, unwearied, brought thee down,
pada pāṭha: ataḥ | tvā | rayim | abhi | rājānam | sukrato iti su-krato | divaḥ || su-parṇaḥ | avyathiḥ | bharat ||9.48.3||

IAST: suparṇo avyathir bharat
Griffith: Lord over riches, from the sky.
pada pāṭha: ataḥ | tvā | rayim | abhi | rājānam | sukrato iti su-krato | divaḥ || su-parṇaḥ | avyathiḥ | bharat ||9.48.3||

IAST: viśvasmā it svar dṛśe sādhāraṇaṁ rajasturam
Griffith: That each may see the light, the Bird brought us the guard of Law, the Friend
pada pāṭha: viśvasmai | it | svaḥ | dr̥śe | sādhāraṇam | rajaḥ-turam || gopām | r̥tasya | viḥ | bharat ||9.48.4||

IAST: gopām ṛtasya vir bharat
Griffith: Of all, the speeder through the air.
pada pāṭha: viśvasmai | it | svaḥ | dr̥śe | sādhāraṇam | rajaḥ-turam || gopām | r̥tasya | viḥ | bharat ||9.48.4||

IAST: adhā hinvāna indriyaṁ jyāyo mahitvam ānaśe
Griffith: And now, sent forth, it hath attained to mighty power and majesty,
pada pāṭha: adha | hinvānaḥ | indriyam | jyāyaḥ | mahi-tvam | ānaśe || abhiṣṭi-kr̥t | vi-carṣaṇiḥ ||9.48.5||

IAST: abhiṣṭikṛd vicarṣaṇiḥ
Griffith: Most active, ready to assist.
pada pāṭha: adha | hinvānaḥ | indriyam | jyāyaḥ | mahi-tvam | ānaśe || abhiṣṭi-kr̥t | vi-carṣaṇiḥ ||9.48.5||

IAST: pavasva vṛṣṭim ā su no 'pām ūrmiṁ divas pari
Griffith: Poust down the rain upon us, pour a wave of waters from the sky,
pada pāṭha: pavasva | vr̥ṣṭim | ā | su | naḥ | apām | ūrmim | divaḥ | pari || ayakṣmāḥ | br̥hatīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.49.1||

IAST: ayakṣmā bṛhatīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: And plenteous store of wholesome fbod.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | vr̥ṣṭim | ā | su | naḥ | apām | ūrmim | divaḥ | pari || ayakṣmāḥ | br̥hatīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.49.1||

IAST: tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā gāva ihāgaman
Griffith: Flow onward with that stream of thine, whereby the cows have come to us,
Devanāgarī: तया पवस्व धारया यया गाव इहागमन्
pada pāṭha: tayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | gāvaḥ | iha | ā-gaman || janyāsaḥ | upa | naḥ | gr̥ham ||9.49.2||

IAST: janyāsa upa no gṛham
Griffith: The kine of strangers to our home.
pada pāṭha: tayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | gāvaḥ | iha | ā-gaman || janyāsaḥ | upa | naḥ | gr̥ham ||9.49.2||

IAST: ghṛtam pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu devavītamaḥ
Griffith: Chief Friend of Gods in sacred rites, pour on us fatness with thy stream,
pada pāṭha: ghr̥tam | pavasva | dhārayā | yajñeṣu | deva-vītamaḥ || asmabhyam | vr̥ṣṭim | ā | pava ||9.49.3||

IAST: asmabhyaṁ vṛṣṭim ā pava
Griffith: Ppur down on us a flood of rain.
pada pāṭha: ghr̥tam | pavasva | dhārayā | yajñeṣu | deva-vītamaḥ || asmabhyam | vr̥ṣṭim | ā | pava ||9.49.3||

IAST: sa na ūrje vy avyayam pavitraṁ dhāva dhārayā
Griffith: To give us vigour, with thy stream run through the fleecy straining-cloth
Devanāgarī: स न ऊर्जे व्यव्ययं पवित्रं धाव धारया
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | ūrje | vi | avyayam | pavitram | dhāva | dhārayā || devāsaḥ | śr̥ṇavan | hi | kam ||9.49.4||

IAST: devāsaḥ śṛṇavan hi kam
Griffith: For verily the Gods will bear.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | ūrje | vi | avyayam | pavitram | dhāva | dhārayā || devāsaḥ | śr̥ṇavan | hi | kam ||9.49.4||

IAST: pavamāno asiṣyadad rakṣāṁsy apajaṅghanat
Griffith: Onward hath Pavamana flowed and beaten off the Raksasas,
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | asisyadat | rakṣāṁsi | apa-jaṅghanat || pratna-vat | rocayan | rucaḥ ||9.49.5||

IAST: pratnavad rocayan rucaḥ
Griffith: Flashing out splendour as of old.
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | asisyadat | rakṣāṁsi | apa-jaṅghanat || pratna-vat | rocayan | rucaḥ ||9.49.5||

IAST: ut te śuṣmāsa īrate sindhor ūrmer iva svanaḥ
Griffith: LOUD as a river's roaring wave thy powers have lifted up themselves:
pada pāṭha: ut | te | śuṣmāsaḥ | īrate | sindhoḥ | ūrmeḥ-iva | svanaḥ || vāṇasya | codaya | pavim ||9.50.1||

IAST: vāṇasya codayā pavim
Griffith: Urge on thine arrow's sharpened point.
pada pāṭha: ut | te | śuṣmāsaḥ | īrate | sindhoḥ | ūrmeḥ-iva | svanaḥ || vāṇasya | codaya | pavim ||9.50.1||

IAST: prasave ta ud īrate tisro vāco makhasyuvaḥ
Griffith: At thine effusion upward rise three voices full of joy, when thou
Devanāgarī: प्रसवे त उदीरते तिस्रो वाचो मखस्युवः
pada pāṭha: pra-save | te | ut | īrate | tisraḥ | vācaḥ | makhasyuvaḥ || yat | avye | eṣi | sānavi ||9.50.2||

IAST: yad avya eṣi sānavi
Griffith: Flowest upon the fleecy ridge.
pada pāṭha: pra-save | te | ut | īrate | tisraḥ | vācaḥ | makhasyuvaḥ || yat | avye | eṣi | sānavi ||9.50.2||

IAST: avyo vāre pari priyaṁ hariṁ hinvanty adribhiḥ
Griffith: On to the fleece they urge with stone the tawny well-beloved One,
Devanāgarī: अव्यो वारे परि प्रियं हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः
pada pāṭha: avyaḥ | vāre | pari | priyam | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || pavamānam | madhu-ścutam ||9.50.3||

IAST: pavamānam madhuścutam
Griffith: Even Pavamana, dropping meath.
pada pāṭha: avyaḥ | vāre | pari | priyam | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || pavamānam | madhu-ścutam ||9.50.3||

IAST: ā pavasva madintama pavitraṁ dhārayā kave
Griffith: Flow with thy current to the sieve, O Sage most powerful to cheer,
Devanāgarī: आ पवस्व मदिन्तम पवित्रं धारया कवे
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | madin-tama | pavitram | dhārayā | kave || arkasya | yonim | ā-sadam ||9.50.4||

IAST: arkasya yonim āsadam
Griffith: To seat thee in the place of song.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | madin-tama | pavitram | dhārayā | kave || arkasya | yonim | ā-sadam ||9.50.4||

IAST: sa pavasva madintama gobhir añjāno aktubhiḥ
Griffith: Flow, Most Exhilarating! flow anointed with the milk for balm,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | madin-tama | gobhiḥ | añjānaḥ | aktu-bhiḥ || indo iti | indrāya | pītaye ||9.50.5||

IAST: indav indrāya pītaye
Griffith: Indu, for Indra, for his drink.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | madin-tama | gobhiḥ | añjānaḥ | aktu-bhiḥ || indo iti | indrāya | pītaye ||9.50.5||

IAST: adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutaṁ somam pavitra ā sṛja
Griffith: ADHVARYU, on the filter pour the Soma juice expressed with stones,
Devanāgarī: अध्वर्यो अद्रिभिः सुतं सोमं पवित्र आ सृज
pada pāṭha: adhvaryo iti | adri-bhiḥ | sutam | somam | pavitre | ā | sr̥ja || punīhi | indrāya | pātave ||9.51.1||

IAST: punīhīndrāya pātave
Griffith: And make it pure for Indra's drink.
pada pāṭha: adhvaryo iti | adri-bhiḥ | sutam | somam | pavitre | ā | sr̥ja || punīhi | indrāya | pātave ||9.51.1||

IAST: divaḥ pīyūṣam uttamaṁ somam indrāya vajriṇe
Griffith: Pour out for Indra, Thunder-armed, the milk of heaven,, the Soma's juice,
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | pīyūṣam | ut-tamam | somam | indrāya | vajriṇe || sunota | madhumat-tamam ||9.51.2||

IAST: sunotā madhumattamam
Griffith: Most excellent, most rich in sweets.
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | pīyūṣam | ut-tamam | somam | indrāya | vajriṇe || sunota | madhumat-tamam ||9.51.2||

IAST: tava tya indo andhaso devā madhor vy aśnate
Griffith: These Gods and all the Marut host, Indu enjoy this juice of thine,
Devanāgarī: तव त्य इन्दो अन्धसो देवा मधोर्व्यश्नते
pada pāṭha: tava | tye | indo iti | andhasaḥ | devāḥ | madhoḥ | vi | aśnate || pavamānasya | marutaḥ ||9.51.3||

IAST: pavamānasya marutaḥ
Griffith: This Pavamana's flowing meath.
pada pāṭha: tava | tye | indo iti | andhasaḥ | devāḥ | madhoḥ | vi | aśnate || pavamānasya | marutaḥ ||9.51.3||

IAST: tvaṁ hi soma vardhayan suto madāya bhūrṇaye
Griffith: For, Soma, thou hast been effused, strengthening for the wild carouse,
Devanāgarī: त्वं हि सोम वर्धयन्सुतो मदाय भूर्णये
pada pāṭha: tvam | hi | soma | vardhayan | sutaḥ | madāya | bhūrṇaye || vr̥ṣan | stotāram | ūtaye ||9.51.4||

IAST: vṛṣan stotāram ūtaye
Griffith: O Steer, the singer, for our help.
pada pāṭha: tvam | hi | soma | vardhayan | sutaḥ | madāya | bhūrṇaye || vr̥ṣan | stotāram | ūtaye ||9.51.4||

IAST: abhy arṣa vicakṣaṇa pavitraṁ dhārayā sutaḥ
Griffith: Flow with thy stream, Far-sighted One, effused, into the cleansing sieve:
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | vi-cakṣaṇa | pavitram | dhārayā | sutaḥ || abhi | vājam | uta | śravaḥ ||9.51.5||

IAST: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ
Griffith: Flow on to give us strength and fame.
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | vi-cakṣaṇa | pavitram | dhārayā | sutaḥ || abhi | vājam | uta | śravaḥ ||9.51.5||

IAST: pari dyukṣaḥ sanadrayir bharad vājaṁ no andhasā
Griffith: WEALTH-WINNER, dwelling in the sky, bringing us vigour with the juice,
pada pāṭha: pari | dyukṣaḥ | sanat-rayiḥ | bharat | vājam | naḥ | andhasā || suvānaḥ | arṣa | pavitre | ā ||9.52.1||

IAST: suvāno arṣa pavitra ā
Griffith: Flow to the filter when effused.
pada pāṭha: pari | dyukṣaḥ | sanat-rayiḥ | bharat | vājam | naḥ | andhasā || suvānaḥ | arṣa | pavitre | ā ||9.52.1||

IAST: tava pratnebhir adhvabhir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ
Griffith: So, in thine ancient ways, may he, beloved, with a thousand streams
pada pāṭha: tava | pratnebhiḥ | adhva-bhiḥ | avyaḥ | vāre | pari | priyaḥ || sahasra-dhāraḥ | yāt | tanā ||9.52.2||

IAST: sahasradhāro yāt tanā
Griffith: Run o'er the fleecy straining-cloth.
pada pāṭha: tava | pratnebhiḥ | adhva-bhiḥ | avyaḥ | vāre | pari | priyaḥ || sahasra-dhāraḥ | yāt | tanā ||9.52.2||

IAST: carur na yas tam īṅkhayendo na dānam īṅkhaya
Griffith: Him who is like a caldron shake: O Indu, shake thy gift to us
pada pāṭha: caruḥ | na | yaḥ | tam | īṅkhaya | indo iti | na | dānam | īṅkhaya || vadhaiḥ | vadhasno iti vadha-sno | īṅkhaya ||9.52.3||

IAST: vadhair vadhasnav īṅkhaya
Griffith: Shake it, armed Warrior! with thine arms.
pada pāṭha: caruḥ | na | yaḥ | tam | īṅkhaya | indo iti | na | dānam | īṅkhaya || vadhaiḥ | vadhasno iti vadha-sno | īṅkhaya ||9.52.3||

IAST: ni śuṣmam indav eṣām puruhūta janānām
Griffith: Indu, invoked with many a prayer, bring down the vigour of these men,
pada pāṭha: ni | śuṣmam | indo iti | eṣām | puru-hūta | janānām || yaḥ | asmān | ā-dideśati ||9.52.4||

IAST: yo asmām̐ ādideśati
Griffith: Of him who threatens us with war.
pada pāṭha: ni | śuṣmam | indo iti | eṣām | puru-hūta | janānām || yaḥ | asmān | ā-dideśati ||9.52.4||

IAST: śataṁ na inda ūtibhiḥ sahasraṁ vā śucīnām
Griffith: Indu, Wealth-giver, with thine help pour out for us a hundred, yea,
Devanāgarī: शतं न इन्द ऊतिभिः सहस्रं वा शुचीनाम्
pada pāṭha: śatam | naḥ | indo iti | ūti-bhiḥ | sahasram | vā | śucīṇām || pavasva | maṁhayat-rayiḥ ||9.52.5||

IAST: pavasva maṁhayadrayiḥ
Griffith: A thousand of thy pure bright streams.
pada pāṭha: śatam | naḥ | indo iti | ūti-bhiḥ | sahasram | vā | śucīṇām || pavasva | maṁhayat-rayiḥ ||9.52.5||

IAST: ut te śuṣmāso asthū rakṣo bhindanto adrivaḥ
Griffith: O THOU with stones for arms, thy powers, crushing the fiends, have raised themselves:
Devanāgarī: उत्ते शुष्मासो अस्थू रक्षो भिन्दन्तो अद्रिवः
pada pāṭha: ut | te | śuṣmāsaḥ | asthuḥ | rakṣaḥ | bhindantaḥ | adri-vaḥ || nudasva | yāḥ | pari-spr̥dhaḥ ||9.53.1||

IAST: nudasva yāḥ parispṛdhaḥ
Griffith: Chase thou the foes who compass us.
pada pāṭha: ut | te | śuṣmāsaḥ | asthuḥ | rakṣaḥ | bhindantaḥ | adri-vaḥ || nudasva | yāḥ | pari-spr̥dhaḥ ||9.53.1||

IAST: ayā nijaghnir ojasā rathasaṁge dhane hite
Griffith: Thou conquerest thus with might when car meets car, and when the prize is staked:
pada pāṭha: ayā | ni-jaghniḥ | ojasā | ratha-saṅge | dhane | hite || stavai | abibhyuṣā | hr̥dā ||9.53.2||

IAST: stavā abibhyuṣā hṛdā
Griffith: With fearless heart will I sing praise.
pada pāṭha: ayā | ni-jaghniḥ | ojasā | ratha-saṅge | dhane | hite || stavai | abibhyuṣā | hr̥dā ||9.53.2||

IAST: asya vratāni nādhṛṣe pavamānasya dūḍhyā
Griffith: No one with evil thought assails this Pavamana's holy laws:
pada pāṭha: asya | vratāni | na | ā-dhr̥ṣe | pavamānasya | duḥ-dhyā || ruja | yaḥ | tvā | pr̥tanyati ||9.53.3||

IAST: ruja yas tvā pṛtanyati
Griffith: Crush him who fain would fight with thee.
pada pāṭha: asya | vratāni | na | ā-dhr̥ṣe | pavamānasya | duḥ-dhyā || ruja | yaḥ | tvā | pr̥tanyati ||9.53.3||

IAST: taṁ hinvanti madacyutaṁ hariṁ nadīṣu vājinam
Griffith: For Indra to the streams they drive the tawny rapture-dropping Steed,
Devanāgarī: तं हिन्वन्ति मदच्युतं हरिं नदीषु वाजिनम्
pada pāṭha: tam | hinvanti | mada-cyutam | harim | nadīṣu | vājinam || indum | indrāya | matsaram ||9.53.4||

IAST: indum indrāya matsaram
Griffith: Indu the bringer of delight.
pada pāṭha: tam | hinvanti | mada-cyutam | harim | nadīṣu | vājinam || indum | indrāya | matsaram ||9.53.4||

IAST: asya pratnām anu dyutaṁ śukraṁ duduhre ahrayaḥ
Griffith: AFTER his ancient splendour, they, the bold, have drawn the bright milk from
Devanāgarī: अस्य प्रत्नामनु द्युतं शुक्रं दुदुह्रे अह्रयः
pada pāṭha: asya | pratnām | anu | dyutam | śukram | duduhre | ahrayaḥ || payaḥ | sahasra-sām | r̥ṣim ||9.54.1||

IAST: payaḥ sahasrasām ṛṣim
Griffith: The Sage who wins a thousand gifts.
pada pāṭha: asya | pratnām | anu | dyutam | śukram | duduhre | ahrayaḥ || payaḥ | sahasra-sām | r̥ṣim ||9.54.1||

IAST: ayaṁ sūrya ivopadṛg ayaṁ sarāṁsi dhāvati
Griffith: In aspect he is like the Sun; he runneth forward to the lakes,
pada pāṭha: ayam | sūryaḥ-iva | upa-dr̥k | ayam | sarāṁsi | dhāvati || sapta | pra-vataḥ | ā | divam ||9.54.2||

IAST: sapta pravata ā divam
Griffith: Seven currents flowing through the sky.
pada pāṭha: ayam | sūryaḥ-iva | upa-dr̥k | ayam | sarāṁsi | dhāvati || sapta | pra-vataḥ | ā | divam ||9.54.2||

IAST: ayaṁ viśvāni tiṣṭhati punāno bhuvanopari
Griffith: He, shining in his splendour, stands high over all things that exist-
pada pāṭha: ayam | viśvāni | tiṣṭhati | punānaḥ | bhuvanā | upari || somaḥ | devaḥ | na | sūryaḥ ||9.54.3||

IAST: somo devo na sūryaḥ
Griffith: Soma, a God as Surya is.
pada pāṭha: ayam | viśvāni | tiṣṭhati | punānaḥ | bhuvanā | upari || somaḥ | devaḥ | na | sūryaḥ ||9.54.3||

IAST: pari ṇo devavītaye vājām̐ arṣasi gomataḥ
Griffith: Thou, Indu, in thy brilliancy, pourest on us, as Indra's Friend,
Devanāgarī: परि णो देववीतये वाजाँ अर्षसि गोमतः
pada pāṭha: pari | naḥ | deva-vītaye | vājān | arṣasi | go-mataḥ || punānaḥ | indo iti | indra-yuḥ ||9.54.4||

IAST: punāna indav indrayuḥ
Griffith: Wealth from the kine to feast the Gods.
pada pāṭha: pari | naḥ | deva-vītaye | vājān | arṣasi | go-mataḥ || punānaḥ | indo iti | indra-yuḥ ||9.54.4||

IAST: yavaṁ-yavaṁ no andhasā puṣṭam-puṣṭam pari srava
Griffith: POUR on us with thy juice all kinds of corn, each sort of nourishment,
Devanāgarī: यवंयवं नो अन्धसा पुष्टम्पुष्टं परि स्रव
pada pāṭha: yavam-yavam | naḥ | andhasā | puṣṭam-puṣṭam | pari | srava || soma | viśvā | ca | saubhagā ||9.55.1||

IAST: soma viśvā ca saubhagā
Griffith: And, Soma, all felicities.
pada pāṭha: yavam-yavam | naḥ | andhasā | puṣṭam-puṣṭam | pari | srava || soma | viśvā | ca | saubhagā ||9.55.1||

IAST: indo yathā tava stavo yathā te jātam andhasaḥ
Griffith: As thine, O Indu, is the praise, and thine what springeth from the juice,
Devanāgarī: इन्दो यथा तव स्तवो यथा ते जातमन्धसः
pada pāṭha: indo iti | yathā | tava | stavaḥ | yathā | te | jātam | andhasaḥ || ni | barhiṣi | priye | sadaḥ ||9.55.2||

IAST: ni barhiṣi priye sadaḥ
Griffith: Seat thee on the dear sacred grass.
pada pāṭha: indo iti | yathā | tava | stavaḥ | yathā | te | jātam | andhasaḥ || ni | barhiṣi | priye | sadaḥ ||9.55.2||

IAST: uta no govid aśvavit pavasva somāndhasā
Griffith: And, finding for us kine and steeds, O Soma, with thy juice flow on
pada pāṭha: uta | naḥ | go-vit | aśva-vit | pavasva | soma | andhasā || makṣu-tamebhiḥ | aha-bhiḥ ||9.55.3||

IAST: makṣūtamebhir ahabhiḥ
Griffith: Through days that fly most rapidly.
pada pāṭha: uta | naḥ | go-vit | aśva-vit | pavasva | soma | andhasā || makṣu-tamebhiḥ | aha-bhiḥ ||9.55.3||

IAST: yo jināti na jīyate hanti śatrum abhītya
Griffith: As one who conquers, ne'er subdued, attacks and stays the enemy,
Devanāgarī: यो जिनाति न जीयते हन्ति शत्रुमभीत्य
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | jināti | na | jīyate | hanti | śatrum | abhi-itya || saḥ | pavasva | sahasra-jit ||9.55.4||

IAST: sa pavasva sahasrajit
Griffith: Thus, Vanquisher of thousands! flow.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | jināti | na | jīyate | hanti | śatrum | abhi-itya || saḥ | pavasva | sahasra-jit ||9.55.4||

IAST: pari soma ṛtam bṛhad āśuḥ pavitre arṣati
Griffith: SWIFT to the purifying sieve flows Soma as exalted Law,
Devanāgarī: परि सोम ऋतं बृहदाशुः पवित्रे अर्षति
pada pāṭha: pari | somaḥ | r̥tam | br̥hat | āśuḥ | pavitre | arṣati || vi-ghnan | rakṣāṁsi | deva-yuḥ ||9.56.1||

IAST: vighnan rakṣāṁsi devayuḥ
Griffith: Slaying the fiends, loving the Gods.
pada pāṭha: pari | somaḥ | r̥tam | br̥hat | āśuḥ | pavitre | arṣati || vi-ghnan | rakṣāṁsi | deva-yuḥ ||9.56.1||

IAST: yat somo vājam arṣati śataṁ dhārā apasyuvaḥ
Griffith: When Soma pours the strengthening food a hundred ever-active streams
pada pāṭha: yat | somaḥ | vājam | arṣati | śatam | dhārāḥ | apasyuvaḥ || indrasya | sakhyam | ā-viśan ||9.56.2||

IAST: indrasya sakhyam āviśan
Griffith: To Indra's friendship win theirway.
pada pāṭha: yat | somaḥ | vājam | arṣati | śatam | dhārāḥ | apasyuvaḥ || indrasya | sakhyam | ā-viśan ||9.56.2||

IAST: abhi tvā yoṣaṇo daśa jāraṁ na kanyānūṣata
Griffith: Ten Dames have sung to welcome thee, even as a maiden greets her love:
Devanāgarī: अभि त्वा योषणो दश जारं न कन्यानूषत
pada pāṭha: abhi | tvā | yoṣaṇaḥ | daśa | jāram | na | kanyā | anūṣata || mr̥jyase | soma | sātaye ||9.56.3||

IAST: mṛjyase soma sātaye
Griffith: O Soma, thou art decked to win.
pada pāṭha: abhi | tvā | yoṣaṇaḥ | daśa | jāram | na | kanyā | anūṣata || mr̥jyase | soma | sātaye ||9.56.3||

IAST: tvam indrāya viṣṇave svādur indo pari srava
Griffith: Flow hitherward, O Indu, sweet to Indra and to Visnu: guard
pada pāṭha: tvam | indrāya | viṣṇave | svāduḥ | indo iti | pari | srava || nr̥̄n | stotr̥̄n | pāhi | aṁhasaḥ ||9.56.4||

IAST: nṝn stotṝn pāhy aṁhasaḥ
Griffith: The men, the singers, from distress.
pada pāṭha: tvam | indrāya | viṣṇave | svāduḥ | indo iti | pari | srava || nr̥̄n | stotr̥̄n | pāhi | aṁhasaḥ ||9.56.4||

IAST: pra te dhārā asaścato divo na yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ
Griffith: THY streams that never fail or waste flow forth like showers of rain from heaven,
Devanāgarī: प्र ते धारा असश्चतो दिवो न यन्ति वृष्टयः
pada pāṭha: pra | te | dhārāḥ | asaścataḥ | divaḥ | na | yanti | vr̥ṣṭayaḥ || accha | vājam | sahasriṇam ||9.57.1||

IAST: acchā vājaṁ sahasriṇam
Griffith: To bring a thousand stores of strength.
pada pāṭha: pra | te | dhārāḥ | asaścataḥ | divaḥ | na | yanti | vr̥ṣṭayaḥ || accha | vājam | sahasriṇam ||9.57.1||

IAST: abhi priyāṇi kāvyā viśvā cakṣāṇo arṣati
Griffith: He flows beholding on his way all wellbeloved sacred lore,
Devanāgarī: अभि प्रियाणि काव्या विश्वा चक्षाणो अर्षति
pada pāṭha: abhi | priyāṇi | kāvyā | viśvā | cakṣāṇaḥ | arṣati || hariḥ | tuñjānaḥ | āyudhā ||9.57.2||

IAST: haris tuñjāna āyudhā
Griffith: Green-tinted, brandishing his, arms.
pada pāṭha: abhi | priyāṇi | kāvyā | viśvā | cakṣāṇaḥ | arṣati || hariḥ | tuñjānaḥ | āyudhā ||9.57.2||

IAST: sa marmṛjāna āyubhir ibho rājeva suvrataḥ
Griffith: He, when the people deck him like a docile king of elephants.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | marmr̥jānaḥ | āyu-bhiḥ | ibhaḥ | rājā-iva | su-vrataḥ || śyenaḥ | na | vaṁsu | sīdati ||9.57.3||

IAST: śyeno na vaṁsu ṣīdati
Griffith: Sits as a falcon in the, wood.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | marmr̥jānaḥ | āyu-bhiḥ | ibhaḥ | rājā-iva | su-vrataḥ || śyenaḥ | na | vaṁsu | sīdati ||9.57.3||

IAST: sa no viśvā divo vasūto pṛthivyā adhi
Griffith: So bring thou hitherward to us, Indu, while thou art purified,
Devanāgarī: स नो विश्वा दिवो वसूतो पृथिव्या अधि
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | viśvā | divaḥ | vasu | uto iti | pr̥thivyāḥ | adhi || punānaḥ | indo iti | ā | bhara ||9.57.4||

IAST: punāna indav ā bhara
Griffith: All treasures both of heaven and earth.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | viśvā | divaḥ | vasu | uto iti | pr̥thivyāḥ | adhi || punānaḥ | indo iti | ā | bhara ||9.57.4||

IAST: tarat sa mandī dhāvati dhārā sutasyāndhasaḥ
Griffith: SWIFT runs this giver of delight, even the stream of flowing juice:
pada pāṭha: tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati | dhārā | sutasya | andhasaḥ || tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati ||9.58.1||

IAST: tarat sa mandī dhāvati
Griffith: Swift runs this giver of delight.
pada pāṭha: tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati | dhārā | sutasya | andhasaḥ || tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati ||9.58.1||

IAST: usrā veda vasūnām martasya devy avasaḥ
Griffith: The Morning knows all precious things, the Goddess knows her grace to man:
pada pāṭha: usrā | veda | vasūnām | martasya | devī | avasaḥ || tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati ||9.58.2||

IAST: tarat sa mandī dhāvati
Griffith: Swift runs this giver of delight.
pada pāṭha: usrā | veda | vasūnām | martasya | devī | avasaḥ || tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati ||9.58.2||

IAST: dhvasrayoḥ puruṣantyor ā sahasrāṇi dadmahe
Griffith: We have accepted thousands from Dhvasra's and Purusanti's hands:
pada pāṭha: dhvasrayoḥ | puru-santyoḥ | ā | sahasrāṇi | dadmahe || tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati ||9.58.3||

IAST: tarat sa mandī dhāvati
Griffith: Swift runs this giver of delight.
pada pāṭha: dhvasrayoḥ | puru-santyoḥ | ā | sahasrāṇi | dadmahe || tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati ||9.58.3||

IAST: ā yayos triṁśataṁ tanā sahasrāṇi ca dadmahe
Griffith: From whom we have accepted thus thousands and three times ten beside:
Devanāgarī: आ ययोस्त्रिंशतं तना सहस्राणि च दद्महे
pada pāṭha: ā | yayoḥ | triṁśatam | tanā | sahasrāṇi | ca | dadmahe || tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati ||9.58.4||

IAST: tarat sa mandī dhāvati
Griffith: Swift runs this giver of delight.
pada pāṭha: ā | yayoḥ | triṁśatam | tanā | sahasrāṇi | ca | dadmahe || tarat | saḥ | mandī | dhāvati ||9.58.4||

IAST: pavasva gojid aśvajid viśvajit soma raṇyajit
Griffith: FLOW onward, Soma, winning kine, and steeds, and all that gives delight:
pada pāṭha: pavasva | go-jit | aśva-jit | viśva-jit | soma | raṇya-jit || prajā-vat | ratnam | ā | bhara ||9.59.1||

IAST: prajāvad ratnam ā bhara
Griffith: Bring hither wealth with progeny.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | go-jit | aśva-jit | viśva-jit | soma | raṇya-jit || prajā-vat | ratnam | ā | bhara ||9.59.1||

IAST: pavasvādbhyo adābhyaḥ pavasvauṣadhībhyaḥ
Griffith: Flow onward from the waters, flow, inviolable, from the plants:
pada pāṭha: pavasva | at-bhyaḥ | adābhyaḥ | pavasva | oṣadhībhyaḥ || pavasva | dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ ||9.59.2||

IAST: pavasva dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ
Griffith: Flow onward from the pressing-boards.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | at-bhyaḥ | adābhyaḥ | pavasva | oṣadhībhyaḥ || pavasva | dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ ||9.59.2||

IAST: tvaṁ soma pavamāno viśvāni duritā tara
Griffith: Soma, as Pavamana, pass over all trouble and distress:
Devanāgarī: त्वं सोम पवमानो विश्वानि दुरिता तर
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | pavamānaḥ | viśvāni | duḥ-itā | tara || kaviḥ | sīda | ni | barhiṣi ||9.59.3||

IAST: kaviḥ sīda ni barhiṣi
Griffith: Sit on the sacred grass, a Sage.
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | pavamānaḥ | viśvāni | duḥ-itā | tara || kaviḥ | sīda | ni | barhiṣi ||9.59.3||

IAST: pavamāna svar vido jāyamāno 'bhavo mahān
Griffith: Thou, Pavamana, foundest light; thou at thy birth becamest great:
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | svaḥ | vidaḥ | jāyamānaḥ | abhavaḥ | mahān || indo iti | viśvān | abhi | it | asi ||9.59.4||

IAST: indo viśvām̐ abhīd asi
Griffith: O Indu, thou art over all.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | svaḥ | vidaḥ | jāyamānaḥ | abhavaḥ | mahān || indo iti | viśvān | abhi | it | asi ||9.59.4||

IAST: pra gāyatreṇa gāyata pavamānaṁ vicarṣaṇim
Griffith: SING forth and laud with sacred song most active Pavamana, laud
pada pāṭha: pra | gāyatreṇa | gāyata | pavamānam | vi-carṣaṇim || indum | sahasra-cakṣasam ||9.60.1||

IAST: induṁ sahasracakṣasam
Griffith: Indu who sees with thousand eyes.
pada pāṭha: pra | gāyatreṇa | gāyata | pavamānam | vi-carṣaṇim || indum | sahasra-cakṣasam ||9.60.1||

IAST: taṁ tvā sahasracakṣasam atho sahasrabharṇasam
Griffith: Thee who hast thousand eyes to see, bearer of thousand burthens, they
pada pāṭha: tvam | tvā | sahasra-cakṣasam | atho iti | sahasra-bharṇasam || ati | vāram | apāviṣuḥ ||9.60.2||

IAST: ati vāram apāviṣuḥ
Griffith: Have filtered through the fleecy cloth.
pada pāṭha: tvam | tvā | sahasra-cakṣasam | atho iti | sahasra-bharṇasam || ati | vāram | apāviṣuḥ ||9.60.2||

IAST: ati vārān pavamāno asiṣyadat kalaśām̐ abhi dhāvati
Griffith: He, Pavamana, hath streamed through the fleece then: he runs into the jars,
pada pāṭha: ati | vārān | pavamānaḥ | asisyadat | kalaśān | abhi | dhāvati || indrasya | hārdi | ā-viśan ||9.60.3||

IAST: indrasya hārdy āviśan
Griffith: Finding his way to Indra's heart.
pada pāṭha: ati | vārān | pavamānaḥ | asisyadat | kalaśān | abhi | dhāvati || indrasya | hārdi | ā-viśan ||9.60.3||

IAST: indrasya soma rādhase śam pavasva vicarṣaṇe
Griffith: That Indra may be bounteous, flow, most active Soma, for our weal:
Devanāgarī: इन्द्रस्य सोम राधसे शं पवस्व विचर्षणे
pada pāṭha: indrasya | soma | rādhase | śam | pavasva | vi-carṣaṇe || prajā-vat | retaḥ | ā | bhara ||9.60.4||

IAST: prajāvad reta ā bhara
Griffith: Bring genial seed with progeny.
pada pāṭha: indrasya | soma | rādhase | śam | pavasva | vi-carṣaṇe || prajā-vat | retaḥ | ā | bhara ||9.60.4||

IAST: ayā vītī pari srava yas ta indo madeṣv ā
Griffith: FLOW onward, Indu, with this food for him who in thy wild delight
Devanāgarī: अया वीती परि स्रव यस्त इन्दो मदेष्वा
pada pāṭha: ayā | vītī | pari | srava | yaḥ | te | indo iti | madeṣu | ā || ava-ahan | navatīḥ | nava ||9.61.1||

IAST: avāhan navatīr nava
Griffith: Battered the nine-and-ninety down,
pada pāṭha: ayā | vītī | pari | srava | yaḥ | te | indo iti | madeṣu | ā || ava-ahan | navatīḥ | nava ||9.61.1||

IAST: puraḥ sadya itthādhiye divodāsāya śambaram
Griffith: Smote swiftly forts, and gambara, then Yadu and that Turvaga,
pada pāṭha: puraḥ | sadyaḥ | itthā-dhiye | divaḥ-dāsāya | śambaram || adha | tyam | turvaśam | yadum ||9.61.2||

IAST: adha tyaṁ turvaśaṁ yadum
Griffith: For pious Divodasa's sake.
pada pāṭha: puraḥ | sadyaḥ | itthā-dhiye | divaḥ-dāsāya | śambaram || adha | tyam | turvaśam | yadum ||9.61.2||

IAST: pari ṇo aśvam aśvavid gomad indo hiraṇyavat
Griffith: Finder of horses, pour on us horses and wealth in kine and gold,
pada pāṭha: pari | naḥ | aśvam | aśva-vit | go-mat | indo iti | hiraṇya-vat || kṣara | sahasriṇīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.61.3||

IAST: kṣarā sahasriṇīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: And, Indu, food in boundless store.
pada pāṭha: pari | naḥ | aśvam | aśva-vit | go-mat | indo iti | hiraṇya-vat || kṣara | sahasriṇīḥ | iṣaḥ ||9.61.3||

IAST: pavamānasya te vayam pavitram abhyundataḥ
Griffith: We seek to win thy friendly love, even Pavamana's flowing o'er
pada pāṭha: pavamānasya | te | vayam | pavitram | abhi-undataḥ || sakhi-tvam | ā | vr̥ṇīmahe ||9.61.4||

IAST: sakhitvam ā vṛṇīmahe
Griffith: The limit of the cleansing sieve.
pada pāṭha: pavamānasya | te | vayam | pavitram | abhi-undataḥ || sakhi-tvam | ā | vr̥ṇīmahe ||9.61.4||

IAST: ye te pavitram ūrmayo 'bhikṣaranti dhārayā
Griffith: With those same waves which in their stream oyerflow the purifying sieve,
pada pāṭha: ye | te | pavitram | ūrmayaḥ | abhi-kṣaranti | dhārayā || tebhiḥ | naḥ | soma | mr̥ḷaya ||9.61.5||

IAST: tebhir naḥ soma mṛḻaya
Griffith: Soma; be gracious unto us.
pada pāṭha: ye | te | pavitram | ūrmayaḥ | abhi-kṣaranti | dhārayā || tebhiḥ | naḥ | soma | mr̥ḷaya ||9.61.5||

IAST: sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṁ vīravatīm iṣam
Griffith: O Soma, being purified, bring us from all sides,-for thou canst,-
Devanāgarī: स नः पुनान आ भर रयिं वीरवतीमिषम्
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | punānaḥ | ā | bhara | rayim | vīra-vatīm | iṣam || īśānaḥ | soma | viśvataḥ ||9.61.6||

IAST: īśānaḥ soma viśvataḥ
Griffith: Riches and food with hero sons.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | punānaḥ | ā | bhara | rayim | vīra-vatīm | iṣam || īśānaḥ | soma | viśvataḥ ||9.61.6||

IAST: etam u tyaṁ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sindhumātaram
Griffith: Him here, the Child whom streams have borne, the ten swift fingers beautify
Devanāgarī: एतमु त्यं दश क्षिपो मृजन्ति सिन्धुमातरम्
pada pāṭha: etam | ūm̐ iti | tyam | daśa | kṣipaḥ | mr̥janti | sindhu-mātaram || sam | ādityebhiḥ | akhyata ||9.61.7||

IAST: sam ādityebhir akhyata
Griffith: With the Adityas is he seen.
pada pāṭha: etam | ūm̐ iti | tyam | daśa | kṣipaḥ | mr̥janti | sindhu-mātaram || sam | ādityebhiḥ | akhyata ||9.61.7||

IAST: sam indreṇota vāyunā suta eti pavitra ā
Griffith: With Indra and with Vayu he, effused, flows onward with,the beams
Devanāgarī: समिन्द्रेणोत वायुना सुत एति पवित्र आ
pada pāṭha: sam | indreṇa | uta | vāyunā | sutaḥ | eti | pavitre | ā || sam | sūryasya | raśmi-bhiḥ ||9.61.8||

IAST: saṁ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ
Griffith: Of Surya to the cleansing sieve.
pada pāṭha: sam | indreṇa | uta | vāyunā | sutaḥ | eti | pavitre | ā || sam | sūryasya | raśmi-bhiḥ ||9.61.8||

IAST: sa no bhagāya vāyave pūṣṇe pavasva madhumān
Griffith: Flow rich in sweets and lovely for our Bhaga, Vayu, Pusan flow
Devanāgarī: स नो भगाय वायवे पूष्णे पवस्व मधुमान्
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | bhagāya | vāyave | pūṣṇe | pavasva | madhu-mān || cāruḥ | mitre | varuṇe | ca ||9.61.9||

IAST: cārur mitre varuṇe ca
Griffith: For Mitra and for Varuna.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | bhagāya | vāyave | pūṣṇe | pavasva | madhu-mān || cāruḥ | mitre | varuṇe | ca ||9.61.9||

IAST: uccā te jātam andhaso divi ṣad bhūmy ā dade
Griffith: High is thy juice's birth: though set in heaven, on earth it hath obtained
Devanāgarī: उच्चा ते जातमन्धसो दिवि षद्भूम्या ददे
pada pāṭha: uccā | te | jātam | andhasaḥ | divi | sat | bhūmiḥ | ā | dade || ugram | śarma | mahi | śravaḥ ||9.61.10||

IAST: ugraṁ śarma mahi śravaḥ
Griffith: Strong sheltering power and great renown.
pada pāṭha: uccā | te | jātam | andhasaḥ | divi | sat | bhūmiḥ | ā | dade || ugram | śarma | mahi | śravaḥ ||9.61.10||

IAST: enā viśvāny arya ā dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām
Griffith: Striving to win, with him we gain all wealth from the ungodly man,
pada pāṭha: enā | viśvāni | aryaḥ | ā | dyumnāni | mānuṣāṇām || sisāsantaḥ | vanāmahe ||9.61.11||

IAST: siṣāsanto vanāmahe
Griffith: Yea, all the glories of mankind.
pada pāṭha: enā | viśvāni | aryaḥ | ā | dyumnāni | mānuṣāṇām || sisāsantaḥ | vanāmahe ||9.61.11||

IAST: sa na indrāya yajyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ
Griffith: Finder of room and freedom, flow for Indra whom we must adore,
Devanāgarī: स न इन्द्राय यज्यवे वरुणाय मरुद्भ्यः
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | indrāya | yajyave | varuṇāya | marut-bhyaḥ || varivaḥ-vit | pari | srava ||9.61.12||

IAST: varivovit pari srava
Griffith: For Varuna and the Marut host.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | indrāya | yajyave | varuṇāya | marut-bhyaḥ || varivaḥ-vit | pari | srava ||9.61.12||

IAST: upo ṣu jātam apturaṁ gobhir bhaṅgam pariṣkṛtam
Griffith: The Gods have come to Indu well-descended, beautified with milk,
pada pāṭha: upo iti | su | jātam | ap-turam | gobhiḥ | bhaṅgam | pari-kr̥tam || indum | devāḥ | ayāsiṣuḥ ||9.61.13||

IAST: induṁ devā ayāsiṣuḥ
Griffith: The active crusher of the foe.
pada pāṭha: upo iti | su | jātam | ap-turam | gobhiḥ | bhaṅgam | pari-kr̥tam || indum | devāḥ | ayāsiṣuḥ ||9.61.13||

IAST: tam id vardhantu no giro vatsaṁ saṁśiśvarīr iva
Griffith: Even as mother cows their calf, so let our praise-songs strengthen him,
pada pāṭha: tam | it | vardhantu | naḥ | giraḥ | vatsam | saṁśiśvarīḥ-iva || yaḥ | indrasya | hr̥dam-saniḥ ||9.61.14||

IAST: ya indrasya hṛdaṁsaniḥ
Griffith: Yea, him who winneth Indra's heart.
pada pāṭha: tam | it | vardhantu | naḥ | giraḥ | vatsam | saṁśiśvarīḥ-iva || yaḥ | indrasya | hr̥dam-saniḥ ||9.61.14||

IAST: arṣā ṇaḥ soma śaṁ gave dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam
Griffith: Soma, pour blessings on our kine, pour forth the food that streams with milk
Devanāgarī: अर्षा णः सोम शं गवे धुक्षस्व पिप्युषीमिषम्
pada pāṭha: arṣa | naḥ | soma | śam | gave | dhukṣasva | pipyuṣīm | iṣam || vardha | samudram | ukthyam ||9.61.15||

IAST: vardhā samudram ukthyam
Griffith: Increase the sea that merits laud.
pada pāṭha: arṣa | naḥ | soma | śam | gave | dhukṣasva | pipyuṣīm | iṣam || vardha | samudram | ukthyam ||9.61.15||

IAST: pavamāno ajījanad divaś citraṁ na tanyatum
Griffith: From heaven hath Pavamana made, as 'twere, the marvellous thunder, and
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | ajījanat | divaḥ | citram | na | tanyatum || jyotiḥ | vaiśvānaram | br̥hat ||9.61.16||

IAST: jyotir vaiśvānaram bṛhat
Griffith: The lofty light of all mankind.
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | ajījanat | divaḥ | citram | na | tanyatum || jyotiḥ | vaiśvānaram | br̥hat ||9.61.16||

IAST: pavamānasya te raso mado rājann aducchunaḥ
Griffith: The gladdening and auspicious juice of thee, of Pavamana, King!
pada pāṭha: pavamānasya | te | rasaḥ | madaḥ | rājan | aducchunaḥ || vi | vāram | avyam | arṣati ||9.61.17||

IAST: vi vāram avyam arṣati
Griffith: Flows o'er the woollen straining-cloth.
pada pāṭha: pavamānasya | te | rasaḥ | madaḥ | rājan | aducchunaḥ || vi | vāram | avyam | arṣati ||9.61.17||

IAST: pavamāna rasas tava dakṣo vi rājati dyumān
Griffith: Thy juice, O Pavamana, sends its rays abroad like splendid skill,
Devanāgarī: पवमान रसस्तव दक्षो वि राजति द्युमान्
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | rasaḥ | tava | dakṣaḥ | vi | rājati | dyu-mān || jyotiḥ | viśvam | svaḥ | dr̥śe ||9.61.18||

IAST: jyotir viśvaṁ svar dṛśe
Griffith: Like lustre, all heaven's light, to see.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | rasaḥ | tava | dakṣaḥ | vi | rājati | dyu-mān || jyotiḥ | viśvam | svaḥ | dr̥śe ||9.61.18||

IAST: yas te mado vareṇyas tenā pavasvāndhasā
Griffith: Flow onward with that juice of thine most excellent, that brings delight,
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | te | madaḥ | vareṇyaḥ | tena | pavasva | andhasā || deva-avīḥ | aghaśaṁsa-hā ||9.61.19||

IAST: devāvīr aghaśaṁsahā
Griffith: Slaying the wicked, dear to Gods.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | te | madaḥ | vareṇyaḥ | tena | pavasva | andhasā || deva-avīḥ | aghaśaṁsa-hā ||9.61.19||

IAST: jaghnir vṛtram amitriyaṁ sasnir vājaṁ dive-dive
Griffith: Killing the foeman and his hate, and winning booty every day,
