pada pāṭha: jaghniḥ | vr̥tram | amitriyam | sasniḥ | vājam | dive-dive || go-sāḥ | ūm̐ iti | aśva-sāḥ | asi ||9.61.20||

IAST: goṣā u aśvasā asi
Griffith: Gainer art thou of steeds and kine.
pada pāṭha: jaghniḥ | vr̥tram | amitriyam | sasniḥ | vājam | dive-dive || go-sāḥ | ūm̐ iti | aśva-sāḥ | asi ||9.61.20||

IAST: sammiślo aruṣo bhava sūpasthābhir na dhenubhiḥ
Griffith: Red-hued, be blended with the milk that seems to yield its lovely breast,
pada pāṭha: sam-miślaḥ | aruṣaḥ | bhava | su-upasthābhiḥ | na | dhenu-bhiḥ || sīdan | śyenaḥ | na | yonim | ā ||9.61.21||

IAST: sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā
Griffith: Falcon-like resting in thine home.
pada pāṭha: sam-miślaḥ | aruṣaḥ | bhava | su-upasthābhiḥ | na | dhenu-bhiḥ || sīdan | śyenaḥ | na | yonim | ā ||9.61.21||

IAST: sa pavasva ya āvithendraṁ vṛtrāya hantave
Griffith: Flow onward thou who strengthenedst Indra to slaughter Vrtra who
Devanāgarī: स पवस्व य आविथेन्द्रं वृत्राय हन्तवे
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | yaḥ | āvitha | indram | vr̥trāya | hantave || vavri-vāṁsam | mahīḥ | apaḥ ||9.61.22||

IAST: vavrivāṁsam mahīr apaḥ
Griffith: Compassed and stayed the mighty floods.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pavasva | yaḥ | āvitha | indram | vr̥trāya | hantave || vavri-vāṁsam | mahīḥ | apaḥ ||9.61.22||

IAST: suvīrāso vayaṁ dhanā jayema soma mīḍhvaḥ
Griffith: Soma who rainest gifts, may we win riches with our hero sons:
Devanāgarī: सुवीरासो वयं धना जयेम सोम मीढ्वः
pada pāṭha: su-vīrāsaḥ | vayam | dhanā | jayema | soma | mīḍhvaḥ || punānaḥ | vardha | naḥ | giraḥ ||9.61.23||

IAST: punāno vardha no giraḥ
Griffith: Strengthen, as thou art cleansed, our hymns.
pada pāṭha: su-vīrāsaḥ | vayam | dhanā | jayema | soma | mīḍhvaḥ || punānaḥ | vardha | naḥ | giraḥ ||9.61.23||

IAST: tvotāsas tavāvasā syāma vanvanta āmuraḥ
Griffith: Aided by thee, and through thy grace, may we be slayers when we war:
pada pāṭha: tvā-ūtāsaḥ | tava | avasā | syāma | vanvantaḥ | ā-muraḥ || soma | vrateṣu | jāgr̥hi ||9.61.24||

IAST: soma vrateṣu jāgṛhi
Griffith: Watch, Soma, at our solemn rites.
pada pāṭha: tvā-ūtāsaḥ | tava | avasā | syāma | vanvantaḥ | ā-muraḥ || soma | vrateṣu | jāgr̥hi ||9.61.24||

IAST: apaghnan pavate mṛdho 'pa somo arāvṇaḥ
Griffith: Chasing our foemen, driving off the godless, Soma flowcth on,
pada pāṭha: apa-ghnan | pavate | mr̥dhaḥ | apa | somaḥ | arāvṇaḥ || gacchan | indrasya | niḥ-kr̥tam ||9.61.25||

IAST: gacchann indrasya niṣkṛtam
Griffith: Going to Indra's special place.
pada pāṭha: apa-ghnan | pavate | mr̥dhaḥ | apa | somaḥ | arāvṇaḥ || gacchan | indrasya | niḥ-kr̥tam ||9.61.25||

IAST: maho no rāya ā bhara pavamāna jahī mṛdhaḥ
Griffith: O Pavamana, hither bring great riches, and destroy our foes:
Devanāgarī: महो नो राय आ भर पवमान जही मृधः
pada pāṭha: mahaḥ | naḥ | rāyaḥ | ā | bhara | pavamāna | jahi | mr̥dhaḥ || rāsva | indo iti | vīra-vat | yaśaḥ ||9.61.26||

IAST: rāsvendo vīravad yaśaḥ
Griffith: O Indu, grant heroic fame.
pada pāṭha: mahaḥ | naḥ | rāyaḥ | ā | bhara | pavamāna | jahi | mr̥dhaḥ || rāsva | indo iti | vīra-vat | yaśaḥ ||9.61.26||

IAST: na tvā śataṁ cana hruto rādho ditsantam ā minan
Griffith: A hundred obstacles have ne'er checked thee when fain to give thy boons,
Devanāgarī: न त्वा शतं चन ह्रुतो राधो दित्सन्तमा मिनन्
pada pāṭha: na | tvā | śatam | cana | hutaḥ | rādhaḥ | ditsantam | ā | minan || yat | punānaḥ | makhasyase ||9.61.27||

IAST: yat punāno makhasyase
Griffith: When, being cleansed, thou combatest.
pada pāṭha: na | tvā | śatam | cana | hutaḥ | rādhaḥ | ditsantam | ā | minan || yat | punānaḥ | makhasyase ||9.61.27||

IAST: pavasvendo vṛṣā sutaḥ kṛdhī no yaśaso jane
Griffith: Indu, flow on, a mighty juice; glorify us among the folk:
Devanāgarī: पवस्वेन्दो वृषा सुतः कृधी नो यशसो जने
pada pāṭha: pavasva | indo iti | vr̥ṣā | sutaḥ | kr̥dhi | naḥ | yaśasaḥ | jane || viśvāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ | jahi ||9.61.28||

IAST: viśvā apa dviṣo jahi
Griffith: Drive all our enemies away.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | indo iti | vr̥ṣā | sutaḥ | kr̥dhi | naḥ | yaśasaḥ | jane || viśvāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ | jahi ||9.61.28||

IAST: asya te sakhye vayaṁ tavendo dyumna uttame
Griffith: Indu, in this thy friendship most lofty and glorious may we
Devanāgarī: अस्य ते सख्ये वयं तवेन्दो द्युम्न उत्तमे
pada pāṭha: asya | te | sakhye | vayam | tava | indo iti | dyumne | ut-tame || sasahyāma | pr̥tanyataḥ ||9.61.29||

IAST: sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ
Griffith: Subdue all those who war with us.
pada pāṭha: asya | te | sakhye | vayam | tava | indo iti | dyumne | ut-tame || sasahyāma | pr̥tanyataḥ ||9.61.29||

IAST: yā te bhīmāny āyudhā tigmāni santi dhūrvaṇe
Griffith: Those awful weapons that thou hast, sharpened at point to strike men down-
Devanāgarī: या ते भीमान्यायुधा तिग्मानि सन्ति धूर्वणे
pada pāṭha: yā | te | bhīmāni | āyudhā | tigmāni | santi | dhūrvaṇe || rakṣa | samasya | naḥ | nidaḥ ||9.61.30||

IAST: rakṣā samasya no nidaḥ
Griffith: Guard us therewith from every foe.
pada pāṭha: yā | te | bhīmāni | āyudhā | tigmāni | santi | dhūrvaṇe || rakṣa | samasya | naḥ | nidaḥ ||9.61.30||

IAST: ete asṛgram indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ
Griffith: THESE rapid Soma-drops have been poured through the purifying sieve
pada pāṭha: ete | asr̥gram | indavaḥ | tiraḥ | pavitram | āśavaḥ || viśvāni | abhi | saubhagā ||9.62.1||

IAST: viśvāny abhi saubhagā
Griffith: To bring us all felicities.
pada pāṭha: ete | asr̥gram | indavaḥ | tiraḥ | pavitram | āśavaḥ || viśvāni | abhi | saubhagā ||9.62.1||

IAST: vighnanto duritā puru sugā tokāya vājinaḥ
Griffith: Dispelling manifold mishap, giving the courser's progeny,
Devanāgarī: विघ्नन्तो दुरिता पुरु सुगा तोकाय वाजिनः
pada pāṭha: vi-ghnantaḥ | duḥ-itā | puru | su-gā | tokāya | vājinaḥ || tanā | kr̥ṇvantaḥ | arvate ||9.62.2||

IAST: tanā kṛṇvanto arvate
Griffith: Yea, and the warrior steed, success.
pada pāṭha: vi-ghnantaḥ | duḥ-itā | puru | su-gā | tokāya | vājinaḥ || tanā | kr̥ṇvantaḥ | arvate ||9.62.2||

IAST: kṛṇvanto varivo gave 'bhy arṣanti suṣṭutim
Griffith: Bringing prosperity to kine, they make perpetual Ila flow
pada pāṭha: kr̥ṇvantaḥ | varivaḥ | gave | abhi | arṣanti | su-stutim || iḷām | asmabhyam | sam-yatam ||9.62.3||

IAST: iḻām asmabhyaṁ saṁyatam
Griffith: To us for noble eulogy.
pada pāṭha: kr̥ṇvantaḥ | varivaḥ | gave | abhi | arṣanti | su-stutim || iḷām | asmabhyam | sam-yatam ||9.62.3||

IAST: asāvy aṁśur madāyāpsu dakṣo giriṣṭhāḥ
Griffith: Strong, mountain-born, the stalk hath been pressed in the streams for rapturous joy:
pada pāṭha: asāvi | aṁśuḥ | madāya | ap-su | dakṣaḥ | giri-sthāḥ || śyenaḥ | na | yonim | ā | asadat ||9.62.4||

IAST: śyeno na yonim āsadat
Griffith: Hawk-like he settles in his home.
pada pāṭha: asāvi | aṁśuḥ | madāya | ap-su | dakṣaḥ | giri-sthāḥ || śyenaḥ | na | yonim | ā | asadat ||9.62.4||

IAST: śubhram andho devavātam apsu dhūto nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ
Griffith: Fair is the God-loved juice; the plant is washed in waters, pressed by men
pada pāṭha: śubhram | andhaḥ | deva-vātam | ap-su | dhūtaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | sutaḥ || svadanti | gāvaḥ | payaḥ-bhiḥ ||9.62.5||

IAST: svadanti gāvaḥ payobhiḥ
Griffith: The milch-kine sweeten it with milk.
pada pāṭha: śubhram | andhaḥ | deva-vātam | ap-su | dhūtaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | sutaḥ || svadanti | gāvaḥ | payaḥ-bhiḥ ||9.62.5||

IAST: ād īm aśvaṁ na hetāro 'śūśubhann amṛtāya
Griffith: As drivers deck a courser, so have they adorned the meath's juice for
pada pāṭha: āt | īm | aśvam | na | hetāraḥ | aśūśubhan | amr̥tāya || madhvaḥ | rasam | sadha-māde ||9.62.6||

IAST: madhvo rasaṁ sadhamāde
Griffith: Ambrosia, for the festival.
pada pāṭha: āt | īm | aśvam | na | hetāraḥ | aśūśubhan | amr̥tāya || madhvaḥ | rasam | sadha-māde ||9.62.6||

IAST: yās te dhārā madhuścuto 'sṛgram inda ūtaye
Griffith: Thou, Indu, with thy streams that drop sweet juices, which were poured for help,
pada pāṭha: yāḥ | te | dhārāḥ | madhu-ścutaḥ | asr̥gram | indo iti | ūtaye || tābhiḥ | pavitram | ā | asadaḥ ||9.62.7||

IAST: tābhiḥ pavitram āsadaḥ
Griffith: Hast settled in the cleansing sieve.
pada pāṭha: yāḥ | te | dhārāḥ | madhu-ścutaḥ | asr̥gram | indo iti | ūtaye || tābhiḥ | pavitram | ā | asadaḥ ||9.62.7||

IAST: so arṣendrāya pītaye tiro romāṇy avyayā
Griffith: So flow thou onward through the fleece, for Indra flow, to be his drink,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | arṣa | indrāya | pītaye | tiraḥ | romāṇi | avyayā || sīdan | yonā | vaneṣu | ā ||9.62.8||

IAST: sīdan yonā vaneṣv ā
Griffith: Finding thine home in vats of wood.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | arṣa | indrāya | pītaye | tiraḥ | romāṇi | avyayā || sīdan | yonā | vaneṣu | ā ||9.62.8||

IAST: tvam indo pari srava svādiṣṭho aṅgirobhyaḥ
Griffith: As giving room and freedom, as most sweet, pour butter forth and milk,
pada pāṭha: tvam | indo iti | pari | srava | svādiṣṭhaḥ | aṅgiraḥ-bhyaḥ || varivaḥ-vit | ghr̥tam | payaḥ ||9.62.9||

IAST: varivovid ghṛtam payaḥ
Griffith: O Indu, for the Angirases.
pada pāṭha: tvam | indo iti | pari | srava | svādiṣṭhaḥ | aṅgiraḥ-bhyaḥ || varivaḥ-vit | ghr̥tam | payaḥ ||9.62.9||

IAST: ayaṁ vicarṣaṇir hitaḥ pavamānaḥ sa cetati
Griffith: Most active and benevolent, this Pavamana, sent to us
pada pāṭha: ayam | vi-carṣaṇiḥ | hitaḥ | pavamānaḥ | saḥ | cetati || hinvānaḥ | āpyam | br̥hat ||9.62.10||

IAST: hinvāna āpyam bṛhat
Griffith: For lofty friendship, meditates.
pada pāṭha: ayam | vi-carṣaṇiḥ | hitaḥ | pavamānaḥ | saḥ | cetati || hinvānaḥ | āpyam | br̥hat ||9.62.10||

IAST: eṣa vṛṣā vṛṣavrataḥ pavamāno aśastihā
Griffith: Queller of curses, mighty, with strong sway, this Pavamana shall
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | vr̥ṣā | vr̥ṣa-vrataḥ | pavamānaḥ | aśasti-hā || karat | vasūni | dāśuṣe ||9.62.11||

IAST: karad vasūni dāśuṣe
Griffith: Bring treasures to the worshipper.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | vr̥ṣā | vr̥ṣa-vrataḥ | pavamānaḥ | aśasti-hā || karat | vasūni | dāśuṣe ||9.62.11||

IAST: ā pavasva sahasriṇaṁ rayiṁ gomantam aśvinam
Griffith: Pour thou upon us thousandfold possessions, both of kine and steeds,
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam | rayim | go-mantam | aśvinam || puru-candram | puru-spr̥ham ||9.62.12||

IAST: puruścandram puruspṛham
Griffith: Exceeding glorious, much-desired.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam | rayim | go-mantam | aśvinam || puru-candram | puru-spr̥ham ||9.62.12||

IAST: eṣa sya pari ṣicyate marmṛjyamāna āyubhiḥ
Griffith: Wandering far, with wise designs, the juice here present is effused,
Devanāgarī: एष स्य परि षिच्यते मर्मृज्यमान आयुभिः
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | syaḥ | pari | sicyate | marmr̥jyamānaḥ | āyu-bhiḥ || uru-gāyaḥ | kavi-kratuḥ ||9.62.13||

IAST: urugāyaḥ kavikratuḥ
Griffith: Made beautiful by living men.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | syaḥ | pari | sicyate | marmr̥jyamānaḥ | āyu-bhiḥ || uru-gāyaḥ | kavi-kratuḥ ||9.62.13||

IAST: sahasrotiḥ śatāmagho vimāno rajasaḥ kaviḥ
Griffith: For Indra flows the gladdening drink, the measurer of the region, Sage,
pada pāṭha: sahasra-ūtiḥ | śata-maghaḥ | vi-mānaḥ | rajasaḥ | kaviḥ || indrāya | pavate | madaḥ ||9.62.14||

IAST: indrāya pavate madaḥ
Griffith: With countless wealth and endless help.
pada pāṭha: sahasra-ūtiḥ | śata-maghaḥ | vi-mānaḥ | rajasaḥ | kaviḥ || indrāya | pavate | madaḥ ||9.62.14||

IAST: girā jāta iha stuta indur indrāya dhīyate
Griffith: Born on the inountain, lauded here, Indu for Indra is set down,
Devanāgarī: गिरा जात इह स्तुत इन्दुरिन्द्राय धीयते
pada pāṭha: girā | jātaḥ | iha | stutaḥ | induḥ | indrāya | dhīyate || viḥ | yonā | vasatau-iva ||9.62.15||

IAST: vir yonā vasatāv iva
Griffith: As in her sheltering nest a bird.
pada pāṭha: girā | jātaḥ | iha | stutaḥ | induḥ | indrāya | dhīyate || viḥ | yonā | vasatau-iva ||9.62.15||

IAST: pavamānaḥ suto nṛbhiḥ somo vājam ivāsarat
Griffith: Pressed by the men, as 'twere to war hath Soma Pavamana sped,
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | sutaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | somaḥ | vājam-iva | asarat || camūṣu | śakmanā | ā-sadam ||9.62.16||

IAST: camūṣu śakmanāsadam
Griffith: To test with might within the vats.
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | sutaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | somaḥ | vājam-iva | asarat || camūṣu | śakmanā | ā-sadam ||9.62.16||

IAST: taṁ tripṛṣṭhe trivandhure rathe yuñjanti yātave
Griffith: That he may move, they yoke him to the three-backed triple-seated car
Devanāgarī: तं त्रिपृष्ठे त्रिवन्धुरे रथे युञ्जन्ति यातवे
pada pāṭha: tam | tri-pr̥ṣṭhe | tri-bandhure | rathe | yuñjanti | yātave || r̥ṣīṇām | sapta | dhīti-bhiḥ ||9.62.17||

IAST: ṛṣīṇāṁ sapta dhītibhiḥ
Griffith: By the Seven Rsis' holy songs.
pada pāṭha: tam | tri-pr̥ṣṭhe | tri-bandhure | rathe | yuñjanti | yātave || r̥ṣīṇām | sapta | dhīti-bhiḥ ||9.62.17||

IAST: taṁ sotāro dhanaspṛtam āśuṁ vājāya yātave
Griffith: Drive ye that Tawny Courser, O ye pressers, on his way to war,
pada pāṭha: tam | sotāraḥ | dhana-spr̥tam | āśum | vājāya | yātave || harim | hinota | vājinam ||9.62.18||

IAST: hariṁ hinota vājinam
Griffith: Swift Steed who carries off the spoil.
pada pāṭha: tam | sotāraḥ | dhana-spr̥tam | āśum | vājāya | yātave || harim | hinota | vājinam ||9.62.18||

IAST: āviśan kalaśaṁ suto viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ
Griffith: Pouring all glories hither, he, effused and entering the jar,
pada pāṭha: ā-viśan | kalaśam | sutaḥ | viśvāḥ | arṣan | abhi | śriyaḥ || śūraḥ | na | goṣu | tiṣṭhati ||9.62.19||

IAST: śūro na goṣu tiṣṭhati
Griffith: Stands like a hero mid the kine.
pada pāṭha: ā-viśan | kalaśam | sutaḥ | viśvāḥ | arṣan | abhi | śriyaḥ || śūraḥ | na | goṣu | tiṣṭhati ||9.62.19||

IAST: ā ta indo madāya kam payo duhanty āyavaḥ
Griffith: Indu, the living men milk out the juice to make the rapturous draught:
Devanāgarī: आ त इन्दो मदाय कं पयो दुहन्त्यायवः
pada pāṭha: ā | te | indo iti | madāya | kam | payaḥ | duhanti | āyavaḥ || devāḥ | devebhyaḥ | madhu ||9.62.20||

IAST: devā devebhyo madhu
Griffith: Gods for the Gods milk out the meath.
pada pāṭha: ā | te | indo iti | madāya | kam | payaḥ | duhanti | āyavaḥ || devāḥ | devebhyaḥ | madhu ||9.62.20||

IAST: ā naḥ somam pavitra ā sṛjatā madhumattamam
Griffith: Pour for the Gods into the sieve our Soma very rich in sweets,
Devanāgarī: आ नः सोमं पवित्र आ सृजता मधुमत्तमम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | somam | pavitre | ā | sr̥jata | madhumat-tamam || devebhyaḥ | devaśrut-tamam ||9.62.21||

IAST: devebhyo devaśruttamam
Griffith: Him whom the Gods most gladly hear.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | somam | pavitre | ā | sr̥jata | madhumat-tamam || devebhyaḥ | devaśrut-tamam ||9.62.21||

IAST: ete somā asṛkṣata gṛṇānāḥ śravase mahe
Griffith: Into his stream who gladdens best these Soma juices have been poured,
Devanāgarī: एते सोमा असृक्षत गृणानाः श्रवसे महे
pada pāṭha: ete | somāḥ | asr̥kṣata | gr̥ṇānāḥ | śravase | mahe || madin-tamasya | dhārayā ||9.62.22||

IAST: madintamasya dhārayā
Griffith: Lauded with songs for lofty fame.
pada pāṭha: ete | somāḥ | asr̥kṣata | gr̥ṇānāḥ | śravase | mahe || madin-tamasya | dhārayā ||9.62.22||

IAST: abhi gavyāni vītaye nṛmṇā punāno arṣasi
Griffith: Thou flowest to enjoy the milk, and bringest valour, being cleansed:
Devanāgarī: अभि गव्यानि वीतये नृम्णा पुनानो अर्षसि
pada pāṭha: abhi | gavyāni | vītaye | nr̥mṇā | punānaḥ | arṣasi || sanat-vājaḥ | pari | srava ||9.62.23||

IAST: sanadvājaḥ pari srava
Griffith: Winning the spoil flow hitherward.
pada pāṭha: abhi | gavyāni | vītaye | nr̥mṇā | punānaḥ | arṣasi || sanat-vājaḥ | pari | srava ||9.62.23||

IAST: uta no gomatīr iṣo viśvā arṣa pariṣṭubhaḥ
Griffith: And, hymned by Jamadagnis, let all nourishment that kine supply,
Devanāgarī: उत नो गोमतीरिषो विश्वा अर्ष परिष्टुभः
pada pāṭha: uta | naḥ | go-matīḥ | iṣaḥ | viśvāḥ | arṣa | pari-stubhaḥ || gr̥ṇānaḥ | jamat-agninā ||9.62.24||

IAST: gṛṇāno jamadagninā
Griffith: And general praises, flow to us.
pada pāṭha: uta | naḥ | go-matīḥ | iṣaḥ | viśvāḥ | arṣa | pari-stubhaḥ || gr̥ṇānaḥ | jamat-agninā ||9.62.24||

IAST: pavasva vāco agriyaḥ soma citrābhir ūtibhiḥ
Griffith: Soma, as leader of the song flow onward with thy wondrous aids,
pada pāṭha: pavasva | vācaḥ | agriyaḥ | soma | citrābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ || abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā ||9.62.25||

IAST: abhi viśvāni kāvyā
Griffith: For holy lore of every kind.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | vācaḥ | agriyaḥ | soma | citrābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ || abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā ||9.62.25||

IAST: tvaṁ samudriyā apo 'griyo vāca īrayan
Griffith: Do thou as leader of the song, stirring the waters of the sea,
pada pāṭha: tvam | samudriyāḥ | apaḥ | agriyaḥ | vācaḥ | īrayan || pavasva | viśvam-ejaya ||9.62.26||

IAST: pavasva viśvamejaya
Griffith: Flow onward, thou who movest all.
pada pāṭha: tvam | samudriyāḥ | apaḥ | agriyaḥ | vācaḥ | īrayan || pavasva | viśvam-ejaya ||9.62.26||

IAST: tubhyemā bhuvanā kave mahimne soma tasthire
Griffith: O Soma, O thou Sage, these worlds stand ready to attest thy might:
Devanāgarī: तुभ्येमा भुवना कवे महिम्ने सोम तस्थिरे
pada pāṭha: tubhya | imā | bhuvanā | kave | mahimne | soma | tasthire || tubhyam | arṣanti | sindhavaḥ ||9.62.27||

IAST: tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ
Griffith: For thy behoof the rivers flow.
pada pāṭha: tubhya | imā | bhuvanā | kave | mahimne | soma | tasthire || tubhyam | arṣanti | sindhavaḥ ||9.62.27||

IAST: pra te divo na vṛṣṭayo dhārā yanty asaścataḥ
Griffith: Like showers of rain that fall from heaven thy streams perpetually flow
Devanāgarī: प्र ते दिवो न वृष्टयो धारा यन्त्यसश्चतः
pada pāṭha: pra | te | divaḥ | na | vr̥ṣṭayaḥ | dhārāḥ | yanti | asaścataḥ || abhi | śukrām | upa-stiram ||9.62.28||

IAST: abhi śukrām upastiram
Griffith: To the bright fleece spread under them.
pada pāṭha: pra | te | divaḥ | na | vr̥ṣṭayaḥ | dhārāḥ | yanti | asaścataḥ || abhi | śukrām | upa-stiram ||9.62.28||

IAST: indrāyendum punītanograṁ dakṣāya sādhanam
Griffith: For potent Indra purify Indu effectual and strong,
pada pāṭha: indrāya | indum | punītana | ugram | dakṣāya | sādhanam || īśānam | vīti-rādhasam ||9.62.29||

IAST: īśānaṁ vītirādhasam
Griffith: Enjoyment-giver, Mighty Lord.
pada pāṭha: indrāya | indum | punītana | ugram | dakṣāya | sādhanam || īśānam | vīti-rādhasam ||9.62.29||

IAST: pavamāna ṛtaḥ kaviḥ somaḥ pavitram āsadat
Griffith: Soma, true, Pavamana, Sage, is seated in the cleansing sieve,
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | r̥taḥ | kaviḥ | somaḥ | pavitram | ā | asadat || dadhat | stotre | su-vīryam ||9.62.30||

IAST: dadhat stotre suvīryam
Griffith: Giving his praiser hero strength.
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | r̥taḥ | kaviḥ | somaḥ | pavitram | ā | asadat || dadhat | stotre | su-vīryam ||9.62.30||

IAST: ā pavasva sahasriṇaṁ rayiṁ soma suvīryam
Griffith: POUR hitherward, O Soma, wealth in thousands and heroic strength,
Devanāgarī: आ पवस्व सहस्रिणं रयिं सोम सुवीर्यम्
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam | rayim | soma | su-vīryam || asme iti | śravāṁsi | dhāraya ||9.63.1||

IAST: asme śravāṁsi dhāraya
Griffith: And keep renown secure for us.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam | rayim | soma | su-vīryam || asme iti | śravāṁsi | dhāraya ||9.63.1||

IAST: iṣam ūrjaṁ ca pinvasa indrāya matsarintamaḥ
Griffith: Thou makest food and vigour swell for Indra, best of gladdeners!
pada pāṭha: iṣam | ūrjam | ca | pinvase | indrāya | matsarin-tamaḥ || camūṣu | ā | ni | sīdasi ||9.63.2||

IAST: camūṣv ā ni ṣīdasi
Griffith: Within the cups thou seatest thee.
pada pāṭha: iṣam | ūrjam | ca | pinvase | indrāya | matsarin-tamaḥ || camūṣu | ā | ni | sīdasi ||9.63.2||

IAST: suta indrāya viṣṇave somaḥ kalaśe akṣarat
Griffith: For Indra and for Visnu poured, Soma hath flowed into the jar:
Devanāgarī: सुत इन्द्राय विष्णवे सोमः कलशे अक्षरत्
pada pāṭha: sutaḥ | indrāya | viṣṇave | somaḥ | kalaśe | akṣarat || madhu-mān | astu | vāyave ||9.63.3||

IAST: madhumām̐ astu vāyave
Griffith: May Vayu find it rich in sweets.
pada pāṭha: sutaḥ | indrāya | viṣṇave | somaḥ | kalaśe | akṣarat || madhu-mān | astu | vāyave ||9.63.3||

IAST: ete asṛgram āśavo 'ti hvarāṁsi babhravaḥ
Griffith: These Somas swift and brown of hue, in stream of solemn sacrifice
pada pāṭha: ete | asr̥gram | āśavaḥ | ati | hvarāṁsi | babhravaḥ || somāḥ | r̥tasya | dhārayā ||9.63.4||

IAST: somā ṛtasya dhārayā
Griffith: Have flowed through twisted obstacles,
pada pāṭha: ete | asr̥gram | āśavaḥ | ati | hvarāṁsi | babhravaḥ || somāḥ | r̥tasya | dhārayā ||9.63.4||

IAST: indraṁ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvanto viśvam āryam
Griffith: Performing every noble work, active, augmenting Indra's strength,
pada pāṭha: indram | vardhantaḥ | ap-turaḥ | kr̥ṇvantaḥ | viśvam | āryam || apa-ghnantaḥ | arāvṇaḥ ||9.63.5||

IAST: apaghnanto arāvṇaḥ
Griffith: Driving away the godless ones.
pada pāṭha: indram | vardhantaḥ | ap-turaḥ | kr̥ṇvantaḥ | viśvam | āryam || apa-ghnantaḥ | arāvṇaḥ ||9.63.5||

IAST: sutā anu svam ā rajo 'bhy arṣanti babhravaḥ
Griffith: Brown Soma-drops, effused that seek Indra, to their appropriate place
pada pāṭha: sutāḥ | anu | svam | ā | rajaḥ | abhi | arṣanti | babhravaḥ || indram | gacchantaḥ | indavaḥ ||9.63.6||

IAST: indraṁ gacchanta indavaḥ
Griffith: Flow through the region hitherward.
pada pāṭha: sutāḥ | anu | svam | ā | rajaḥ | abhi | arṣanti | babhravaḥ || indram | gacchantaḥ | indavaḥ ||9.63.6||

IAST: ayā pavasva dhārayā yayā sūryam arocayaḥ
Griffith: Flow onward with that stream of thine wherewith thou gavest Surya light,
pada pāṭha: ayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | sūryam | arocayaḥ || hinvānaḥ | mānuṣīḥ | apaḥ ||9.63.7||

IAST: hinvāno mānuṣīr apaḥ
Griffith: Urging on waters good to men.
pada pāṭha: ayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | sūryam | arocayaḥ || hinvānaḥ | mānuṣīḥ | apaḥ ||9.63.7||

IAST: ayukta sūra etaśam pavamāno manāv adhi
Griffith: He, Pavamana, high o'er man yoked the Sun's courser Etasa
pada pāṭha: ayukta | sūraḥ | etaśam | pavamānaḥ | manau | adhi || antarikṣeṇa | yātave ||9.63.8||

IAST: antarikṣeṇa yātave
Griffith: To travel through the realm of air.
pada pāṭha: ayukta | sūraḥ | etaśam | pavamānaḥ | manau | adhi || antarikṣeṇa | yātave ||9.63.8||

IAST: uta tyā harito daśa sūro ayukta yātave
Griffith: And those ten Coursers, tawny-hued, he harnessed that the Sun might come
Devanāgarī: उत त्या हरितो दश सूरो अयुक्त यातवे
pada pāṭha: uta | tyāḥ | haritaḥ | daśa | sūraḥ | ayukta | yātave || induḥ | indraḥ | iti | bruvan ||9.63.9||

IAST: indur indra iti bruvan
Griffith: Indu, he said, is Indra's self.
pada pāṭha: uta | tyāḥ | haritaḥ | daśa | sūraḥ | ayukta | yātave || induḥ | indraḥ | iti | bruvan ||9.63.9||

IAST: parīto vāyave sutaṁ gira indrāya matsaram
Griffith: Hence, singers, pour the gladdeningjuice to Vayu and to Indra, pour
Devanāgarī: परीतो वायवे सुतं गिर इन्द्राय मत्सरम्
pada pāṭha: pari | itaḥ | vāyave | sutam | giraḥ | indrāya | matsaram || avyaḥ | vāreṣu | siñcata ||9.63.10||

IAST: avyo vāreṣu siñcata
Griffith: The drops upon the fleecy cloth.
pada pāṭha: pari | itaḥ | vāyave | sutam | giraḥ | indrāya | matsaram || avyaḥ | vāreṣu | siñcata ||9.63.10||

IAST: pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṁ soma duṣṭaram
Griffith: O Soma Pavamana, find wealth for us not to be assailed,
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | vidāḥ | rayim | asmabhyam | soma | dustaram || yaḥ | duḥ-naśaḥ | vanuṣyatā ||9.63.11||

IAST: yo dūṇāśo vanuṣyatā
Griffith: Wealth which the foeman may not win.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | vidāḥ | rayim | asmabhyam | soma | dustaram || yaḥ | duḥ-naśaḥ | vanuṣyatā ||9.63.11||

IAST: abhy arṣa sahasriṇaṁ rayiṁ gomantam aśvinam
Griffith: Send riches hither with thy stream in thousands, both of steeds and kine,
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | sahasriṇam | rayim | go-mantam | aśvinam || abhi | vājam | uta | śravaḥ ||9.63.12||

IAST: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ
Griffith: Send spoil of war and high renown.
pada pāṭha: abhi | arṣa | sahasriṇam | rayim | go-mantam | aśvinam || abhi | vājam | uta | śravaḥ ||9.63.12||

IAST: somo devo na sūryo 'dribhiḥ pavate sutaḥ
Griffith: Soma the God, expressed with stones, like Surya, floweth on his way,
Devanāgarī: सोमो देवो न सूर्योऽद्रिभिः पवते सुतः
pada pāṭha: somaḥ | devaḥ | na | sūryaḥ | adri-bhiḥ | pavate | sutaḥ || dadhānaḥ | kalaśe | rasam ||9.63.13||

IAST: dadhānaḥ kalaśe rasam
Griffith: Pouring the juice within the jar.
pada pāṭha: somaḥ | devaḥ | na | sūryaḥ | adri-bhiḥ | pavate | sutaḥ || dadhānaḥ | kalaśe | rasam ||9.63.13||

IAST: ete dhāmāny āryā śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā
Griffith: These brilliant drops have poured for us, in stream of solemn sacrifice,
pada pāṭha: ete | dhāmāni | āryā | śukrāḥ | r̥tasya | dhārayā || vājam | go-mantam | akṣaran ||9.63.14||

IAST: vājaṁ gomantam akṣaran
Griffith: Worshipful laws and strength in kine.
pada pāṭha: ete | dhāmāni | āryā | śukrāḥ | r̥tasya | dhārayā || vājam | go-mantam | akṣaran ||9.63.14||

IAST: sutā indrāya vajriṇe somāso dadhyāśiraḥ
Griffith: Over the cleansing sieve have flowed the Somas, blent with curdled milk,
pada pāṭha: sutāḥ | indrāya | vajriṇe | somāsaḥ | dadhi-āśiraḥ || pavitram | ati | akṣaran ||9.63.15||

IAST: pavitram aty akṣaran
Griffith: Effused for Indra Thunder-armed.
pada pāṭha: sutāḥ | indrāya | vajriṇe | somāsaḥ | dadhi-āśiraḥ || pavitram | ati | akṣaran ||9.63.15||

IAST: pra soma madhumattamo rāye arṣa pavitra ā
Griffith: Soma, do thou most rich in sweets, a gladdening drink most dear to Gods,
Devanāgarī: प्र सोम मधुमत्तमो राये अर्ष पवित्र आ
pada pāṭha: pra | soma | madhumat-tamaḥ | rāye | arṣa | pavitre | ā || madaḥ | yaḥ | deva-vītamaḥ ||9.63.16||

IAST: mado yo devavītamaḥ
Griffith: Flow to the sieve to bring us wealth.
pada pāṭha: pra | soma | madhumat-tamaḥ | rāye | arṣa | pavitre | ā || madaḥ | yaḥ | deva-vītamaḥ ||9.63.16||

IAST: tam ī mṛjanty āyavo hariṁ nadīṣu vājinam
Griffith: For Indra, living men adorn the Tawny Courser in the streams,
pada pāṭha: tam | īmiti | mr̥janti | āyavaḥ | harim | nadīṣu | vājinam || indum | indrāya | matsaram ||9.63.17||

IAST: indum indrāya matsaram
Griffith: Indu, the giver of delight.
pada pāṭha: tam | īmiti | mr̥janti | āyavaḥ | harim | nadīṣu | vājinam || indum | indrāya | matsaram ||9.63.17||

IAST: ā pavasva hiraṇyavad aśvāvat soma vīravat
Griffith: Pour for us, Soma, wealth in gold, in horses and heroic sons,
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | hiraṇya-vat | aśva-vat | soma | vīra-vat || vājam | go-mantam | ā | bhara ||9.63.18||

IAST: vājaṁ gomantam ā bhara
Griffith: Bring hither strength in herds of kine.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavasva | hiraṇya-vat | aśva-vat | soma | vīra-vat || vājam | go-mantam | ā | bhara ||9.63.18||

IAST: pari vāje na vājayum avyo vāreṣu siñcata
Griffith: For Indra pour ye on the fleece him very sweet to taste, who longs.
Devanāgarī: परि वाजे न वाजयुमव्यो वारेषु सिञ्चत
pada pāṭha: pari | vāje | na | vāja-yum | avyaḥ | vāreṣu | siñcata || indrāya | madhumat-tamam ||9.63.19||

IAST: indrāya madhumattamam
Griffith: For battle as it were in war.
pada pāṭha: pari | vāje | na | vāja-yum | avyaḥ | vāreṣu | siñcata || indrāya | madhumat-tamam ||9.63.19||

IAST: kavim mṛjanti marjyaṁ dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ
Griffith: The singers, seeking help, adorn the Sage who must be decked with songs:
pada pāṭha: kavim | mr̥janti | marjyam | dhībhiḥ | viprāḥ | avasyavaḥ || vr̥ṣā | kanikrat | arṣati ||9.63.20||

IAST: vṛṣā kanikrad arṣati
Griffith: Loud bellowing the Steer comes on,
pada pāṭha: kavim | mr̥janti | marjyam | dhībhiḥ | viprāḥ | avasyavaḥ || vr̥ṣā | kanikrat | arṣati ||9.63.20||

IAST: vṛṣaṇaṁ dhībhir apturaṁ somam ṛtasya dhārayā
Griffith: The singers with their thoughts and hymns have, in the stream of sacrifice,
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣaṇam | dhībhiḥ | ap-turam | somam | r̥tasya | dhārayā || matī | viprāḥ | sam | asvaran ||9.63.21||

IAST: matī viprāḥ sam asvaran
Griffith: Caused Soma, active Steer, to roar.
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣaṇam | dhībhiḥ | ap-turam | somam | r̥tasya | dhārayā || matī | viprāḥ | sam | asvaran ||9.63.21||

IAST: pavasva devāyuṣag indraṁ gacchatu te madaḥ
Griffith: God, working with mankind, flow on; to Indra go thy gladdening juice:
pada pāṭha: pavasva | deva | āyuṣak | indram | gacchatu | te | madaḥ || vāyum | ā | roha | dharmaṇā ||9.63.22||

IAST: vāyum ā roha dharmaṇā
Griffith: To Vayu mount as Law commands
pada pāṭha: pavasva | deva | āyuṣak | indram | gacchatu | te | madaḥ || vāyum | ā | roha | dharmaṇā ||9.63.22||

IAST: pavamāna ni tośase rayiṁ soma śravāyyam
Griffith: O Soma, Pavamana, thou pourest out wealth that brings renown:
Devanāgarī: पवमान नि तोशसे रयिं सोम श्रवाय्यम्
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | ni | tośase | rayim | soma | śravāyyam || priyaḥ | samudram | ā | viśa ||9.63.23||

IAST: priyaḥ samudram ā viśa
Griffith: Enter the lake, as one we love.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | ni | tośase | rayim | soma | śravāyyam || priyaḥ | samudram | ā | viśa ||9.63.23||

IAST: apaghnan pavase mṛdhaḥ kratuvit soma matsaraḥ
Griffith: Soma thou flowest chasing foes and bringing wisdom and delight:
pada pāṭha: apa-ghnan | pavase | mr̥dhaḥ | kratu-vit | soma | matsaraḥ || nudasva | adeva-yum | janam ||9.63.24||

IAST: nudasvādevayuṁ janam
Griffith: Drive off the folk who love not Gods.
pada pāṭha: apa-ghnan | pavase | mr̥dhaḥ | kratu-vit | soma | matsaraḥ || nudasva | adeva-yum | janam ||9.63.24||

IAST: pavamānā asṛkṣata somāḥ śukrāsa indavaḥ
Griffith: The Pavamanas have been poured, the brilliant drops of Soma juice,
pada pāṭha: pavamānāḥ | asr̥kṣata | somāḥ | śukrāsaḥ | indavaḥ || abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā ||9.63.25||

IAST: abhi viśvāni kāvyā
Griffith: For holy lore of every kind.
pada pāṭha: pavamānāḥ | asr̥kṣata | somāḥ | śukrāsaḥ | indavaḥ || abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā ||9.63.25||

IAST: pavamānāsa āśavaḥ śubhrā asṛgram indavaḥ
Griffith: The Pavamanas have been shed, the beautiful swift Soma-drops,
pada pāṭha: pavamānāsaḥ | āśavaḥ | śubhrāḥ | asr̥gram | indavaḥ || ghnantaḥ | viśvāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ ||9.63.26||

IAST: ghnanto viśvā apa dviṣaḥ
Griffith: Driving all enemies afar.
pada pāṭha: pavamānāsaḥ | āśavaḥ | śubhrāḥ | asr̥gram | indavaḥ || ghnantaḥ | viśvāḥ | apa | dviṣaḥ ||9.63.26||

IAST: pavamānā divas pary antarikṣād asṛkṣata
Griffith: From, heaven, from out the firmament, hath Pavamana been effused
pada pāṭha: pavamānāḥ | divaḥ | pari | antarikṣāt | asr̥kṣata || pr̥thivyāḥ | adhi | sānavi ||9.63.27||

IAST: pṛthivyā adhi sānavi
Griffith: Upon the summit of the earth.
pada pāṭha: pavamānāḥ | divaḥ | pari | antarikṣāt | asr̥kṣata || pr̥thivyāḥ | adhi | sānavi ||9.63.27||

IAST: punānaḥ soma dhārayendo viśvā apa sridhaḥ
Griffith: O Soma, Indu, very wise, drive, being purified, with thy stream
Devanāgarī: पुनानः सोम धारयेन्दो विश्वा अप स्रिधः
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | soma | dhārayā | indo iti | viśvāḥ | apa | sridhaḥ || jahi | rakṣāṁsi | sukrato iti su-krato ||9.63.28||

IAST: jahi rakṣāṁsi sukrato
Griffith: All foes, all Raksasas away.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | soma | dhārayā | indo iti | viśvāḥ | apa | sridhaḥ || jahi | rakṣāṁsi | sukrato iti su-krato ||9.63.28||

IAST: apaghnan soma rakṣaso 'bhy arṣa kanikradat
Griffith: Driving the Raksasas afar, O Soma, bellowing, pour for us
pada pāṭha: apa-ghnan | soma | rakṣasaḥ | abhi | arṣa | kanikradat || dyu-mantam | śuṣmam | ut-tamam ||9.63.29||

IAST: dyumantaṁ śuṣmam uttamam
Griffith: Most excellent and splendid strength.
pada pāṭha: apa-ghnan | soma | rakṣasaḥ | abhi | arṣa | kanikradat || dyu-mantam | śuṣmam | ut-tamam ||9.63.29||

IAST: asme vasūni dhāraya soma divyāni pārthivā
Griffith: Soma, do thou secure for us the treasures of the earih and heaven,
Devanāgarī: अस्मे वसूनि धारय सोम दिव्यानि पार्थिवा
pada pāṭha: asme iti | vasūni | dhāraya | soma | divyāni | pārthivā || indo iti | viśvāni | vāryā ||9.63.30||

IAST: indo viśvāni vāryā
Griffith: Indu, all boons to be desired.
pada pāṭha: asme iti | vasūni | dhāraya | soma | divyāni | pārthivā || indo iti | viśvāni | vāryā ||9.63.30||

IAST: vṛṣā soma dyumām̐ asi vṛṣā deva vṛṣavrataḥ
Griffith: Soma, thou art a splendid Steer, a Steer, O God, with steerlike sway:
Devanāgarī: वृषा सोम द्युमाँ असि वृषा देव वृषव्रतः
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣā | soma | dyu-mān | asi | vr̥ṣā | deva | vr̥ṣa-vrataḥ || vr̥ṣā | dharmāṇi | dadhiṣe ||9.64.1||

IAST: vṛṣā dharmāṇi dadhiṣe
Griffith: Thou as a Steer ordainest laws.
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣā | soma | dyu-mān | asi | vr̥ṣā | deva | vr̥ṣa-vrataḥ || vr̥ṣā | dharmāṇi | dadhiṣe ||9.64.1||

IAST: vṛṣṇas te vṛṣṇyaṁ śavo vṛṣā vanaṁ vṛṣā madaḥ
Griffith: Steer-strong thy might is as a steer's, steerstrong thywood, steer-like thy drink
Devanāgarī: वृष्णस्ते वृष्ण्यं शवो वृषा वनं वृषा मदः
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣṇaḥ | te | vr̥ṣṇyam | śavaḥ | vr̥ṣā | vanam | vr̥ṣā | madaḥ || satyam | vr̥ṣan | vr̥ṣā | it | asi ||9.64.2||

IAST: satyaṁ vṛṣan vṛṣed asi
Griffith: A Steer indeed, O Steer, art thou.
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣṇaḥ | te | vr̥ṣṇyam | śavaḥ | vr̥ṣā | vanam | vr̥ṣā | madaḥ || satyam | vr̥ṣan | vr̥ṣā | it | asi ||9.64.2||

IAST: aśvo na cakrado vṛṣā saṁ gā indo sam arvataḥ
Griffith: Thou, Indu, as a vigorous horse, hast neighed together steeds and kine:
Devanāgarī: अश्वो न चक्रदो वृषा सं गा इन्दो समर्वतः
pada pāṭha: aśvaḥ | na | cakradaḥ | vr̥ṣā | sam | gāḥ | indo iti | sam | arvataḥ || vi | naḥ | rāye | duraḥ | vr̥dhi ||9.64.3||

IAST: vi no rāye duro vṛdhi
Griffith: Unbar for us the doors to wealth.
pada pāṭha: aśvaḥ | na | cakradaḥ | vr̥ṣā | sam | gāḥ | indo iti | sam | arvataḥ || vi | naḥ | rāye | duraḥ | vr̥dhi ||9.64.3||

IAST: asṛkṣata pra vājino gavyā somāso aśvayā
Griffith: Out of desire of cows and steeds and horses. potent Soma-drops,
Devanāgarī: असृक्षत प्र वाजिनो गव्या सोमासो अश्वया
pada pāṭha: asr̥kṣata | pra | vājinaḥ | gavyā | somāsaḥ | aśva-yā || śukrāsaḥ | vīra-yā | āśavaḥ ||9.64.4||

IAST: śukrāso vīrayāśavaḥ
Griffith: Brilliant and swift, have been effused.
pada pāṭha: asr̥kṣata | pra | vājinaḥ | gavyā | somāsaḥ | aśva-yā || śukrāsaḥ | vīra-yā | āśavaḥ ||9.64.4||

IAST: śumbhamānā ṛtāyubhir mṛjyamānā gabhastyoḥ
Griffith: They purified in both the hands, made beautiful by holy men,
pada pāṭha: śumbhamānāḥ | r̥tayu-bhiḥ | mr̥jyamānāḥ | gabhastyoḥ || pavante | vāre | avyaye ||9.64.5||

IAST: pavante vāre avyaye
Griffith: Flow onward to the fleecy cloth.
pada pāṭha: śumbhamānāḥ | r̥tayu-bhiḥ | mr̥jyamānāḥ | gabhastyoḥ || pavante | vāre | avyaye ||9.64.5||

IAST: te viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somā divyāni pārthivā
Griffith: These Soma juices shall pour forth all treasures for the worshipper
Devanāgarī: ते विश्वा दाशुषे वसु सोमा दिव्यानि पार्थिवा
pada pāṭha: te | viśvā | dāśuṣe | vasu | somāḥ | divyāni | pārthivā || pavantām | ā | antarikṣyā ||9.64.6||

IAST: pavantām āntarikṣyā
Griffith: From heaven and earth and firmament.
pada pāṭha: te | viśvā | dāśuṣe | vasu | somāḥ | divyāni | pārthivā || pavantām | ā | antarikṣyā ||9.64.6||

IAST: pavamānasya viśvavit pra te sargā asṛkṣata
Griffith: The streams of Pavamana, thine, Finder of all, have been effused,
pada pāṭha: pavamānasya | viśva-vit | pra | te | sargāḥ | asr̥kṣata || sūryasya-iva | na | raśmayaḥ ||9.64.7||

IAST: sūryasyeva na raśmayaḥ
Griffith: Even as Surya's rays of light.
pada pāṭha: pavamānasya | viśva-vit | pra | te | sargāḥ | asr̥kṣata || sūryasya-iva | na | raśmayaḥ ||9.64.7||

IAST: ketuṁ kṛṇvan divas pari viśvā rūpābhy arṣasi
Griffith: Making the light that shines from heaven thou flowest on to every form
pada pāṭha: ketum | kr̥ṇvan | divaḥ | pari | viśvā | rūpā | abhi | arṣasi || samudraḥ | soma | pinvase ||9.64.8||

IAST: samudraḥ soma pinvase
Griffith: Soma, thou swellest like a sea.
pada pāṭha: ketum | kr̥ṇvan | divaḥ | pari | viśvā | rūpā | abhi | arṣasi || samudraḥ | soma | pinvase ||9.64.8||

IAST: hinvāno vācam iṣyasi pavamāna vidharmaṇi
Griffith: Urged on thou sendest out thy voice, O Pavamana; thou hast moved,
pada pāṭha: hinvānaḥ | vācam | iṣyasi | pavamāna | vi-dharmaṇi || akrān | devaḥ | na | sūryaḥ ||9.64.9||

IAST: akrān devo na sūryaḥ
Griffith: Like the God Surya, to the sieve.
pada pāṭha: hinvānaḥ | vācam | iṣyasi | pavamāna | vi-dharmaṇi || akrān | devaḥ | na | sūryaḥ ||9.64.9||

IAST: induḥ paviṣṭa cetanaḥ priyaḥ kavīnām matī
Griffith: Indu, Enlightener, Friend, hath been purified by the sages' hymns:
Devanāgarī: इन्दुः पविष्ट चेतनः प्रियः कवीनां मती
pada pāṭha: induḥ | paviṣṭa | cetanaḥ | priyaḥ | kavīnām | matī || sr̥jat | aśvam | rathīḥ-iva ||9.64.10||

IAST: sṛjad aśvaṁ rathīr iva
Griffith: So starts the charioteer his steed-
pada pāṭha: induḥ | paviṣṭa | cetanaḥ | priyaḥ | kavīnām | matī || sr̥jat | aśvam | rathīḥ-iva ||9.64.10||

IAST: ūrmir yas te pavitra ā devāvīḥ paryakṣarat
Griffith: Thy God-delighting wave which hath flowed to purifying seive,
pada pāṭha: ūrmiḥ | yaḥ | te | pavitre | ā | dava-avīḥ | pari-akṣarat || sīdan | r̥tasya | yonim | ā ||9.64.11||

IAST: sīdann ṛtasya yonim ā
Griffith: Alighting in the home of Law.
pada pāṭha: ūrmiḥ | yaḥ | te | pavitre | ā | dava-avīḥ | pari-akṣarat || sīdan | r̥tasya | yonim | ā ||9.64.11||

IAST: sa no arṣa pavitra ā mado yo devavītamaḥ
Griffith: Flow to our sieve, a gladdening draught that hath most intercourse with Gods,
Devanāgarī: स नो अर्ष पवित्र आ मदो यो देववीतमः
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | arṣa | pavitre | ā | madaḥ | yaḥ | deva-vītamaḥ || indo iti | indrāya | pītaye ||9.64.12||

IAST: indav indrāya pītaye
Griffith: Indu, to Indra for his drink.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | arṣa | pavitre | ā | madaḥ | yaḥ | deva-vītamaḥ || indo iti | indrāya | pītaye ||9.64.12||

IAST: iṣe pavasva dhārayā mṛjyamāno manīṣibhiḥ
Griffith: Flow onward with a stream for food, made beautiful by sapient men:
pada pāṭha: iṣe | pavasva | dhārayā | mr̥jyamānaḥ | manīṣi-bhiḥ || indo iti | rucā | abhi | gāḥ | ihi ||9.64.13||

IAST: indo rucābhi gā ihi
Griffith: Indu with sheen approach the milk.
pada pāṭha: iṣe | pavasva | dhārayā | mr̥jyamānaḥ | manīṣi-bhiḥ || indo iti | rucā | abhi | gāḥ | ihi ||9.64.13||

IAST: punāno varivas kṛdhy ūrjaṁ janāya girvaṇaḥ
Griffith: While thou art cleansed, Song-Lover, bring comfort and vigour to the folk,
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | varivaḥ | kr̥dhi | ūrjam | janāya | girvaṇaḥ || hare | sr̥jānaḥ | ā-śiram ||9.64.14||

IAST: hare sṛjāna āśiram
Griffith: Poured, Tawny One! on milk and curds.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | varivaḥ | kr̥dhi | ūrjam | janāya | girvaṇaḥ || hare | sr̥jānaḥ | ā-śiram ||9.64.14||

IAST: punāno devavītaya indrasya yāhi niṣkṛtam
Griffith: Purified for the feast of Gods, go thou to Indra's special place,
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | deva-vītaye | indrasya | yāhi | niḥ-kr̥tam || dyutānaḥ | vāji-bhiḥ | yataḥ ||9.64.15||

IAST: dyutāno vājibhir yataḥ
Griffith: Resplendent, guided by the strong.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | deva-vītaye | indrasya | yāhi | niḥ-kr̥tam || dyutānaḥ | vāji-bhiḥ | yataḥ ||9.64.15||

IAST: pra hinvānāsa indavo 'cchā samudram āśavaḥ
Griffith: Accelerated by the hymn, the rapid drops of Soma juice
pada pāṭha: pra | hinvānāsaḥ | indavaḥ | accha | samudram | āśavaḥ || dhiyā | jūtāḥ | asr̥kṣata ||9.64.16||

IAST: dhiyā jūtā asṛkṣata
Griffith: Have flowed, urged onward, to the lake.
pada pāṭha: pra | hinvānāsaḥ | indavaḥ | accha | samudram | āśavaḥ || dhiyā | jūtāḥ | asr̥kṣata ||9.64.16||

IAST: marmṛjānāsa āyavo vṛthā samudram indavaḥ
Griffith: Easily have the living drops, made beautiful, approached the lake,
pada pāṭha: marmr̥jānāsaḥ | āyavaḥ | vr̥thā | samudram | indavaḥ || agman | r̥tasya | yonim | ā ||9.64.17||

IAST: agmann ṛtasya yonim ā
Griffith: Yea, to the place of sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: marmr̥jānāsaḥ | āyavaḥ | vr̥thā | samudram | indavaḥ || agman | r̥tasya | yonim | ā ||9.64.17||

IAST: pari ṇo yāhy asmayur viśvā vasūny ojasā
Griffith: Compass about, our faithful Friend, all our possessions with thy might:
pada pāṭha: pari | naḥ | yāhi | asma-yuḥ | viśvā | vasūni | ojasā || pāhi | naḥ | śarma | vīra-vat ||9.64.18||

IAST: pāhi naḥ śarma vīravat
Griffith: Guard, hero like, our sheltering home.
pada pāṭha: pari | naḥ | yāhi | asma-yuḥ | viśvā | vasūni | ojasā || pāhi | naḥ | śarma | vīra-vat ||9.64.18||

IAST: mimāti vahnir etaśaḥ padaṁ yujāna ṛkvabhiḥ
Griffith: Loud neighs the Courser Etasa, with singers, harnessed for the place,
pada pāṭha: mimāti | vahniḥ | etaśaḥ | padam | yujānaḥ | r̥kva-bhiḥ || pra | yat | samudre | ā-hitaḥ ||9.64.19||

IAST: pra yat samudra āhitaḥ
Griffith: Guided for travel to the lake.
pada pāṭha: mimāti | vahniḥ | etaśaḥ | padam | yujānaḥ | r̥kva-bhiḥ || pra | yat | samudre | ā-hitaḥ ||9.64.19||

IAST: ā yad yoniṁ hiraṇyayam āśur ṛtasya sīdati
Griffith: What time the Swift One resteth in the golden place of sacrifice,
pada pāṭha: ā | yat | yonim | hiraṇyayam | āśuḥ | r̥tasya | sīdati || jahāti | apra-cetasaḥ ||9.64.20||

IAST: jahāty apracetasaḥ
Griffith: He leaves the foolish far away.
pada pāṭha: ā | yat | yonim | hiraṇyayam | āśuḥ | r̥tasya | sīdati || jahāti | apra-cetasaḥ ||9.64.20||

IAST: abhi venā anūṣateyakṣanti pracetasaḥ
Griffith: The friends have sung in unison, the prudent wish to sacrifice:
pada pāṭha: abhi | venāḥ | anūṣata | iyakṣanti | pra-cetasaḥ || majjanti | avi-cetasaḥ ||9.64.21||

IAST: majjanty avicetasaḥ
Griffith: Down sink the unintelligent.
pada pāṭha: abhi | venāḥ | anūṣata | iyakṣanti | pra-cetasaḥ || majjanti | avi-cetasaḥ ||9.64.21||

IAST: indrāyendo marutvate pavasva madhumattamaḥ
Griffith: For Indra girt by Maruts, flow, thou Indu, very rich in sweets,
pada pāṭha: indrāya | indo iti | marutvate | pavasva | madhumat-tamaḥ || r̥tasya | yonim | ā-sadam ||9.64.22||

IAST: ṛtasya yonim āsadam
Griffith: To sit in place of sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: indrāya | indo iti | marutvate | pavasva | madhumat-tamaḥ || r̥tasya | yonim | ā-sadam ||9.64.22||

IAST: taṁ tvā viprā vacovidaḥ pari ṣkṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ
Griffith: Controlling priests and sages skilled in holy song adorn thee well:
Devanāgarī: तं त्वा विप्रा वचोविदः परि ष्कृण्वन्ति वेधसः
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | viprāḥ | vacaḥ-vidaḥ | pari | kr̥ṇvanti | vedhasaḥ || sam | tvā | mr̥janti | āyavaḥ ||9.64.23||

IAST: saṁ tvā mṛjanty āyavaḥ
Griffith: The living make thee beautiful.
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | viprāḥ | vacaḥ-vidaḥ | pari | kr̥ṇvanti | vedhasaḥ || sam | tvā | mr̥janti | āyavaḥ ||9.64.23||

IAST: rasaṁ te mitro aryamā pibanti varuṇaḥ kave
Griffith: Aryaman, Mitra, Varuna drink Pavamana's juice, yea, thine:
Devanāgarī: रसं ते मित्रो अर्यमा पिबन्ति वरुणः कवे
pada pāṭha: rasam | te | mitraḥ | aryamā | pibanti | varuṇaḥ | kave || pavamānasya | marutaḥ ||9.64.24||

IAST: pavamānasya marutaḥ
Griffith: O Sage, the Maruts drink thereof.
pada pāṭha: rasam | te | mitraḥ | aryamā | pibanti | varuṇaḥ | kave || pavamānasya | marutaḥ ||9.64.24||

IAST: tvaṁ soma vipaścitam punāno vācam iṣyasi
Griffith: O Soma, Indu, thou while thou art purified urgest onward speech.
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | vipaḥ-citam | punānaḥ | vācam | iṣyasi || indo iti | sahasra-bharṇasam ||9.64.25||

IAST: indo sahasrabharṇasam
Griffith: Thousandfold, with the lore of hymns.
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | vipaḥ-citam | punānaḥ | vācam | iṣyasi || indo iti | sahasra-bharṇasam ||9.64.25||

IAST: uto sahasrabharṇasaṁ vācaṁ soma makhasyuvam
Griffith: Yea, Soma, Indu, while thou art purified do thou bring to us
pada pāṭha: uto iti | sahasra-bharṇasam | vācam | soma | makhasyuvam || punānaḥ | indo iti | ā | bhara ||9.64.26||

IAST: punāna indav ā bhara
Griffith: Speech thousandfold that longs for war.
pada pāṭha: uto iti | sahasra-bharṇasam | vācam | soma | makhasyuvam || punānaḥ | indo iti | ā | bhara ||9.64.26||

IAST: punāna indav eṣām puruhūta janānām
Griffith: O Indu, Much-invoked, while thou art purifying, as the Friend.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | indo iti | eṣām | puru-hūta | janānām || priyaḥ | samudram | ā | viśa ||9.64.27||

IAST: priyaḥ samudram ā viśa
Griffith: Of these men enter thou the lake.
pada pāṭha: punānaḥ | indo iti | eṣām | puru-hūta | janānām || priyaḥ | samudram | ā | viśa ||9.64.27||

IAST: davidyutatyā rucā pariṣṭobhantyā kṛpā
Griffith: Bright are these Somas blent with milk, with light that flashes brilliantly.
pada pāṭha: davidyutatyā | rucā | pari-stobhantyā | kr̥pā || somāḥ | śukrāḥ | go-āśiraḥ ||9.64.28||

IAST: somāḥ śukrā gavāśiraḥ
Griffith: And form that utters loud accclaim.
pada pāṭha: davidyutatyā | rucā | pari-stobhantyā | kr̥pā || somāḥ | śukrāḥ | go-āśiraḥ ||9.64.28||

IAST: hinvāno hetṛbhir yata ā vājaṁ vājy akramīt
Griffith: Led by his drivers, and sent forth, the Strong Steed hath come nigh for spoil,
pada pāṭha: hinvānaḥ | hetr̥-bhiḥ | yataḥ | ā | vājam | vājī | akramīt || sīdantaḥ | vanuṣaḥ | yathā ||9.64.29||

IAST: sīdanto vanuṣo yathā
Griffith: Like warriors when they stand arrayed.
pada pāṭha: hinvānaḥ | hetr̥-bhiḥ | yataḥ | ā | vājam | vājī | akramīt || sīdantaḥ | vanuṣaḥ | yathā ||9.64.29||

IAST: ṛdhak soma svastaye saṁjagmāno divaḥ kaviḥ
Griffith: Specially, Soma, coming as a Sage from heaven to prosper us,
pada pāṭha: r̥dhak | soma | svastaye | sam-jagmānaḥ | divaḥ | kaviḥ || pavasva | sūryaḥ | dr̥śe ||9.64.30||

IAST: pavasva sūryo dṛśe
Griffith: Flow like the Sun for us to see.
pada pāṭha: r̥dhak | soma | svastaye | sam-jagmānaḥ | divaḥ | kaviḥ || pavasva | sūryaḥ | dr̥śe ||9.64.30||

IAST: hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ svasāro jāmayas patim
Griffith: THE, glittering maids send Sura forth, the glorious sisters, close-allied,
pada pāṭha: hinvanti | sūram | usrayaḥ | svasāraḥ | jāmayaḥ | patim || mahām | indum | mahīyuvaḥ ||9.65.1||

IAST: mahām indum mahīyuvaḥ
Griffith: Send Indu forth, their mighty Lord.
pada pāṭha: hinvanti | sūram | usrayaḥ | svasāraḥ | jāmayaḥ | patim || mahām | indum | mahīyuvaḥ ||9.65.1||

IAST: pavamāna rucā-rucā devo devebhyas pari
Griffith: Pervade, O Pavamana, all our treasures with repeated light,
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | rucā-rucā | devaḥ | devebhyaḥ | pari || viśvā | vasūni | ā | viśa ||9.65.2||

IAST: viśvā vasūny ā viśa
Griffith: God, coming hither from the Gods.
pada pāṭha: pavamāna | rucā-rucā | devaḥ | devebhyaḥ | pari || viśvā | vasūni | ā | viśa ||9.65.2||

IAST: ā pavamāna suṣṭutiṁ vṛṣṭiṁ devebhyo duvaḥ
Griffith: Pour on us, Pavamana, rain, as service and rain praise for Gods:
Devanāgarī: आ पवमान सुष्टुतिं वृष्टिं देवेभ्यो दुवः
pada pāṭha: ā | pavamāna | su-stutim | vr̥ṣṭim | devebhyaḥ | duvaḥ || iṣe | pavasva | sam-yatam ||9.65.3||

IAST: iṣe pavasva saṁyatam
Griffith: Pour all to be our nourishment.
pada pāṭha: ā | pavamāna | su-stutim | vr̥ṣṭim | devebhyaḥ | duvaḥ || iṣe | pavasva | sam-yatam ||9.65.3||

IAST: vṛṣā hy asi bhānunā dyumantaṁ tvā havāmahe
Griffith: Thou art a Steer by lustre: we, O Pavamana, faithfully
Devanāgarī: वृषा ह्यसि भानुना द्युमन्तं त्वा हवामहे
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣā | hi | asi | bhānunā | dyu-mantam | tvā | havāmahe || pavamāna | su-ādhyaḥ ||9.65.4||

IAST: pavamāna svādhyaḥ
Griffith: Call upon thee the Splendid One.
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣā | hi | asi | bhānunā | dyu-mantam | tvā | havāmahe || pavamāna | su-ādhyaḥ ||9.65.4||

IAST: ā pavasva suvīryam mandamānaḥ svāyudha
Griffith: Do thou, rejoicing, nobly-armed! pour upon us heroic strength:
pada pāṭha: ā | pāvasva | su-vīryam | mandamānaḥ | su-āyudha || iho iti | su | indo iti | ā | gahi ||9.65.5||

IAST: iho ṣv indav ā gahi
Griffith: O Indu, come thou bitherward.
pada pāṭha: ā | pāvasva | su-vīryam | mandamānaḥ | su-āyudha || iho iti | su | indo iti | ā | gahi ||9.65.5||

IAST: yad adbhiḥ pariṣicyase mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ
Griffith: When thou art cleansed with both the hands and dipped in waters, with the wood.
pada pāṭha: yat | at-bhiḥ | pari-sicyase | mr̥jyamānaḥ | gabhastyoḥ || druṇā | sadha-stham | aśnuṣe ||9.65.6||

IAST: druṇā sadhastham aśnuṣe
Griffith: Thou comest to the gathering-place.
pada pāṭha: yat | at-bhiḥ | pari-sicyase | mr̥jyamānaḥ | gabhastyoḥ || druṇā | sadha-stham | aśnuṣe ||9.65.6||

IAST: pra somāya vyaśvavat pavamānāya gāyata
Griffith: Sing forth your songs, as Vyasva sang, to Soma Pavamana, to,
pada pāṭha: pra | somāya | vyaśva-vat | pavamānāya | gāyata || mahe | sahasra-cakṣase ||9.65.7||

IAST: mahe sahasracakṣase
Griffith: The Mighty One with thousand eyes;
pada pāṭha: pra | somāya | vyaśva-vat | pavamānāya | gāyata || mahe | sahasra-cakṣase ||9.65.7||

IAST: yasya varṇam madhuścutaṁ hariṁ hinvanty adribhiḥ
Griffith: Whose coloured sap they drive with stones, the yellow meath-distilling juice,
pada pāṭha: yasya | varṇam | madhu-ścutam | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || indum | indrāya | pītaye ||9.65.8||

IAST: indum indrāya pītaye
Griffith: Indu for Indra, for his drink.
pada pāṭha: yasya | varṇam | madhu-ścutam | harim | hinvanti | adri-bhiḥ || indum | indrāya | pītaye ||9.65.8||

IAST: tasya te vājino vayaṁ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ
Griffith: We seek to gain the friendly love of thee that Strong and Mighty One,
Devanāgarī: तस्य ते वाजिनो वयं विश्वा धनानि जिग्युषः
pada pāṭha: tasya | te | vājinaḥ | vayam | viśvā | dhanāni | jigyuṣaḥ || sakhi-tvam | ā | vr̥ṇīmahe ||9.65.9||

IAST: sakhitvam ā vṛṇīmahe
Griffith: Of thee the winner of all wealth.
pada pāṭha: tasya | te | vājinaḥ | vayam | viśvā | dhanāni | jigyuṣaḥ || sakhi-tvam | ā | vr̥ṇīmahe ||9.65.9||

IAST: vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā marutvate ca matsaraḥ
Griffith: Flow onward with thy stream, a Steer, inspiriting the Maruts' Lord,
Devanāgarī: वृषा पवस्व धारया मरुत्वते च मत्सरः
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣā | pavasva | dhārayā | marutvate | ca | matsaraḥ || viśvā | dadhānaḥ | ojasā ||9.65.10||

IAST: viśvā dadhāna ojasā
Griffith: Winning all riches by thy might.
pada pāṭha: vr̥ṣā | pavasva | dhārayā | marutvate | ca | matsaraḥ || viśvā | dadhānaḥ | ojasā ||9.65.10||

IAST: taṁ tvā dhartāram oṇyoḥ pavamāna svardṛśam
Griffith: I send thee forth to battle from the press, O Pavamana, Strong,
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | dhartāram | oṇyoḥ | pavamāna | svaḥ-dr̥śam || hinve | vājeṣu | vājinam ||9.65.11||

IAST: hinve vājeṣu vājinam
Griffith: Sustainer, looker on the light.
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | dhartāram | oṇyoḥ | pavamāna | svaḥ-dr̥śam || hinve | vājeṣu | vājinam ||9.65.11||

IAST: ayā citto vipānayā hariḥ pavasva dhārayā
Griffith: Acknowledged by this song of mine, flow, tawny-coloured, with thy stream
Devanāgarī: अया चित्तो विपानया हरिः पवस्व धारया
pada pāṭha: ayā | cittaḥ | vipā | anayā | hariḥ | pavasva | dhārayā || yujam | vājeṣu | codaya ||9.65.12||

IAST: yujaṁ vājeṣu codaya
Griffith: Incite to battle thine ally.
pada pāṭha: ayā | cittaḥ | vipā | anayā | hariḥ | pavasva | dhārayā || yujam | vājeṣu | codaya ||9.65.12||

IAST: ā na indo mahīm iṣam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ
Griffith: O Indu, visible to all pour out for us abundant food:
Devanāgarī: आ न इन्दो महीमिषं पवस्व विश्वदर्शतः
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | indo iti | mahīm | iṣam | pavasva | viśva-darśataḥ || asmabhyam | soma | gātu-vit ||9.65.13||

IAST: asmabhyaṁ soma gātuvit
Griffith: Soma, be thou our prosperer.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | indo iti | mahīm | iṣam | pavasva | viśva-darśataḥ || asmabhyam | soma | gātu-vit ||9.65.13||

IAST: ā kalaśā anūṣatendo dhārābhir ojasā
Griffith: The pitchers, Indu, with thy streams have sung aloud in vigorous might
pada pāṭha: ā | kalaśāḥ | anūṣata | indo iti | dhārābhiḥ | ojasā || ā | indrasya | pītaye | viśa ||9.65.14||

IAST: endrasya pītaye viśa
Griffith: Enter them, and let Indra drink.
pada pāṭha: ā | kalaśāḥ | anūṣata | indo iti | dhārābhiḥ | ojasā || ā | indrasya | pītaye | viśa ||9.65.14||

IAST: yasya te madyaṁ rasaṁ tīvraṁ duhanty adribhiḥ
Griffith: O thou whose potent gladdening juice they milk out with the stones, flow on,
Devanāgarī: यस्य ते मद्यं रसं तीव्रं दुहन्त्यद्रिभिः
pada pāṭha: yasya | te | madyam | rasam | tīvram | duhanti | adri-bhiḥ || saḥ | pavasva | abhimāti-hā ||9.65.15||

IAST: sa pavasvābhimātihā
Griffith: Destroyer of our enemies.
pada pāṭha: yasya | te | madyam | rasam | tīvram | duhanti | adri-bhiḥ || saḥ | pavasva | abhimāti-hā ||9.65.15||

IAST: rājā medhābhir īyate pavamāno manāv adhi
Griffith: King Pavamana is implored with holy songs, on man's behalf,
pada pāṭha: rājā | medhābhiḥ | īyate | pavamānaḥ | manau | adhi || antarikṣeṇa | yātave ||9.65.16||

IAST: antarikṣeṇa yātave
Griffith: To travel through the firmament.
pada pāṭha: rājā | medhābhiḥ | īyate | pavamānaḥ | manau | adhi || antarikṣeṇa | yātave ||9.65.16||

IAST: ā na indo śatagvinaṁ gavām poṣaṁ svaśvyam
Griffith: Bring us, O Indu, hundredfold increase of kine, and noble steeds,
Devanāgarī: आ न इन्दो शतग्विनं गवां पोषं स्वश्व्यम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | indo iti | śata-gvinam | gavām | poṣam | su-aśvyam || vaha | bhagattim | ūtaye ||9.65.17||

IAST: vahā bhagattim ūtaye
Griffith: The gift of fortune for our help.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | indo iti | śata-gvinam | gavām | poṣam | su-aśvyam || vaha | bhagattim | ūtaye ||9.65.17||

IAST: ā naḥ soma saho juvo rūpaṁ na varcase bhara
Griffith: Pressed for the banquet of the Gods, O Soma, bring us might, and speed,
Devanāgarī: आ नः सोम सहो जुवो रूपं न वर्चसे भर
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | soma | sahaḥ | juvaḥ | rūpam | na | varcase | bhara || susvānaḥ | deva-vītaye ||9.65.18||

IAST: suṣvāṇo devavītaye
Griffith: Like beauty for a brilliant show.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | soma | sahaḥ | juvaḥ | rūpam | na | varcase | bhara || susvānaḥ | deva-vītaye ||9.65.18||

IAST: arṣā soma dyumattamo 'bhi droṇāni roruvat
Griffith: Soma, flow on exceeding bright with loud roar to the wooden vats,
pada pāṭha: arṣa | soma | dyumat-tamaḥ | abhi | droṇāni | roruvat || sīdan | śyenaḥ | na | yonim | ā ||9.65.19||

IAST: sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā
Griffith: Falcon-like resting in thine home.
pada pāṭha: arṣa | soma | dyumat-tamaḥ | abhi | droṇāni | roruvat || sīdan | śyenaḥ | na | yonim | ā ||9.65.19||

IAST: apsā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ
Griffith: Soma, the Water-winner flows to Indra, Vayu, Varuna,
pada pāṭha: apsāḥ | indrāya | vāyave | varuṇāya | marut-bhyaḥ || somaḥ | arṣati | viṣṇave ||9.65.20||

IAST: somo arṣati viṣṇave
Griffith: To Visnu and the Marut host.
pada pāṭha: apsāḥ | indrāya | vāyave | varuṇāya | marut-bhyaḥ || somaḥ | arṣati | viṣṇave ||9.65.20||

IAST: iṣaṁ tokāya no dadhad asmabhyaṁ soma viśvataḥ
Griffith: Soma , bestowing food upon our progeny, from every sides,
Devanāgarī: इषं तोकाय नो दधदस्मभ्यं सोम विश्वतः
pada pāṭha: iṣam | tokāya | naḥ | dadhat | asmabhyam | soma | viśvataḥ || ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam ||9.65.21||

IAST: ā pavasva sahasriṇam
Griffith: Pour on us riches thousandfold
pada pāṭha: iṣam | tokāya | naḥ | dadhat | asmabhyam | soma | viśvataḥ || ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam ||9.65.21||

IAST: ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire
Griffith: The Soma juices which have been expressed afar or near at hand,
Devanāgarī: ये सोमासः परावति ये अर्वावति सुन्विरे
pada pāṭha: ye | somāsaḥ | parā-vati | ye | arvā-vati | sunvire || ye | vā | adaḥ | śaryaṇā-vati ||9.65.22||

IAST: ye vādaḥ śaryaṇāvati
Griffith: Or there on Saryanavan's bank,
pada pāṭha: ye | somāsaḥ | parā-vati | ye | arvā-vati | sunvire || ye | vā | adaḥ | śaryaṇā-vati ||9.65.22||

IAST: ya ārjīkeṣu kṛtvasu ye madhye pastyānām
Griffith: Those pressed among Arjikas, pressed among the active, in men's homes,
Devanāgarī: य आर्जीकेषु कृत्वसु ये मध्ये पस्त्यानाम्
pada pāṭha: ye | ārjīkeṣu | kr̥tva-su | ye | madhye | pastyānām || ye | vā | janeṣu | pañca-su ||9.65.23||

IAST: ye vā janeṣu pañcasu
Griffith: Or pressed among the Races Five-
pada pāṭha: ye | ārjīkeṣu | kr̥tva-su | ye | madhye | pastyānām || ye | vā | janeṣu | pañca-su ||9.65.23||

IAST: te no vṛṣṭiṁ divas pari pavantām ā suvīryam
Griffith: May these celestial drops, expressed, pour forth upon us, as they flow,
Devanāgarī: ते नो वृष्टिं दिवस्परि पवन्तामा सुवीर्यम्
pada pāṭha: te | naḥ | vr̥ṣṭim | divaḥ | pari | pavantām | ā | su-vīryam || suvānāḥ | devāsaḥ | indavaḥ ||9.65.24||

IAST: suvānā devāsa indavaḥ
Griffith: Rain from the heavens apd hero strength.
pada pāṭha: te | naḥ | vr̥ṣṭim | divaḥ | pari | pavantām | ā | su-vīryam || suvānāḥ | devāsaḥ | indavaḥ ||9.65.24||

IAST: pavate haryato harir gṛṇāno jamadagninā
Griffith: Urged forward o'er the ox-hide flows the Lovely One of tawny hue,
pada pāṭha: pavate | haryataḥ | hariḥ | gr̥ṇānaḥ | jamat-agninā || hinvānaḥ | goḥ | adhi | tvaci ||9.65.25||

IAST: hinvāno gor adhi tvaci
Griffith: Lauded by Jamadagni's song.
pada pāṭha: pavate | haryataḥ | hariḥ | gr̥ṇānaḥ | jamat-agninā || hinvānaḥ | goḥ | adhi | tvaci ||9.65.25||

IAST: pra śukrāso vayojuvo hinvānāso na saptayaḥ
Griffith: Like horses urged to speed, the drops, bright, stirring vital power, when blent
Devanāgarī: प्र शुक्रासो वयोजुवो हिन्वानासो न सप्तयः
pada pāṭha: pra | śukrāsaḥ | vayaḥ-juvaḥ | hinvānāsaḥ | na | saptayaḥ || śrīṇānāḥ | ap-su | mr̥ñjata ||9.65.26||

IAST: śrīṇānā apsu mṛñjata
Griffith: With milk, are beautified in streams.
pada pāṭha: pra | śukrāsaḥ | vayaḥ-juvaḥ | hinvānāsaḥ | na | saptayaḥ || śrīṇānāḥ | ap-su | mr̥ñjata ||9.65.26||

IAST: taṁ tvā suteṣv ābhuvo hinvire devatātaye
Griffith: So they who toil with juices send thee forward for the Gods' repast:
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | suteṣu | ā-bhuvaḥ | hinvire | deva-tātaye || saḥ | pavasva | anayā | rucā ||9.65.27||

IAST: sa pavasvānayā rucā
Griffith: So with this splendour flow thou on.
pada pāṭha: tam | tvā | suteṣu | ā-bhuvaḥ | hinvire | deva-tātaye || saḥ | pavasva | anayā | rucā ||9.65.27||

IAST: ā te dakṣam mayobhuvaṁ vahnim adyā vṛṇīmahe
Griffith: We choose to-day that chariot-steed of thine, the Strong, that brings us bliss,
Devanāgarī: आ ते दक्षं मयोभुवं वह्निमद्या वृणीमहे

IAST: pāntam ā puruspṛham
Griffith: The Guardian, the desire of all,
pada pāṭha: ā | te | dakṣam | mayaḥ-bhuvam | vahnim | adya | vr̥ṇīmahe || pāntam | ā | puru-spr̥ham ||9.65.28||

IAST: ā mandram ā vareṇyam ā vipram ā manīṣiṇam
Griffith: The Excellent, the Gladdener, the Sage with heart that understands,

IAST: pāntam ā puruspṛham
Griffith: The Guardian, the desire of all;

IAST: ā rayim ā sucetunam ā sukrato tanūṣv ā
Griffith: Who for ourselves, O thou Most Wise, is wealth and fair intelligence,
pada pāṭha: ā | rayim | ā | su-cetunam | ā | sukrato iti su-krato | tanūṣu | ā || pāntam | ā | puru-spr̥ham ||9.65.30||

IAST: pāntam ā puruspṛham
Griffith: The Guardian, the desire of all.
pada pāṭha: ā | rayim | ā | su-cetunam | ā | sukrato iti su-krato | tanūṣu | ā || pāntam | ā | puru-spr̥ham ||9.65.30||

IAST: pavasva viśvacarṣaṇe 'bhi viśvāni kāvyā
Griffith: FOR holy lore of every sort, flow onward thou whom all men love.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | viśva-carṣaṇe | abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā || sakhā | sakhi-bhyaḥ | īḍyaḥ ||9.66.1||

IAST: sakhā sakhibhya īḍyaḥ
Griffith: A Friend to be besought by friends.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | viśva-carṣaṇe | abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā || sakhā | sakhi-bhyaḥ | īḍyaḥ ||9.66.1||

IAST: tābhyāṁ viśvasya rājasi ye pavamāna dhāmanī
Griffith: O'er all thou rulest with these Two which, Soma Pavamana, stand,
Devanāgarī: ताभ्यां विश्वस्य राजसि ये पवमान धामनी
pada pāṭha: tābhyam | viśvasya | rājasi | ye iti | pavamāna | dhāmanī iti || pratīcī iti | soma | tasthatuḥ ||9.66.2||

IAST: pratīcī soma tasthatuḥ
Griffith: Turned, as thy stations, hitherward.
pada pāṭha: tābhyam | viśvasya | rājasi | ye iti | pavamāna | dhāmanī iti || pratīcī iti | soma | tasthatuḥ ||9.66.2||

IAST: pari dhāmāni yāni te tvaṁ somāsi viśvataḥ
Griffith: Wise Soma Pavamana, thou encompassest on every side
Devanāgarī: परि धामानि यानि ते त्वं सोमासि विश्वतः
pada pāṭha: pari | dhāmāni | yāni | te | tvam | soma | asi | viśvataḥ || pavamāna | r̥tu-bhiḥ | kave ||9.66.3||

IAST: pavamāna ṛtubhiḥ kave
Griffith: Thy stations as the seasons come.
pada pāṭha: pari | dhāmāni | yāni | te | tvam | soma | asi | viśvataḥ || pavamāna | r̥tu-bhiḥ | kave ||9.66.3||

IAST: pavasva janayann iṣo 'bhi viśvāni vāryā
Griffith: Flow onward, generating food, for precious boons of every kind,
pada pāṭha: pavasva | janayan | iṣaḥ | abhi | viśvāni | vāryā || sakhā | sakhi-bhyaḥ | ūtaye ||9.66.4||

IAST: sakhā sakhibhya ūtaye
Griffith: A Friend for friends, to be our help.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | janayan | iṣaḥ | abhi | viśvāni | vāryā || sakhā | sakhi-bhyaḥ | ūtaye ||9.66.4||

IAST: tava śukrāso arcayo divas pṛṣṭhe vi tanvate
Griffith: Upon the lofty ridge of heaven thy bright rays with their essences,

pada pāṭha: tava | śukrāsaḥ | arcayaḥ | divaḥ | pr̥ṣṭhe | vi | tanvate || pavitram | soma | dhāma-bhiḥ ||9.66.5||

IAST: pavitraṁ soma dhāmabhiḥ
Griffith: Soma, spread purifying power.
pada pāṭha: tava | śukrāsaḥ | arcayaḥ | divaḥ | pr̥ṣṭhe | vi | tanvate || pavitram | soma | dhāma-bhiḥ ||9.66.5||

IAST: taveme sapta sindhavaḥ praśiṣaṁ soma sisrate
Griffith: O Soma, these Seven Rivers flow, as being thine, to give command:

pada pāṭha: tava | ime | sapta | sindhavaḥ | pra-śiṣam | soma | sisrate || tubhyam | dhāvanti | dhenavaḥ ||9.66.6||

IAST: tubhyaṁ dhāvanti dhenavaḥ
Griffith: The Streams of milk run forth to thee.
pada pāṭha: tava | ime | sapta | sindhavaḥ | pra-śiṣam | soma | sisrate || tubhyam | dhāvanti | dhenavaḥ ||9.66.6||

Griffith: Flow onward, Soma in a stream, effused to gladden Indra's heart,

pada pāṭha: pra | soma | yāhi | dhārayā | sutaḥ | indrāya | matsaraḥ || dadhānaḥ | akṣiti | śravaḥ ||9.66.7||

IAST: dadhāno akṣiti śravaḥ
Griffith: Bringing imperishable fame.
pada pāṭha: pra | soma | yāhi | dhārayā | sutaḥ | indrāya | matsaraḥ || dadhānaḥ | akṣiti | śravaḥ ||9.66.7||

IAST: sam u tvā dhībhir asvaran hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ

pada pāṭha: sam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | dhībhiḥ | asvaran | hinvatīḥ | sapta | jāmayaḥ || vipram | ājā | vivasvataḥ ||9.66.8||

IAST: vipram ājā vivasvataḥ
Griffith: Made melody round thee the Sage.
pada pāṭha: sam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | dhībhiḥ | asvaran | hinvatīḥ | sapta | jāmayaḥ || vipram | ājā | vivasvataḥ ||9.66.8||

IAST: mṛjanti tvā sam agruvo 'vye jīrāv adhi ṣvaṇi
Griffith: The virgins deck thee o'er fresh streams to drive thee to the sieve when thou,

Griffith: A singer, bathest in the wood.
pada pāṭha: mr̥janti | tvā | sam | agruvaḥ | avye | jīrau | adhi | svani || rebhaḥ | yat | ajyase | vane ||9.66.9||

Griffith: The streams of Pavamana, thine, Sage, Mighty One, have pouredthem forth.

IAST: arvanto na śravasyavaḥ
Griffith: Like coursers eager for renown.
pada pāṭha: pavamānasya | te | kave | vājin | sargāḥ | asr̥kṣata || arvantaḥ | na | śravasyavaḥ ||9.66.10||

IAST: avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ
Griffith: The holy songs have sounded forth.
pada pāṭha: accha | kośam | madhu-ścutam | asr̥gram | vāre | avyaye || avāvaśanta | dhītayaḥ ||9.66.11||

Griffith: Have reached the place of sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: accha | samudram | indavaḥ | astam | gāvaḥ | na | dhenavaḥ || agman | r̥tasya | yonim | ā ||9.66.12||

IAST: yad gobhir vāsayiṣyase
Griffith: When thou wilt robe thyself in milk.
pada pāṭha: pra | naḥ | indo iti | mahe | raṇe | āpaḥ | arṣanti | sindhavaḥ || yat | gobhiḥ | vāsayiṣyase ||9.66.13||

Griffith: Indu, we crave thy friendly love.
pada pāṭha: asya | te | sakhye | vayam | iyakṣantaḥ | tvā-ūtayaḥ || indo iti | sakhi-tvam | uśmasi ||9.66.14||

IAST: endrasya jaṭhare viśa
Griffith: Enter thou into Indra's throat.

Griffith: As Warrior ever hast prevailed.

pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | sūraḥ | ā | iṣaḥ | tokasya | sātā | tanūnām || vr̥ṇīmahe | sakhyāya | vr̥ṇīmahe | yujyāya ||9.66.18||

IAST: vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya vṛṇīmahe yujyāya
Griffith: Elect thee for our friendship, we elect thee for companionship.

IAST: āre bādhasva ducchunām
Griffith: Drive thou misfortune far away,

Griffith: To him whose wealth is great we pray.

IAST: dadhad rayim mayi poṣam
Griffith: Granting me wealth that nourishes.

IAST: pavamāno ati sridho 'bhy arṣati suṣṭutim
Griffith: Beyond his enemies away to sweet praise Pavamana flows,

IAST: sūro na viśvadarśataḥ
Griffith: Like Surya visible to all.
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | ati | sridhaḥ | abhi | arṣati | su-stutim || sūraḥ | na | viśva-darśataḥ ||9.66.22||

IAST: sa marmṛjāna āyubhiḥ prayasvān prayase hitaḥ
Griffith: Adorned by living men, set forth for entertainment, rich in food,

IAST: indur atyo vicakṣaṇaḥ
Griffith: Far-sighted Indu is a Steed.

IAST: pavamāna ṛtam bṛhac chukraṁ jyotir ajījanat
Griffith: He, Pavamana, hath produced the lofty Law, the brilliant light,
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | r̥tam | br̥hat | śukram | jyotiḥ | ajījanat || kr̥ṣṇā | tamāṁsi | jaṅghanat ||9.66.24||

IAST: kṛṣṇā tamāṁsi jaṅghanat
Griffith: Destroying darkness black of hue.
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | r̥tam | br̥hat | śukram | jyotiḥ | ajījanat || kr̥ṣṇā | tamāṁsi | jaṅghanat ||9.66.24||

IAST: pavamānasya jaṅghnato hareś candrā asṛkṣata
Griffith: From tawny Pavamana, the Destroyer, radiant streams have sprung,

IAST: jīrā ajiraśociṣaḥ
Griffith: Quick streams from him whose gleams are swift.
pada pāṭha: pavamānasya | jaṅghnataḥ | hareḥ | candrāḥ | asr̥kṣata || jīrāḥ | ajira-śociṣaḥ ||9.66.25||

IAST: pavamāno rathītamaḥ śubhrebhiḥ śubhraśastamaḥ
Griffith: Best rider of the chariot, praised with fairest praise mid beauteous ones,

IAST: hariścandro marudgaṇaḥ
Griffith: Gold-gleaming with the Marut host,

IAST: pavamāno vy aśnavad raśmibhir vājasātamaḥ
Griffith: May Pavamana, best to win the booty, penetrate with rays,

IAST: dadhat stotre suvīryam
Griffith: Giving the singer hero strength.

IAST: pra suvāna indur akṣāḥ pavitram aty avyayam
Griffith: Over the fleecy sieve hath flowed the drop effused: to Indra comes

IAST: punāna indur indram ā
Griffith: Indu while he is purified

IAST: eṣa somo adhi tvaci gavāṁ krīḻaty adribhiḥ

pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | somaḥ | adhi | tvaci | gavām | krīḷati | adri-bhiḥ || indram | madāya | johuvat ||9.66.29||

IAST: indram madāya johuvat
Griffith: Summoning Indra to the draught.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | somaḥ | adhi | tvaci | gavām | krīḷati | adri-bhiḥ || indram | madāya | johuvat ||9.66.29||

IAST: tena no mṛḻa jīvase
Griffith: Of thine which hath been brought from heaven.
pada pāṭha: yasya | te | dyumna-vat | payaḥ | pavamāna | ā-bhr̥tam | divaḥ || tena | naḥ | mr̥ḷa | jīvase ||9.66.30||

IAST: tvaṁ somāsi dhārayur mandra ojiṣṭho adhvare
Griffith: THOU, Soma, hast a running stream, joyous, most strong at sacrifice:

IAST: pavasva maṁhayadrayiḥ
Griffith: Flow bounteously bestowing wealth.
pada pāṭha: tvam | soma | asi | dhārayuḥ | mandraḥ | ojiṣṭhaḥ | adhvare || pavasva | maṁhayat-rayiḥ ||9.67.1||

IAST: tvaṁ suto nṛmādano dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ
Griffith: Effused as cheerer of the men, flowing best gladdener, thou art
pada pāṭha: tvam | sutaḥ | nr̥-mādanaḥ | dadhanvān | matsarin-tamaḥ || indrāya | sūriḥ | andhasā ||9.67.2||

IAST: indrāya sūrir andhasā
Griffith: A Prince to Indra with thy juice.
pada pāṭha: tvam | sutaḥ | nr̥-mādanaḥ | dadhanvān | matsarin-tamaḥ || indrāya | sūriḥ | andhasā ||9.67.2||

IAST: tvaṁ suṣvāṇo adribhir abhy arṣa kanikradat
Griffith: Poured forth by pressing-stones, do thou with loud roar send us in a stream
pada pāṭha: tvam | susvānaḥ | adri-bhiḥ | abhi | arṣa | kanikradat || dyu-mantam | śuṣmam | ut-tamam ||9.67.3||

IAST: dyumantaṁ śuṣmam uttamam
Griffith: Most excellent illustrious might.
pada pāṭha: tvam | susvānaḥ | adri-bhiḥ | abhi | arṣa | kanikradat || dyu-mantam | śuṣmam | ut-tamam ||9.67.3||

IAST: indur hinvāno arṣati tiro vārāṇy avyayā
Griffith: Indu, urged forward, floweth through the fleecy cloth: the Tawny One
pada pāṭha: induḥ | hinvānaḥ | arṣati | tiraḥ | vārāṇi | avyayā || hariḥ | vājam | acikradat ||9.67.4||

IAST: harir vājam acikradat
Griffith: With his loud roar hath brought as strength.
pada pāṭha: induḥ | hinvānaḥ | arṣati | tiraḥ | vārāṇi | avyayā || hariḥ | vājam | acikradat ||9.67.4||

IAST: indo vy avyam arṣasi vi śravāṁsi vi saubhagā
Griffith: Indu, thou flowest through the fleece, bringing felicities and fame,
Devanāgarī: इन्दो व्यव्यमर्षसि वि श्रवांसि वि सौभगा
pada pāṭha: indo iti | vi | avyam | arṣasi | vi | śravāṁsi | vi | saubhagā || vi | vājān | soma | go-mataḥ ||9.67.5||

IAST: vi vājān soma gomataḥ
Griffith: And, Soma, spoil and wealth in kine.
pada pāṭha: indo iti | vi | avyam | arṣasi | vi | śravāṁsi | vi | saubhagā || vi | vājān | soma | go-mataḥ ||9.67.5||

IAST: ā na indo śatagvinaṁ rayiṁ gomantam aśvinam
Griffith: Hither, O Indu, bring us wealth in steeds and cattle hundredfold:
Devanāgarī: आ न इन्दो शतग्विनं रयिं गोमन्तमश्विनम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | indo iti | śata-gvinam | rayim | go-mantam | aśvinam || bhara | soma | sahasriṇam ||9.67.6||

IAST: bharā soma sahasriṇam
Griffith: Bring wealth, O Soma, thousandfold.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | indo iti | śata-gvinam | rayim | go-mantam | aśvinam || bhara | soma | sahasriṇam ||9.67.6||

IAST: pavamānāsa indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ
Griffith: In purifying, through the sieve the rapid drops of'Soma juice
pada pāṭha: pavamānāsaḥ | indavaḥ | tiraḥ | pavitram | āśavaḥ || indram | yāmebhiḥ | āśata ||9.67.7||

IAST: indraṁ yāmebhir āśata
Griffith: Come nigh to Indra in their course.
pada pāṭha: pavamānāsaḥ | indavaḥ | tiraḥ | pavitram | āśavaḥ || indram | yāmebhiḥ | āśata ||9.67.7||

IAST: kakuhaḥ somyo rasa indur indrāya pūrvyaḥ
Griffith: For Indra floweth excellent Indu, the noblest Soma juice
pada pāṭha: kakuhaḥ | somyaḥ | rasaḥ | induḥ | indrāya | pūrvyaḥ || āyuḥ | pavate | āyave ||9.67.8||

IAST: āyuḥ pavata āyave
Griffith: The Living for the Living One.
pada pāṭha: kakuhaḥ | somyaḥ | rasaḥ | induḥ | indrāya | pūrvyaḥ || āyuḥ | pavate | āyave ||9.67.8||

IAST: hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ pavamānam madhuścutam
Griffith: The glittering maids send Sura forth they with their song have sung aloud
pada pāṭha: hinvanti | sūram | usrayaḥ | pavamānam | madhu-ścutam || abhi | girā | sam | asvaran ||9.67.9||

IAST: abhi girā sam asvaran
Griffith: To Pavamana dropping meath.
pada pāṭha: hinvanti | sūram | usrayaḥ | pavamānam | madhu-ścutam || abhi | girā | sam | asvaran ||9.67.9||

IAST: avitā no ajāśvaḥ pūṣā yāmani-yāmani
Griffith: May Pusan, drawn by goats, be our protector, and on all his paths
pada pāṭha: avitā | naḥ | aja-aśvaḥ | pūṣā | yāmani-yāmani || ā | bhakṣat | kanyāsu | naḥ ||9.67.10||

IAST: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ
Griffith: Bestow on us our share of maids.
pada pāṭha: avitā | naḥ | aja-aśvaḥ | pūṣā | yāmani-yāmani || ā | bhakṣat | kanyāsu | naḥ ||9.67.10||

IAST: ayaṁ somaḥ kapardine ghṛtaṁ na pavate madhu
Griffith: This Soma flows like gladdening oil for him who wears the braided locks:
Devanāgarī: अयं सोमः कपर्दिने घृतं न पवते मधु
pada pāṭha: ayam | somaḥ | kapardine | ghr̥tam | na | pavate | madhu || ā | bhakṣat | kanyāsu | naḥ ||9.67.11||

IAST: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ
Griffith: He shall give us our share of maids.
pada pāṭha: ayam | somaḥ | kapardine | ghr̥tam | na | pavate | madhu || ā | bhakṣat | kanyāsu | naḥ ||9.67.11||

IAST: ayaṁ ta āghṛṇe suto ghṛtaṁ na pavate śuci
Griffith: This Soma juice, O glowing God, flows like pure oil, effused for thee:
Devanāgarī: अयं त आघृणे सुतो घृतं न पवते शुचि
pada pāṭha: ayam | te | āghr̥ṇe | sutaḥ | ghr̥tam | na | pavate | śuci || ā | bhakṣat | kanyāsu | naḥ ||9.67.12||

IAST: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ
Griffith: He shall give us our share of maids.
pada pāṭha: ayam | te | āghr̥ṇe | sutaḥ | ghr̥tam | na | pavate | śuci || ā | bhakṣat | kanyāsu | naḥ ||9.67.12||

IAST: vāco jantuḥ kavīnām pavasva soma dhārayā
Griffith: Flow onward, Soma, in thy stream, begetter of the sages' speech:
Devanāgarī: वाचो जन्तुः कवीनां पवस्व सोम धारया
pada pāṭha: vācaḥ | jantuḥ | kavīnām | pavasva | soma | dhārayā || deveṣu | ratna-dhāḥ | asi ||9.67.13||

IAST: deveṣu ratnadhā asi
Griffith: Wealth-giver among Gods art thou.
pada pāṭha: vācaḥ | jantuḥ | kavīnām | pavasva | soma | dhārayā || deveṣu | ratna-dhāḥ | asi ||9.67.13||

IAST: ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati śyeno varma vi gāhate
Griffith: The Falcon dips within the jars: he wrap.him in his robe and goes
Devanāgarī: आ कलशेषु धावति श्येनो वर्म वि गाहते
pada pāṭha: ā | kalaśeṣu | dhāvati | śyenaḥ | varma | vi | gāhate || abhi | droṇā | kanikradat ||9.67.14||

IAST: abhi droṇā kanikradat
Griffith: Loud roaring to the vats of wood.
pada pāṭha: ā | kalaśeṣu | dhāvati | śyenaḥ | varma | vi | gāhate || abhi | droṇā | kanikradat ||9.67.14||

IAST: pari pra soma te raso 'sarji kalaśe sutaḥ
Griffith: Soma, thy juice hath been effused and poured into the pitcher: like
Devanāgarī: परि प्र सोम ते रसोऽसर्जि कलशे सुतः
pada pāṭha: pari | pra | soma | te | rasaḥ | asarji | kalaśe | sutaḥ || śyenaḥ | na | taktaḥ | arṣati ||9.67.15||

IAST: śyeno na takto arṣati
Griffith: A rapid hawk it rushes on.
pada pāṭha: pari | pra | soma | te | rasaḥ | asarji | kalaśe | sutaḥ || śyenaḥ | na | taktaḥ | arṣati ||9.67.15||

IAST: pavasva soma mandayann indrāya madhumattamaḥ
Griffith: For Indra flow most rich in sweets, O Soma, bringing him delight.
pada pāṭha: pavasva | soma | mandayan | indrāya | madhumat-tamaḥ ||9.67.16||

IAST: asṛgran devavītaye vājayanto rathā iva
Griffith: They were sent forth to feast the Gods, like chariots that display their strength.
pada pāṭha: asr̥gran | deva-vītaye | vāja-yantaḥ | rathāḥ-iva ||9.67.17||

IAST: te sutāso madintamāḥ śukrā vāyum asṛkṣata
Griffith: Brilliant, best givers of delight, these juices have sent Vayu forth.
pada pāṭha: te | sutāsaḥ | madin-tamāḥ | śukrāḥ | vāyum | asr̥kṣata ||9.67.18||

IAST: grāvṇā tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitraṁ soma gacchasi
Griffith: Bruised by the press-stones and extolled, Soma, thou goest to the sieve,
Devanāgarī: ग्राव्णा तुन्नो अभिष्टुतः पवित्रं सोम गच्छसि
pada pāṭha: grāvṇā | tunnaḥ | abhi-stutaḥ | pavitram | soma | gacchasi || dadhat | stotre | su-vīryam ||9.67.19||

IAST: dadhat stotre suvīryam
Griffith: Giving the worshipper hero strength.
pada pāṭha: grāvṇā | tunnaḥ | abhi-stutaḥ | pavitram | soma | gacchasi || dadhat | stotre | su-vīryam ||9.67.19||

IAST: eṣa tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram ati gāhate
Griffith: This juice bruised by the pressing-stones and lauded passes through the sieve,
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | tunnaḥ | abhi-stutaḥ | pavitram | ati | gāhate || rakṣaḥ-hā | vāram | avyayam ||9.67.20||

IAST: rakṣohā vāram avyayam
Griffith: Slayer of demons, through the fleece.
pada pāṭha: eṣaḥ | tunnaḥ | abhi-stutaḥ | pavitram | ati | gāhate || rakṣaḥ-hā | vāram | avyayam ||9.67.20||

IAST: yad anti yac ca dūrake bhayaṁ vindati mām iha
Griffith: O Pavamana, drive away the danger, whether near at hand
Devanāgarī: यदन्ति यच्च दूरके भयं विन्दति मामिह
pada pāṭha: yat | anti | yat | ca | dūrake | bhayam | vindati | mām | iha || pavamāna | vi | tat | jahi ||9.67.21||

IAST: pavamāna vi taj jahi
Griffith: Or far remote, that finds me here.
pada pāṭha: yat | anti | yat | ca | dūrake | bhayam | vindati | mām | iha || pavamāna | vi | tat | jahi ||9.67.21||

IAST: pavamānaḥ so adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ
Griffith: This day may Pavamana cleanse us with his purifying power,
Devanāgarī: पवमानः सो अद्य नः पवित्रेण विचर्षणिः
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | saḥ | adya | naḥ | pavitreṇa | vi-carṣaṇiḥ || yaḥ | potā | saḥ | punātu | naḥ ||9.67.22||

IAST: yaḥ potā sa punātu naḥ
Griffith: Most active purifying Priest.
pada pāṭha: pavamānaḥ | saḥ | adya | naḥ | pavitreṇa | vi-carṣaṇiḥ || yaḥ | potā | saḥ | punātu | naḥ ||9.67.22||

IAST: yat te pavitram arciṣy agne vitatam antar ā
Griffith: O Agni, with the cleansing light diffused through all thy fiery glow,
pada pāṭha: yat | te | pavitram | arciṣi | agne | vi-tatam | antaḥ | ā || brahma | tena | punīhi | naḥ ||9.67.23||

IAST: brahma tena punīhi naḥ
Griffith: Purify thou this prayer of ours.
pada pāṭha: yat | te | pavitram | arciṣi | agne | vi-tatam | antaḥ | ā || brahma | tena | punīhi | naḥ ||9.67.23||

IAST: yat te pavitram arcivad agne tena punīhi naḥ
Griffith: Cleanse us with thine own cleansing power, O Agni, that is bright with flame,
pada pāṭha: yat | te | pavitram | arci-vat | agne | tena | punīhi | naḥ || brahma-savaiḥ | punīhi | naḥ ||9.67.24||

IAST: brahmasavaiḥ punīhi naḥ
Griffith: And by libations poured to thee.
pada pāṭha: yat | te | pavitram | arci-vat | agne | tena | punīhi | naḥ || brahma-savaiḥ | punīhi | naḥ ||9.67.24||

IAST: ubhābhyāṁ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca
Griffith: Savitar, God, by both of these, libation, purifying power,
Devanāgarī: उभाभ्यां देव सवितः पवित्रेण सवेन च
pada pāṭha: ubhābhyām | deva | savitariti | pavitreṇa | savena | ca || mām | punīhi | viśvataḥ ||9.67.25||

IAST: mām punīhi viśvataḥ
Griffith: Purify me on every side.
pada pāṭha: ubhābhyām | deva | savitariti | pavitreṇa | savena | ca || mām | punīhi | viśvataḥ ||9.67.25||

IAST: tribhiṣ ṭvaṁ deva savitar varṣiṣṭhaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ
Griffith: Cleanse us, God Savitar, with Three, O Soma, with sublimest forms,
pada pāṭha: tri-bhiḥ | tvam | deva | savitaḥ | varṣiṣṭhaiḥ | soma | dhāma-bhiḥ || agne | dakṣaiḥ | punīhi | naḥ ||9.67.26||

IAST: agne dakṣaiḥ punīhi naḥ
Griffith: Agni, with forms of power and might.
pada pāṭha: tri-bhiḥ | tvam | deva | savitaḥ | varṣiṣṭhaiḥ | soma | dhāma-bhiḥ || agne | dakṣaiḥ | punīhi | naḥ ||9.67.26||

IAST: punantu māṁ devajanāḥ punantu vasavo dhiyā
Griffith: May the Gods' company make me clean, and Vasus make rue pure by song.
Devanāgarī: पुनन्तु मां देवजनाः पुनन्तु वसवो धिया
pada pāṭha: punantu | mām | deva-janāḥ | punantu | vasavaḥ | dhiyā || viśve | devāḥ | punīta | mā | jāta-vedaḥ | punīhi | mā ||9.67.27||

IAST: viśve devāḥ punīta mā jātavedaḥ punīhi mā
Griffith: Purify me, ye General Gods; O Jatavedas, make me pure.
Devanāgarī: विश्वे देवाः पुनीत मा जातवेदः पुनीहि मा
pada pāṭha: punantu | mām | deva-janāḥ | punantu | vasavaḥ | dhiyā || viśve | devāḥ | punīta | mā | jāta-vedaḥ | punīhi | mā ||9.67.27||

IAST: pra pyāyasva pra syandasva soma viśvebhir aṁśubhiḥ
Griffith: Fill thyself full of juice, flow forth, O Soma, thou with all thy stalks,
Devanāgarī: प्र प्यायस्व प्र स्यन्दस्व सोम विश्वेभिरंशुभिः
pada pāṭha: pra | pyāyasva | pra | syandasva | soma | viśvebhiḥ | aṁśu-bhiḥ || devebhyaḥ | ut-tamam | haviḥ ||9.67.28||

IAST: devebhya uttamaṁ haviḥ
Griffith: The best oblation to the Gods.
pada pāṭha: pra | pyāyasva | pra | syandasva | soma | viśvebhiḥ | aṁśu-bhiḥ || devebhyaḥ | ut-tamam | haviḥ ||9.67.28||

IAST: upa priyam panipnataṁ yuvānam āhutīvṛdham
Griffith: We with our homage have approached the Friend who seeks our wondering praise,
pada pāṭha: upa | priyam | panipnatam | yuvānam | āhuti-vr̥dham || aganma | bibhrataḥ | namaḥ ||9.67.29||

IAST: aganma bibhrato namaḥ
Griffith: Young, strengthener of the solemn rite.
pada pāṭha: upa | priyam | panipnatam | yuvānam | āhuti-vr̥dham || aganma | bibhrataḥ | namaḥ ||9.67.29||

IAST: alāyyasya paraśur nanāśa tam ā pavasva deva soma
Griffith: Lost is Alayya's axe. O Soma, God do thou send it back hither in thy flow
Devanāgarī: अलाय्यस्य परशुर्ननाश तमा पवस्व देव सोम
pada pāṭha: alāyyasya | paraśuḥ | nanāśa | tam | ā | pavasva | deva | soma || ākhum | cit | eva | deva | soma ||9.67.30||

IAST: ākhuṁ cid eva deva soma
Griffith: Even, Soma, God, if 'twere a mole.
pada pāṭha: alāyyasya | paraśuḥ | nanāśa | tam | ā | pavasva | deva | soma || ākhum | cit | eva | deva | soma ||9.67.30||

IAST: yaḥ pāvamānīr adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṁ rasam
Griffith: The man who reads the essence stored by saints, the Pavamani hymns,
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | pāvamānīḥ | adhi-eti | r̥ṣi-bhiḥ | sam-bhr̥tam | rasam || sarvam | saḥ | pūtam | aśnāti | svaditam | mātariśvanā ||9.67.31||

IAST: sarvaṁ sa pūtam aśnāti svaditam mātariśvanā
Griffith: Tastes food completely purified, made sweet by Matarisvan's touch.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | pāvamānīḥ | adhi-eti | r̥ṣi-bhiḥ | sam-bhr̥tam | rasam || sarvam | saḥ | pūtam | aśnāti | svaditam | mātariśvanā ||9.67.31||

IAST: pāvamānīr yo adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṁ rasam
Griffith: Whoever reads the essence stored by saints, the Pavamani hymns,
pada pāṭha: pāvamānīḥ | yaḥ | adhi-eti | r̥ṣi-bhiḥ | sam-bhr̥tam | rasam || tasmai | sarasvatī | duhe | kṣīram | sarpiḥ | madhu | udakam ||9.67.32||

IAST: tasmai sarasvatī duhe kṣīraṁ sarpir madhūdakam
Griffith: Sarasvati draws forth for him water and butter, milk and meath.
pada pāṭha: pāvamānīḥ | yaḥ | adhi-eti | r̥ṣi-bhiḥ | sam-bhr̥tam | rasam || tasmai | sarasvatī | duhe | kṣīram | sarpiḥ | madhu | udakam ||9.67.32||

IAST: pra devam acchā madhumanta indavo 'siṣyadanta gāva ā na dhenavaḥ
Griffith: THE drops of Soma juice like cows who yield their milk have flowed forth, rich in meath, unto the Shining
Devanāgarī: प्र देवमच्छा मधुमन्त इन्दवोऽसिष्यदन्त गाव आ न धेनवः
pada pāṭha: pra | devam | accha | madhu-mantaḥ | indavaḥ | asisyadanta | gāvaḥ | ā | na | dhenavaḥ || barhi-sadaḥ | vacanā-vantaḥ | ūdha-bhiḥ | pari-srutam | usriyāḥ | niḥ-nijam | dhire ||9.68.1||

IAST: barhiṣado vacanāvanta ūdhabhiḥ parisrutam usriyā nirṇijaṁ dhire
Griffith: And, seated on the grass, raising their voice, assumed the milk, the covering robe wherewith the udders
Devanāgarī: बर्हिषदो वचनावन्त ऊधभिः परिस्रुतमुस्रिया निर्णिजं धिरे
pada pāṭha: pra | devam | accha | madhu-mantaḥ | indavaḥ | asisyadanta | gāvaḥ | ā | na | dhenavaḥ || barhi-sadaḥ | vacanā-vantaḥ | ūdha-bhiḥ | pari-srutam | usriyāḥ | niḥ-nijam | dhire ||9.68.1||

IAST: sa roruvad abhi pūrvā acikradad upāruhaḥ śrathayan svādate hariḥ
Griffith: He bellows with a roar arourd the highest twigs: the Tawny One is sweetened as he breaks them up.
Devanāgarī: स रोरुवदभि पूर्वा अचिक्रददुपारुहः श्रथयन्स्वादते हरिः
pada pāṭha: saḥ | roruvat | abhi | pūrvāḥ | acikradat | upa-āruhaḥ | śrathayan | svādate | hariḥ || tiraḥ | pavitram | pari-yan | uru | jrayaḥ | ni | śaryāṇi | dadhate | devaḥ | ā | varam ||9.68.2||

IAST: tiraḥ pavitram pariyann uru jrayo ni śaryāṇi dadhate deva ā varam
